main_prompt_texts.en:
A beggar with sad eyes holds up a small cardboard sign to {catname}.

[i]"Could you spare a few pennies please?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个眼神忧郁的乞丐向 {catname} 举起了一个小小的
纸板牌子。

[i]“能请你施舍几枚硬币吗？”[/i]

options.name: 5coins

good_prompt_texts.en: The beggar accepts {catname}'s donation and pulls out something small and hands it to {him} in thanks.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
乞丐接受了 {catname} 的捐赠，
并掏出一个小东西交给{him}以示感谢。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} reaches into {his} pocket to hand over the money, and realizes {he} does not have enough! 

The beggar scowls at you for getting their hopes up.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把手伸进口袋准备交钱，
却发现{he}的钱不够！

乞丐因为你给了希望又让人失望而对你怒目而视。

EVENT_ABEGGAR_REW1.en: The beggar accepts {catname}'s donation and pulls out something small and hands it to {him} in thanks.
EVENT_ABEGGAR_REW1.zh:
乞丐接受了 {catname} 的捐赠，
并掏出一个小东西交给{him}以示感谢。

EVENT_ABEGGAR_REW2.en: It's your lucky day! The beggar gives {catname} a present in return!
EVENT_ABEGGAR_REW2.zh:
今天是你的幸运日！
乞丐给了 {catname} 一件礼物作为回礼！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: As {catname} walks away the beggar looks on, forlorn...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 走开时，
乞丐在身后凄凉地注视着……

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} discovers some coins scattered on the ground.

[i]"Why would someone leave these here?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现地上散落着一些硬币。

[i]“为什么会有人把这些留在这儿？
”[/i]

options.name: take

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} picks up the coins.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 捡起了硬币。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} goes to pick up the coins but they are stuck fast to the ground. What a mean prank!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 去捡硬币，但它们牢牢地粘在地上。
真是个恶毒的恶作剧！

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW2.en: When {he} goes to pick up the coins, {catname} notices a small satchel laying nearby and picks it up.
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW2.zh:
当{he}去捡硬币时，
{catname} 注意到旁边放着一个小钱袋并把它捡了起来。

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW3.en: {catname} goes to pick up the coins but they are stuck fast to the ground. What a mean prank!
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW3.zh:
{catname} 去捡硬币，但它们牢牢地粘在地上。
真是个恶毒的恶作剧！

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW4.en:
{catname} tries but can't pick up the coins!

The other cats laugh at {him} as {he} furiously attempts to pry the coins off the floor. Alas, they are glued down!
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试了试，但捡不起硬币！

其他的猫都嘲笑{him}，
因为{he}正疯狂地试图把硬币从地板上撬下来。
唉，它们被胶水粘住了！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: The coins look valuable! {catname} quickly picks them all up.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
这些硬币看起来很值钱！
{catname} 迅速把它们都捡了起来。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} examines the coins but they seem worthless.

As {he} leans close to sniff them, {catname} gets a whiff of something truly foul, a butt penny!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查了硬币，但它们似乎毫无价值。

当{he}凑近去闻时，{catname} 闻到一股极其恶心的味道，
是一枚屁股便币！

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW5.en: The coins look valuable! {catname} quickly picks them all up.
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW5.zh:
这些硬币看起来很值钱！
{catname} 迅速把它们都捡了起来。

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW6.en: While most of the coins seem worthless, one of them looks fancy!
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW6.zh:
虽然大部分硬币似乎毫无价值，
但其中一枚看起来很别致！

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW7.en:
{catname} examines the coins but they seem worthless.

As {he} leans close to sniff them, {catname} gets a whiff of something truly foul, a butt penny!
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW7.zh:
{catname} 检查了硬币，但它们似乎毫无价值。

当{he}凑近去闻时，{catname} 闻到一股极其恶心的味道，
是一枚屁股便币！

EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW8.en:
{catname} turns the coins over in {his} paws to examine them.

{catname} gives one a lick to see if {he} recognizes the type of metal. Yuck!
EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW8.zh:
{catname} 用爪子翻动硬币进行检查。

{catname} 舔了一口，想看看能不能认出这是什么金属。
真恶心！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} ignores the coins.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 无视了这些硬币。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_AFEWCOINS_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a large mound of poop.

{catname} covers {his} nose with {his} paw to keep {himself} from gagging at the smell.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一大堆便便。

{catname} 用脚爪捂住鼻子，
以防自己被臭味熏得作呕。

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} smashes the poop, spraying it across the floor.

The distinct [i]plink!, plink![/i] of coins scattering on the ground reverberates throughout the room.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 打碎了便便，将其喷洒在整个地板上。

硬币散落在地上的*[i]叮当、叮当！
[/i]*声在整个房间里回荡。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} strikes the mound and sprays excrement all over {himself}...

The other cats jump back in horror at the stench!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 击打了那堆东西，
喷了{himself}一身排泄物……

其他猫闻到那臭味，吓得都跳开了！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW1.en:
{catname} smashes the poop, spraying it across the floor.

The distinct [i]plink!, plink![/i] of coins scattering on the ground reverberates throughout the room.
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW1.zh:
{catname} 打碎了便便，将其喷洒在整个地板上。

硬币散落在地上的*[i]叮当、叮当！
[/i]*声在整个房间里回荡。

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW2.en: {catname} pulls apart the pile and finds a large number of coins buried inside!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW2.zh:
{catname} 掰开了这堆东西，
发现里面埋着大量的金币！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW3.en:
{catname} strikes the mound and sprays excrement all over {himself}...

The other cats jump back in horror at the stench!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW3.zh:
{catname} 击打了那堆东西，
喷了{himself}一身排泄物……

其他猫闻到那臭味，吓得都跳开了！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW4.en:
{catname} dives into the pile of poop, destroying it from the inside out!

{He} emerges a few moments later, absolutely covered in brown, smelly excrement...
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW4.zh:
{catname} 扎进便便堆里，从内到外将其摧毁！

过了一会儿，{He}钻了出来，
全身涂满了棕色的、
臭气熏天的排泄物……

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} bites into the soft heap... it tastes great!

{catname} can't get enough of it. {His} eyes dart around, hungry for more poop...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬了一口软绵绵的堆块……味道好极了！

{catname} 怎么吃也吃不够。
眼睛直勾勾地扫视四周，
渴望更多的便便……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} takes a large bite of the feces.

{His} insides begin to gurgle and twist!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬了一大口粪便。

内脏开始咕噜作响，翻江倒海！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW5.en:
{catname} bites into the soft heap... it tastes great!

{catname} can't get enough of it. {His} eyes dart around, hungry for more poop...
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW5.zh:
{catname} 咬了一口软绵绵的堆块……味道好极了！

{catname} 怎么吃也吃不够。
眼睛直勾勾地扫视四周，
渴望更多的便便……

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW6.en: {catname} devours the poop, excrement flying everywhere as he feasts.
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW6.zh: {catname} 吞噬着便便，在进食时排泄物四处飞溅。

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW7.en:
{catname} takes a large bite of the feces.

{His} insides begin to gurgle and twist!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW7.zh:
{catname} 咬了一大口粪便。

内脏开始咕噜作响，翻江倒海！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW8.en:
{catname} eagerly gobbles down large bites of the poop.

{His} insides swell and groan as {his} stomach reacts to the foul meal!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW8.zh:
{catname} 急切地吞下大口大口的便便。

内脏开始膨胀和呻吟，
胃部对这顿恶心的饭菜产生了反应！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} discovers that the poop has become fossilized!

{He} gingerly picks up the poop and stashes it in {his} pocket.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现这坨便便已经变成了化石！

{He}小心翼翼地捡起便便，
塞进了口袋里。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bets there is something valuable hiding inside the poop and makes it {his} mission to dig through every last brown log!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 打赌便便里藏着值钱的东西，
并把翻遍每一块棕色排泄物作为任务！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW10.en: {catname} examines the heap of poop, and finds some items inside!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW10.zh: {catname} 检查了这堆便便，在里面发现了一些物品！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW11.en: {catname} bets there is something valuable hiding inside the poop and makes it {his} mission to dig through every last brown log!
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW11.zh:
{catname} 打赌便便里藏着值钱的东西，
并把翻遍每一块棕色排泄物作为任务！

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW12.en:
{catname} believes {he} sees something inside the poop and leaps into the pile, desperately searching for valuables!

Hopefully that was at least a valuable lesson.
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW12.zh:
{catname} 相信自己在便便里看到了什么，
于是跳进堆里疯狂寻找值钱的东西！

希望这至少能成为一个“宝贵”的教训。

EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW9.en:
{catname} discovers that the poop has become fossilized!

{He} gingerly picks up the poop and stashes it in {his} pocket.
EVENT_ALARGEPOOP_REW9.zh:
{catname} 发现这坨便便已经变成了化石！

{He}小心翼翼地捡起便便，
塞进了口袋里。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} has found a mega huge poop!

{catname} looks up in awe at the massive monument to defecation towering above {him}.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一坨超级巨大的便便！

{catname} 敬畏地仰视着矗立在{him}面前的巨大排泄丰碑。

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} lays into the massive poop with {his} paws, sending chunks flying everywhere!

Whatever laid this beauty must have also eaten a whole lot of coins!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用脚爪对着这坨巨大的便便一顿猛击，
碎块四处飞溅！

排下这件“杰作”的家伙肯定吃了一大堆金币！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname}'s paws splatter excrement everywhere as {he} punches {his} way through the massive poop.

{He} steps away, proud of {his} work, but covered in feces!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用爪子在巨大的便便中奋力打洞，
弄得排泄物到处飞溅。

{He}退后一步，为自己的成果感到自豪，
但全身都沾满了粪便！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW1.en:
{catname} lays into the massive poop with {his} paws, sending chunks flying everywhere!

Whatever laid this beauty must have also eaten a whole lot of coins!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW1.zh:
{catname} 用脚爪对着这坨巨大的便便一顿猛击，
碎块四处飞溅！

排下这件“杰作”的家伙肯定吃了一大堆金币！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW2.en: Layers of brown poop crumble before {catname} as {he} pulls back the side of the pile, revealing a massive pile of coins hidden inside!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW2.zh:
随着 {catname} 扒开便便堆的一侧，
一层层棕色的便便塌了下来，
露出了藏在里面的大量金币！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW3.en:
{catname}'s paws splatter excrement everywhere as {he} punches {his} way through the massive poop.

{He} steps away, proud of {his} work, but covered in feces!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW3.zh:
{catname} 用爪子在巨大的便便中奋力打洞，
弄得排泄物到处飞溅。

{He}退后一步，为自己的成果感到自豪，
但全身都沾满了粪便！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW4.en:
{catname} dives face first into the massive poop and gets covered in feces!

The other cats run in terror from {his} stench!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW4.zh:
{catname} 一头扎进巨大的便便里，
浑身沾满了粪便！

其他的猫被{he}的臭味吓得落荒而逃！

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} eats {his} fill from the huge pile of poop, acquiring an insatiable appetite for the peculiar flavor!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 从那堆巨大的便便里饱餐了一顿，
并对这种独特的口味产生了无法抑制的食欲！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} devours many rolls of the brown stool...

{His} stomach rumbles and {he} collapses in pain!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 吞下了许多卷褐色的粪便……

肚子咕咕作响，随后因疼痛倒地！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW5.en: {catname} eats {his} fill from the huge pile of poop, acquiring an insatiable appetite for the peculiar flavor!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW5.zh:
{catname} 从那堆巨大的便便里饱餐了一顿，
并对这种独特的口味产生了无法抑制的食欲！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW6.en: The poop tastes delicious and {catname} eats until {his} belly is almost bursting!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW6.zh:
这便便尝起来味道极佳，
{catname} 一直吃到肚子快要撑破为止！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW7.en:
{catname} devours many rolls of the brown stool...

{His} stomach rumbles and {he} collapses in pain!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW7.zh:
{catname} 吞下了许多卷褐色的粪便……

肚子咕咕作响，随后因疼痛倒地！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW8.en:
{catname} consumes the poop but it tastes gross!

{He} feels a growing pressure from {his} stomach as gasses from the feces begin to expand!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW8.zh:
{catname} 吃下了便便，但味道很恶心！

随着粪便中的气体开始膨胀，
{he}感觉到腹部压力不断增大！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} carefully digs through the huge pile and finds a section that has fossilized!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 仔细地在这堆巨型便便中挖掘，
发现了一块已经石化的部分！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pokes the huge pile of poop, looking for loot, and it collapses down on top of {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 戳了戳那堆巨大的便便寻找战利品，
结果整堆便便都崩塌在{him}身上了！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW10.en: {catname} meticulously searches through the gargantuan pile of stool and finds several trinkets!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW10.zh:
{catname} 在这堆硕大无朋的粪便中细心搜寻，
发现了几个饰品！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW11.en: {catname} pokes the huge pile of poop, looking for loot, and it collapses down on top of {him}!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW11.zh:
{catname} 戳了戳那堆巨大的便便寻找战利品，
结果整堆便便都崩塌在{him}身上了！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW12.en:
{catname} leaps into the huge pile of feces, looking for treasure!

Moments later {catname} crawls out, drenched in poop!
EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW12.zh:
{catname} 跳进巨大的排泄物堆里寻找宝藏！

片刻之后，{catname} 爬了出来，
浑身湿漉漉地沾满了便便！

EVENT_AMEGAHUGEPOOP_REW9.zh:
{catname} 仔细地在这堆巨型便便中挖掘，
发现了一块已经石化的部分！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a small pile of excrement.

{He} wrinkles {his} nose as the dropping permeates the room with a foul stench...
main_prompt_texts.zh:

这坨东西让房间充满恶臭，
{He}嫌弃地皱起了鼻子……

good_prompt_texts.en:
With a well aimed strike, {catname} strikes at the poop and quickly dispatches it!

{He} feels something metallic...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
凭借精准的一击，
{catname} 击碎了便便并迅速解决掉了它！

{He}感觉到了某种金属质感……

Not taking any chances, {catname} strikes the small pile of excrement, spraying the walls with debris.

为了以防万一，{catname} 击打了那堆小小的排泄物，
让碎渣溅满了墙壁。

{He}弄得一团糟，但似乎没有发生别的事。

Without hesitation, {catname} pounces on the poop and eviscerates it.

{catname} 毫不犹豫地扑向便便并将其撕碎。

Not taking any chances, {catname} strikes the small pile of excrement, spraying the walls with debris.

Without thinking twice, {catname} takes a large bite of poop.

As it slides down, {catname} starts to realize how bad of an idea this was.

EVENT_APOOP_REW10.zh: {catname} 觉得在便便里看到了一些闪闪发光的东西！

经过仔细观察和几次果断的操作，

一股气流涌出，

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} gobbles up the rocks. They are quite crunchy.

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW2.zh: {catname} 费了好大劲才嚼碎了岩石并把它们咽了下去。

good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 收集起这些岩石以备后用。

{catname} fills {his} pockets to the brim with rocks!

移动明显变慢了。

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW5.en: {catname} gathers up the rocks to use for later.
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW5.zh: {catname} 收集起这些岩石以备后用。

{catname} spends time meticulously picking up every rock {he} can find in the area.

It takes a while but {catname} is rewarded for {his} efforts!

每一块岩石。

这花了不少时间，
但 {catname} 的努力得到了回报！

{catname} fills {his} pockets to the brim with rocks!

It slows {him} down considerably.
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW7.zh:
{catname} 的口袋里塞满了岩石！

移动明显变慢了。

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW8.en:
[i]"Wow! What a cute rock!"[/i] exclaims {catname}, and picks up one of the larger rocks.

The other cats look on skeptically but no one has the heart to tell {catname} it's just a rock.
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW8.zh:
[i]“哇！好可爱的石头！”[/i] {catname} 惊叹道，

其他的猫怀疑地看着，
但谁也不忍心告诉 {catname} 那仅仅是一块石头。

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} looks closely at the rocks, and finds some coins mixed in!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 仔细观察这些岩石，
发现里面混着一些金币！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Convinced there is something here that doesn't meet the eye, {catname} stares transfixed at the rocks for hours.

The party waits so long they are ambushed!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 坚信这里有深藏不露的东西，
于是盯着那些石头看了好几个小时。

队伍等了太久，结果遭到了偷袭！

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW10.en:
Upon closer examination, {catname} discovers that the rocks are made of gold!

[i]"We're rich!"[/i]
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW10.zh:
经过仔细观察，
{catname} 发现这些岩石竟然是黄金做的！

[i]“我们发财了！”[/i]

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW11.en:
Convinced there is something here that doesn't meet the eye, {catname} stares transfixed at the rocks for hours.

The party waits so long they are ambushed!
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW11.zh:
{catname} 坚信这里有深藏不露的东西，
于是盯着那些石头看了好几个小时。

队伍等了太久，结果遭到了偷袭！

{catname} examines the rocks for ages, getting more and more excited the longer that goes on.

They are just rocks, but {catname} is obsessed with them!
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW12.zh:

观察得越久就越感到兴奋。

它们只是岩石，但 {catname} 对它们着了迷！

EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW9.en: {catname} looks closely at the rocks, and finds some coins mixed in!
EVENT_ASMALLPILEOFSTONES_REW9.zh:
{catname} 仔细观察这些岩石，
发现里面混着一些金币！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A grotesque, writhing, cancerous mass of flesh lies in a heap before {catname}.

Perhaps once this thing was a creature but it has now lost any recognizable form.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一团令人作呕、蠕动着的癌症肉块堆在 {catname} 面前。

也许这东西曾经是个生物，
但现在它已经失去了任何可辨认的形状。

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to eat from the large mass of flesh. It doesn't taste great but satisfies {him} a tad.

{catname} 试着啃食这团巨大的肉块。
味道不太好，但勉强让{him}填了填肚子。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} takes a large bite from the strange creature. It tastes pretty gross.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 从这个奇异的生物身上咬下了一大块。
味道相当恶心。

EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW1.en: {catname} tries to eat from the large mass of flesh. It doesn't taste great but satisfies {him} a tad.
EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW1.zh:
{catname} 试着啃食这团巨大的肉块。
味道不太好，但勉强让{him}填了填肚子。

EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW2.en:
{catname} bites into the cancerous mass, unsure what to expect.

It tastes... odd. As {he} continues to eat from it, {catname} feels {his} body rapidly begin to mutate!
EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW2.zh:

味道……很怪。随着{he}继续啃食，

EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW3.en: {catname} takes a large bite from the strange creature. It tastes pretty gross.
EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW3.zh:

味道相当恶心。

EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW4.zh:
{catname} 吃了这个恶心生物的一部分。

而且吞下去的时候还在喉咙里乱动！

options.name: kiss

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} leans in and kisses the strange creature...

Hard to tell, but it seems to have liked the affection.

{catname}'s mouth and eyes are gone!
EVENT_BALLOFCANCER_REW8.zh:
{catname} 痛苦地嚎叫着，

{catname} 的嘴巴和眼睛都消失了！

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} carefully moves around the trap. {He} discovers a chain tied to the other side and pulls on it!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地绕过陷阱。
{He}发现另一头连着一根链条，
于是用力拉了拉！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to walk around the trap, but stumbles in the narrow space and gets caught!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图绕行，却在狭窄的空间里摔了一跤，
结果被抓住了！

EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW5.en: {catname} carefully moves around the trap. {He} discovers a chain tied to the other side and pulls on it!
EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW5.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地绕过陷阱。
{He}发现另一头连着一根链条，
于是用力拉了拉！

EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW6.en: {catname} skirts around the trap, and finds a release button on the other side!
EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW6.zh: {catname} 绕过陷阱，并在另一侧发现了一个释放按钮！

EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW7.en: {catname} tries to walk around the trap, but stumbles in the narrow space and gets caught!
EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图绕行，却在狭窄的空间里摔了一跤，
结果被抓住了！

EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW8.en: {catname} leaps over the large trap, but it snaps at {him} mercilessly as {he} passes over it!
EVENT_BEARTRAP_REW8.zh:
{catname} 跃过巨大的陷阱，但在{he}经过时，
陷阱无情地向{him}咬合！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} whirls around to face the big toe!
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 猛地转身面对那只大脚趾！

options.name: yank_it_out

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pulls the toe out...

It will make a good meal!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把脚趾拔了出来……

这会是一顿丰盛的大餐！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to pull out the toe, but it fights back!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 试图拔出脚趾，但它居然在反击！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW1.en:
{catname} pulls the toe out...

It will make a good meal!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 把脚趾拔了出来……

这会是一顿丰盛的大餐！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW2.en: {catname} yanks the large toe out of the ground and saves it as a juicy snack for later!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 从地里拔出了这只硕大的脚趾，
把它留作以后享用的美味零食！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW3.en: {catname} tries to pull out the toe, but it fights back!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW3.zh: {catname} 试图拔出脚趾，但它居然在反击！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW4.en: {catname} moves to grab the giant toe, but before {he} can react, it latches onto {him}!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 正准备抓起那只巨型脚趾，
但还没等{he}反应过来，脚趾就死死缠住了{him}！

options.name: bite_it_off

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bites into the toe... it is yummy!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 对着脚趾咬了一口……味道真不错！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to bite the toe but it clamps down on {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 试图咬那个脚趾，结果它反过来把{him}夹住了！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW5.en: {catname} bites into the toe... it is yummy!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW5.zh: {catname} 对着脚趾咬了一口……味道真不错！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW6.en:
The large toe is soft and thick.

Juices from the delicious toe run down {catname}'s chin as {he} devours it!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW6.zh:
这只巨大的脚趾肉质柔软且肥厚。

当 {catname} 狼吞虎咽地吃它时，
美味的汁水顺着 {catname} 的下巴流了下来！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW7.en: {catname} tries to bite the toe but it clamps down on {him}!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW7.zh: {catname} 试图咬那个脚趾，结果它反过来把{him}夹住了！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW8.en:
{catname} is about to bite into the toe when suddenly {he} feels that {he} is being watched.

{catname} hears a strange voice in the wind...

[i]Where is my toe??[/i]
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 正要咬下脚趾，
突然感到有某种视线在注视着。
 

{catname} 在风中听到了一个奇怪的
声音……

[i]我的脚趾在哪儿？？[/i]

options.name: remove_the_nail

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} rips the nail off the toe!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 把脚趾上的趾甲撕了下来！

bad_prompt_texts.en: With surprising dexterity, the large toe slams down on {catname}'s leg!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
那只大脚趾动作异常灵敏，
猛地砸在 {catname} 的腿上！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW10.en: {catname} effortlessly tears the toe nail off the large toe...
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW10.zh:
{catname} 轻而易举地从那只大脚趾上撕下
了趾甲……

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW11.en: With surprising dexterity, the large toe slams down on {catname}'s leg!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW11.zh:
那只大脚趾动作异常灵敏，
猛地砸在 {catname} 的腿上！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW12.en:
{catname} tugs on the toe nail, and the toe starts moving. It was a giant sleeping monster!

{catname} jumps in fright and runs for {his} life!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW12.zh:
{catname} 猛拽趾甲，脚趾竟然开始动了。
那竟然是一个沉睡的巨型怪兽！

{catname} 惊叫一声，拼命逃跑！

EVENT_BIGTOE_REW9.en: {catname} rips the nail off the toe!
EVENT_BIGTOE_REW9.zh: {catname} 把脚趾上的趾甲撕了下来！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a tin full of super rare candies!

The whole party gets one!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个装满超级稀有糖果的罐子！

全队每猫都有一颗！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW10.en: {catname} is all dolled up and ready for a night on the town!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW10.zh: {catname} 打扮得漂漂亮亮，准备去城里狂欢一整夜！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW11.en: {catname} finds a secret hatch and pulls it open to look inside...
EVENT_BLESSING_REW11.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个秘密舱口并拉开它往
里看……

EVENT_BLESSING_REW12.en:
{catname} makes a new friend!

A stray cat joins the party.
EVENT_BLESSING_REW12.zh:
{catname} 交到了一个新朋友！

一只流浪猫加入了队伍。

EVENT_BLESSING_REW13.en: {catname} discovers a partially buried treasure chest and digs it up!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW13.zh: {catname} 发现了一个埋在土里一半的宝箱并把它挖了出来！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW14.en: {catname} finds a large pile of food! The cats chow down on the lavish feast!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW14.zh:
{catname} 发现了一大堆食物！
猫咪们狼吞虎咽地享用着丰盛的盛宴！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW15.en: {catname} finds a rare piece of candy and levels up!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW15.zh: {catname} 找到了一颗稀有糖果并升级了！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW16.zh: {catname} 发现了一朵四叶三叶草！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW17.en: {catname} finds an old shoe and wears it for a while. When {he} finally takes it off, {catname} can run much faster than before!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW17.zh:
{catname} 找到了一只旧鞋并穿了一会儿。
当{he}最后脱下它时，{catname} 跑得比以前快多了！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW18.en: {catname} finds a plump and delicious looking mushroom and eats it!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW18.zh: {catname} 发现了一朵圆润且看起来很好吃的蘑菇并吃了它！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW19.en: {catname} digs through a trash heap and finds something valuable!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW19.zh: {catname} 翻开一堆垃圾并找到了一些值钱的东西！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW2.zh: {catname} 找到了一些闪亮的金币！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW20.en: {catname} finds a syringe full of a strange liquid. {He} doesn't hesitate!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW20.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个装满奇怪液体的注射器。
{He}毫不犹豫地注射了下去！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW21.en:
{catname} finds a tin full of super rare candies!

The whole party gets one!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW21.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个装满超级稀有糖果的罐子！

全队每猫都有一颗！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW3.en:
{catname} finds some delicious catnip growing and devours it. {He} travels to strange places where all {his} dreams come true...

{catname} will start the next battle with extra mana.
EVENT_BLESSING_REW3.zh:
{catname} 发现了一些生长的美味猫薄荷并吞了下去。
{He}去往了奇怪的地方，
在那里{he}所有的梦想都成真了……

{catname} 在下场战斗开始时将拥有额外法力值。

EVENT_BLESSING_REW4.en: {catname} finds some evidence and is more prepared for the next event!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW4.zh:
{catname} 发现了一些证据，
为下一次事件做好了更充分的准备！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW5.en: {catname} seems to have an admirer. A fly has joined the party!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW5.zh:
{catname} 似乎有了一个仰慕者。
一只苍蝇加入了队伍！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW6.en:
Aha! {catname} discovers some tracks!

{He} follows them through a secret path allowing the party to ambush!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW6.zh:
啊哈！{catname} 发现了一些踪迹！

{He}沿着一条秘密路径跟了上去，
这让队伍可以发起偷袭！

EVENT_BLESSING_REW7.en: {catname} finds a strange sealed box and opens it up...
EVENT_BLESSING_REW7.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个奇怪的
密封盒子并把它打开了……

EVENT_BLESSING_REW8.en:
{catname} discovers a strange piece of art.

{He} admires the design and comments smugly about it to the other cats.
EVENT_BLESSING_REW8.zh:
{catname} 发现了一件奇怪的艺术品。

{He}欣赏它的设计，
并沾沾自喜地向其他猫咪发表评论。

EVENT_BLESSING_REW9.en: {catname} has been working out lately and it is finally starting to pay off!
EVENT_BLESSING_REW9.zh: {catname} 最近一直在锻炼，现在终于开始有回报了！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A dark pool of liquid is on the ground.

Bubbles rise from the surface of the pool as {catname} approaches it.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
地面上有一摊深色的液体。

当 {catname} 靠近时，液面上冒出了气泡。

options.name: lick

good_prompt_texts.en: It tastes almost sweet. {catname} laps up the thick surface.
good_prompt_texts.zh: 味道几乎是甜的。{catname} 舔食着粘稠的液面。

bad_prompt_texts.en: The blood tastes bitter and stale. {catname} swallows repeatedly, trying to remove the metallic taste from {his} mouth.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
血液的味道又苦又腥。{catname} 不停地吞咽，
试图去除口中的金属味。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW1.en: It tastes almost sweet. {catname} laps up the thick surface.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW1.zh: 味道几乎是甜的。{catname} 舔食着粘稠的液面。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW2.en:
{catname} leans over and stares into the warm pool.

Behind {his} reflection, {he} sees something looking back at {him}.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 弯下腰，盯着温热的血泊。

在倒影背后，{he}看到有什么东西正盯着{him}看。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW3.en: The blood tastes bitter and stale. {catname} swallows repeatedly, trying to remove the metallic taste from {his} mouth.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW3.zh:
血液的味道又苦又腥。{catname} 不停地吞咽，
试图去除口中的金属味。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW4.en: As {catname} dips {his} tongue into the viscous liquid, {he} feels something leap up from the pool and latch onto {him}!
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW4.zh:
当 {catname} 将舌头伸进粘稠的液体中时，
{he}感到有什么东西从血泊里跃出并抓住了{him}！

options.name: lick_alt

good_prompt_texts.en:
It takes time, but {catname} manages to lap up a lot of the liquid.

It tastes good and {catname} feels stronger.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
费了一番功夫，但 {catname} 成功舔食了大量液体。

它的味道很好，{catname} 感到自己变强了。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} drinks the liquid but it tastes very bitter.

{His} stomach begins to ache and {catname} feels hot.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 喝下了液体，但它的味道非常苦。

肚子开始隐隐作痛，{catname} 感到浑身燥热。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW1.en:
It takes time, but {catname} manages to lap up a lot of the liquid.

It tastes good and {catname} feels stronger.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW1.zh:
费了一番功夫，但 {catname} 成功舔食了大量液体。

它的味道很好，{catname} 感到自己变强了。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW2.en: {catname} laps up the strange liquid. It is tangy, but tastes delicious!
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW2.zh:
{catname} 舔食了那种奇怪的液体。
虽然味道很冲，但非常美味！

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW3.en:
{catname} drinks the liquid but it tastes very bitter.

{His} stomach begins to ache and {catname} feels hot.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW3.zh:
{catname} 喝下了液体，但它的味道非常苦。

肚子开始隐隐作痛，{catname} 感到浑身燥热。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW4.en:
{catname} leans {his} face down into the viscous liquid to drink...

The pool begins to splash and bubble as small parasites latch onto {catname}!
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_ALT_REW4.zh:
{catname} 俯下脸凑近粘稠的
液体准备喝……

血泊开始飞溅并冒泡，
一些细小的寄生虫寄生到了 {catname} 身上！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} steps carefully around the dark pool without disturbing it.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 小心地绕过深色血泊，没有惊动它。

EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW5.en: {catname} steps carefully around the dark pool without disturbing it.
EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW5.zh: {catname} 小心地绕过深色血泊，没有惊动它。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_BLOODSTAIN_REW5"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} sees before {him} a writhing mass of parasites in the form of a headless body...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在{him}面前看到了一团蠕动的寄生虫，
其形状像是一个无头躯体……

options.name: give_parasite

good_prompt_texts.en:
The writhing mass tears a parasite off {catname} and absorbs it into itself...

Glorg is pleased!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
那团蠕动的
物体从 {catname} 身上撕下一条寄生虫并将
其吸收……

格洛格很满意！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The writhing mass tears a parasite off {catname} and absorbs it into itself...

Nothing else seems to happen.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
那团蠕动的
物体从 {catname} 身上撕下一条寄生虫并将
其吸收……

似乎没发生别的事情。

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW1.en:
The writhing mass tears a parasite off {catname} and absorbs it into itself...

Glorg is pleased!
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW1.zh:
那团蠕动的
物体从 {catname} 身上撕下一条寄生虫并将
其吸收……

格洛格很满意！

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW2.en:
The writhing mass tears a parasite off {catname} and absorbs it into itself...

Nothing else seems to happen.
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW2.zh:
那团蠕动的
物体从 {catname} 身上撕下一条寄生虫并将
其吸收……

似乎没发生别的事情。

options.good_code:
set_frame 2
                    prompt "EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW1"
                    lose_item parasite
                    event_now_same_cat BodyOfGlorg_Gift
options.bad_code:
set_frame 3
                    prompt "EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW2"
                    lose_item parasite

options.name: fight

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} strikes the mass of parasites and saves two maggots that were trapped inside!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那团寄生虫，
救出了被困在里面的两条蛆虫！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} strikes the strange body.

When {he} does so, a parasite from within the mass latches onto {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那个奇怪的躯体。

就在{he}这么做的时候，
那一团物体中的一条寄生虫附到了{him}身上！

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW3.en: {catname} strikes the mass of parasites and saves two maggots that were trapped inside!
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW3.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那团寄生虫，
救出了被困在里面的两条蛆虫！

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW4.en: {catname} attacks the writhing mass, scattering parasites onto the floor around {him}...
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW4.zh:
{catname} 袭击了那团蠕动的物体，
把寄生虫散落到了{him}周围的
地板上……

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW5.en:
{catname} strikes the strange body.

When {he} does so, a parasite from within the mass latches onto {him}!
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW5.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那个奇怪的躯体。

就在{he}这么做的时候，
那一团物体中的一条寄生虫附到了{him}身上！

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW6.en:
{catname} dives at the writhing mass, attacking with {his} paws and teeth...

{He} sinks into the amorphous body, becoming covered in parasites!
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW6.zh:
{catname} 扑向那团蠕动的物体，
用爪子和牙齿攻击……

{He}陷入了那个无定形的躯体，
全身布满了寄生虫！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} steers clear of the strange amorphous creature.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 避开了那个奇怪的无定形生物。

EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW7.en: {catname} steers clear of the strange amorphous creature.
EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW7.zh: {catname} 避开了那个奇怪的无定形生物。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_BODYOFGLORG_REW7"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
Large parasites extends from Glorg's hand towards {catname}...

Where should Glorg gift {catname}?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
巨大的寄生虫从格洛格的
手中伸向 {catname}……

格洛格应该将礼物赐予 {catname} 的哪个部位？

options.name: head

good_prompt_texts.en:
A large parasite from Glorg's body latches onto {catname}'s skull...

{catname} feels the rush of euphoria as {his} passive abilities become empowered!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
一条来自格洛格身体的
巨大寄生虫锁住了 {catname} 的头骨……

随着被动技能得到增强，
{catname} 感受到了一股强烈的愉悦感！

EVENT_GIFTOFGLORG_REW1.en:
A large parasite from Glorg's body latches onto {catname}'s skull...

{catname} feels the rush of euphoria as {his} passive abilities become empowered!
EVENT_GIFTOFGLORG_REW1.zh:
一条来自格洛格身体的
巨大寄生虫锁住了 {catname} 的头骨……

随着被动技能得到增强，
{catname} 感受到了一股强烈的愉悦感！

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_GIFTOFGLORG_REW1"
                    set_frame 5
                    get_parasite Beepis
                    gain_disorder BlessingOfGlorg

options.name: neck

good_prompt_texts.en:
A parasite extends from Glorg's hand and wraps itself around {catname}'s neck.

{catname} feels a rush of excitement as energy from the parasite surges through {his} body!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
一条寄生虫从格洛格的手中伸出，
缠绕在 {catname} 的脖子上。

随着寄生虫的能量涌入体内，
{catname} 感到一阵莫名的兴奋！

EVENT_GIFTOFGLORG_REW2.en:
A parasite extends from Glorg's hand and wraps itself around {catname}'s neck.

{catname} feels a rush of excitement as energy from the parasite surges through {his} body!
EVENT_GIFTOFGLORG_REW2.zh:
一条寄生虫从格洛格的手中伸出，
缠绕在 {catname} 的脖子上。

随着寄生虫的能量涌入体内，
{catname} 感到一阵莫名的兴奋！

options.good_code:

EVENT_CLAM_REW7.zh: {catname} 试图踩碎蛤蜊，但它反而咬向了{him}！

EVENT_CLAM_REW8.en: {catname} jumps on the small clam, trying to crush it beneath {him}, but the clam slams shut on {his} paw!
EVENT_CLAM_REW8.zh:
{catname} 跳到小蛤蜊身上，试图将其踩碎，
但蛤蜊猛地合上，夹住了{he}的爪子！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} barely resists the urge to kiss the clam and runs away instead.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 勉强克制住亲吻蛤蜊的冲动，
转身跑掉了。

EVENT_CLAM_REW9.en: {catname} barely resists the urge to kiss the clam and runs away instead.
EVENT_CLAM_REW9.zh:
{catname} 勉强克制住亲吻蛤蜊的冲动，
转身跑掉了。

prompt "EVENT_CLAM_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a large pipe that is clogged with debris and waste.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一根巨大的管道，
里面塞满了残骸和废物。

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
Seeing a way to unclog the pipe, {catname} pulls out a branch that was impeding flow...

A huge wave of water explodes from the pipe, drenching everything!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 找到了疏通管道的方法，
拔出了一根阻碍水流的树枝……

巨大的水浪从管道中喷发出来，
把所有东西都淋湿了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} digs through the thick waste with {his} paws, completely ruining {his} clean fur.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用爪子在厚重的废物中挖掘，
完全毁了{he}干净的毛发。

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW1.en:
Seeing a way to unclog the pipe, {catname} pulls out a branch that was impeding flow...

A huge wave of water explodes from the pipe, drenching everything!
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW1.zh:
{catname} 找到了疏通管道的方法，
拔出了一根阻碍水流的树枝……

巨大的水浪从管道中喷发出来，
把所有东西都淋湿了！

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW2.en: {catname} sees something stuck in the sludge at the end of the pipe and digs it out...
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW2.zh:
{catname} 看到管道末端的淤泥里卡着什么东西，
并把它挖了出来……

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW3.en: {catname} digs through the thick waste with {his} paws, completely ruining {his} clean fur.
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW3.zh:
{catname} 用爪子在厚重的废物中挖掘，
完全毁了{he}干净的毛发。

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW4.en: Squishing {his} nose, {catname} leaps into the pipe and pulls out as much sludge as {he} can, trying to unclog the pipe to no avail!
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW4.zh:
{catname} 皱着鼻子跳进管道，
尽其所能地掏出淤泥，试图疏通管道，
但无济于事！

options.name: bash

good_prompt_texts.en:
With surprising fury, {catname} busts the clog open with {his} paws!

A massive torrent of water blasts from the pipe, throwing {catname} back!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 爆发出惊人的力量，
用爪子捅开了堵塞物！

大量的积水从管道中喷涌而出，
把 {catname} 冲飞了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} throws {himself} into the pipe pulling as much gunk and waste out as {he} can, emerging moments later covered in sludge!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 钻进管道，尽可能地拉出脏物和垃圾，
片刻后出来时全身都裹满了粘液！

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW5.en:
With surprising fury, {catname} busts the clog open with {his} paws!

A massive torrent of water blasts from the pipe, throwing {catname} back!
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW5.zh:
{catname} 爆发出惊人的力量，
用爪子捅开了堵塞物！

大量的积水从管道中喷涌而出，
把 {catname} 冲飞了！

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW6.en: {catname} digs through the slush and finds an item!
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW6.zh: {catname} 在烂泥中挖掘并发现了一件物品！

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW7.en: {catname} throws {himself} into the pipe pulling as much gunk and waste out as {he} can, emerging moments later covered in sludge!
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW7.zh:
{catname} 钻进管道，尽可能地拉出脏物和垃圾，
片刻后出来时全身都裹满了粘液！

EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW8.en: {catname} smashes {his} way through the thick sludge trying to clear the clogged pipe, but only ends up covered in disgusting refuse.
EVENT_CLOGGEDPIPES_REW8.zh:
{catname} 猛力击打厚重的淤泥试图清理管道，
结果只是弄得全身都是恶心的垃圾。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} discovers an old window.

A shiny lattice of cracks spreads across the glass panes like a fragile patchwork of tiny mirrors.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一扇旧窗户。

闪亮的裂纹网格散布在玻璃窗格上，
就像由微小镜子组成的脆弱拼布。

options.name: bash

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} picks up a nearby rock and throws it through the window!

Stepping over the shards of broken glass, {catname} finds an alternate route to the next battle, allowing the cats to ambush!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 捡起附近的一块石头，
把它扔过了窗户！

跨过碎玻璃片，
{catname} 发现了一条通往下一场战斗的替代路线，
让猫咪们可以伏击敌人！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} punches the glass with {his} paw!

The window shatters and tiny glass shards fly everywhere, cutting into {catname} like a thousand tiny knives!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用爪子猛击玻璃！

窗户碎裂，细小的玻璃碎片到处乱飞，
像一千把小刀一样割伤了 {catname}！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW1.en:
{catname} picks up a nearby rock and throws it through the window!

Stepping over the shards of broken glass, {catname} finds an alternate route to the next battle, allowing the cats to ambush!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW1.zh:
{catname} 捡起附近的一块石头，
把它扔过了窗户！

跨过碎玻璃片，
{catname} 发现了一条通往下一场战斗的替代路线，
让猫咪们可以伏击敌人！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW2.en:
{catname} smashes in the window with {his} paw, sending fragments of glass flying into the interior.

{He} looks through the hole and sees something interesting within reach!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW2.zh:
{catname} 用爪子砸碎了窗户，碎玻璃飞进了室内。

{He}透过洞口，看到触手可及的地方有些有趣的东西！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW3.en:
{catname} punches the glass with {his} paw!

The window shatters and tiny glass shards fly everywhere, cutting into {catname} like a thousand tiny knives!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW3.zh:
{catname} 用爪子猛击玻璃！

窗户碎裂，细小的玻璃碎片到处乱飞，
像一千把小刀一样割伤了 {catname}！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW4.en:
{catname} closes {his} eyes and tries to leap through the window!

The fragile pane shatters and glass embeds itself in {catname}'s face. {He} lets out a terrible yelp of pain!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW4.zh:
{catname} 闭上眼睛，试图跳过窗户！

脆弱的玻璃碎裂，嵌入了 {catname} 的脸。
{He}发出了痛苦的惨叫！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} examines the window, finds a latch, and pulls the window open!

{He} jumps into the room and discovers a stealthy route to the next battle!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查窗户，发现了一个插销，
并拉开了窗户！

{He}跳进房间，
发现了一条通往下一场战斗的隐秘路线！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} stares at the window and sees another cat staring back at {him}! {He} growls, making an imposing face, and the cat in the window scowls back!

The evil-looking cat matches {catname}'s every move with terrifying speed and ferocity, and {he} flees in terror!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 盯着窗户，看到另一只猫正盯着{him}！
{He}咆哮着，摆出一副威严的面孔，
窗户里的猫也怒目而视！

那只看起来很邪恶的猫以可怕的
速度和凶猛程度模仿着 {catname} 的一举一动，
{he}恐惧地逃跑了！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW5.en:
{catname} examines the window, finds a latch, and pulls the window open!

{He} jumps into the room and discovers a stealthy route to the next battle!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW5.zh:
{catname} 检查窗户，发现了一个插销，
并拉开了窗户！

{He}跳进房间，
发现了一条通往下一场战斗的隐秘路线！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW6.en: Even without an exterior latch, {catname} deftly slides {his} paw under the frame and lifts the window open!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW6.zh:
即使外面没有插销，
{catname} 也灵巧地把爪子滑到窗框下，
把窗户抬开了！

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW7.en:
{catname} stares at the window and sees another cat staring back at {him}! {He} growls, making an imposing face, and the cat in the window scowls back!

The evil-looking cat matches {catname}'s every move with terrifying speed and ferocity, and {he} flees in terror!
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW7.zh:
{catname} 盯着窗户，看到另一只猫正盯着{him}！
{He}咆哮着，摆出一副威严的面孔，
窗户里的猫也怒目而视！

那只看起来很邪恶的猫以可怕的
速度和凶猛程度模仿着 {catname} 的一举一动，
{he}恐惧地逃跑了！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en:
All that broken glass looks dangerous!

{catname} ignores the window and continues onwards.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
那些碎玻璃看起来很危险！

{catname} 无视了窗户，继续前进。

EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW8.en:
All that broken glass looks dangerous!

{catname} ignores the window and continues onwards.
EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW8.zh:
那些碎玻璃看起来很危险！

{catname} 无视了窗户，继续前进。

prompt "EVENT_CLOSEDWINDOW_REW8"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: A large coffin stands ominously in the room ahead, leaning against the wall.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一具巨大的棺材阴森森地立在前方的房间里，
斜靠在墙上。

options.name: bash

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} smashes the coffin open. The bones of its' long dead occupant fall out on top of {him}.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 砸开了棺材。
早已死去的住户的骨头掉落在了{him}身上。

bad_prompt_texts.en: After {catname} rips off the coffin lid, an angry zombie stumbles out!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
在 {catname} 扯开棺材盖后，
一个愤怒的僵尸摇摇晃晃地走了出来！

EVENT_COFFIN_REW1.en: {catname} smashes the coffin open. The bones of its' long dead occupant fall out on top of {him}.
EVENT_COFFIN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 砸开了棺材。
早已死去的住户的骨头掉落在了{him}身上。

EVENT_COFFIN_REW2.en: {catname} rips the lid off the old coffin and pulls out the corpse lying within...
EVENT_COFFIN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 扯掉了旧棺材的盖子，
拖出了躺在里面的尸体……

EVENT_COFFIN_REW3.en: After {catname} rips off the coffin lid, an angry zombie stumbles out!
EVENT_COFFIN_REW3.zh:
在 {catname} 扯开棺材盖后，
一个愤怒的僵尸摇摇晃晃地走了出来！

EVENT_COFFIN_REW4.en:
{catname} leaps at the old coffin and tears open the lid.

A decayed hand reaches out and grips {him} with unnatural strength...
EVENT_COFFIN_REW4.zh:
{catname} 跳向旧棺材并撕开盖子。

一只腐烂的手伸出来，
以异样的力量抓住了{him}……

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} carefully lifts the lid of the coffin.

Amidst the skeletal remains of the coffin's owner {he} spots something useful...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 小心地掀开了棺材盖。

在棺材主人的一堆残骸中，
{he}发现了一些有用的东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pries the coffin open revealing a zombie within!

{catname} takes off running to the next room and the zombie stumbles along in pursuit!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撬开了棺材，露出里面的一个僵尸！

{catname} 拔腿就往下一个房间跑，
僵尸摇摇晃晃地在后面追赶！

EVENT_COFFIN_REW5.en:
{catname} carefully lifts the lid of the coffin.

Amidst the skeletal remains of the coffin's owner {he} spots something useful...
EVENT_COFFIN_REW5.zh:
{catname} 小心地掀开了棺材盖。

在棺材主人的一堆残骸中，
{he}发现了一些有用的东西……

EVENT_COFFIN_REW6.en: Pushing the coffin's lid open, {catname} finds a decaying corpse within. {He} pulls it apart...
EVENT_COFFIN_REW6.zh:
推开棺材盖，{catname} 发现里面有一具腐烂的尸体。
{He}把它拆解了……

EVENT_COFFIN_REW7.en:
{catname} pries the coffin open revealing a zombie within!

{catname} takes off running to the next room and the zombie stumbles along in pursuit!
EVENT_COFFIN_REW7.zh:
{catname} 撬开了棺材，露出里面的一个僵尸！

{catname} 拔腿就往下一个房间跑，
僵尸摇摇晃晃地在后面追赶！

EVENT_COFFIN_REW8.en: Eager to find treasure within the coffin, {catname} carelessly throws the lid open, and a monster within bites {him}!
EVENT_COFFIN_REW8.zh:
{catname} 渴望在棺材里找到宝藏，
粗鲁地掀开了盖子，
结果里面的怪物咬了{him}一口！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} has seen enough corpses for a lifetime and doesn't need to look at another.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 这辈子见过的尸体已经够多了，
不想再看另一具了。

EVENT_COFFIN_REW9.en: {catname} has seen enough corpses for a lifetime and doesn't need to look at another.
EVENT_COFFIN_REW9.zh:
{catname} 这辈子见过的尸体已经够多了，
不想再看另一具了。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_COFFIN_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a computer console with an array of buttons and knobs.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个电脑控制台，
上面有一排排的按钮和旋钮。

options.name: hack

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} presses buttons until the display reads: 

[b]Turn off robots?[/b]

{catname} presses confirm!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 不停按着按钮，直到显示屏上写着：

[b]关闭机器人？[/b]

{catname} 按下了确认键！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries {his} best but has no idea what {he} is doing...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 竭尽全力，
但根本不知道{he}在做什么……

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW1.en:
{catname} presses buttons until the display reads: 

[b]Turn off robots?[/b]

{catname} presses confirm!
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 不停按着按钮，直到显示屏上写着：

[b]关闭机器人？[/b]

{catname} 按下了确认键！

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW2.en:
{catname} hacks the console and forces open a secret compartment...

A friendly robot pops out!
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 黑入了控制台，
强行打开了一个秘密隔层……

一个友好的机器人跳了出来！

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW3.en: {catname} tries {his} best but has no idea what {he} is doing...
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 竭尽全力，
但根本不知道{he}在做什么……

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW4.en:
{catname} is navigating through the console's menus when suddenly an alarm begins blaring and the screen flashes angrily!

Oh no, what did {he} trigger!?
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 正在控制台菜单里操作时，
警报突然大作，屏幕也愤怒地闪烁起来！

糟糕，{he}触发了什么！？

options.name: smash

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} smashes the computer and it shuts off.

{He} tries to reboot it but the console is dead.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 砸毁了电脑，它熄灭了。

{he}试图重新启动它，
但控制台已经彻底报废了。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} hits the console a bunch of times but nothing seems to happen.
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 敲了几次控制台，但似乎什么也没发生。

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW5.en:
{catname} smashes the computer and it shuts off.

{He} tries to reboot it but the console is dead.
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 砸毁了电脑，它熄灭了。

{he}试图重新启动它，
但控制台已经彻底报废了。

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW6.en:
{catname} slams the console over and over until it shuts off.

The cats notice a sudden silence as the constant buzzing of nearby machines go quiet.
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 对着控制台一顿猛砸，直到它熄灭。

猫咪们注意到周围机器恒定的嗡嗡声突然消失，
四周陷入了一片死寂。

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW7.en: {catname} hits the console a bunch of times but nothing seems to happen.
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW7.zh: {catname} 敲了几次控制台，但似乎什么也没发生。

EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW8.en: {catname} tries to punch the computer but the hard metal case breaks {his} paw!
EVENT_COMPUTERCONSOLE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 试图拳击电脑，
但坚硬的金属外壳硌断了{he}的爪子！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} discovers a large crack in the earth. Who knows how far down it leads?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个巨大的地缝。
谁知道它通向地下多深的地方？

options.name: inspect

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} looks beneath the lip of the crack and spies something poking out just within reach!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 向裂缝边缘下方窥视，
发现有件东西探了出来，
正好在手够得到的地方！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
As {catname} approaches the crevice a terrifying monster rises up and attacks {him}!

{catname} is barely able to escape its grasp!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近缝隙时，
一个恐怖的怪物升了起来并攻击了{him}！

{catname} 勉强逃出了它的手掌心！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW1.en: {catname} looks beneath the lip of the crack and spies something poking out just within reach!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW1.zh:
{catname} 向裂缝边缘下方窥视，
发现有件东西探了出来，
正好在手够得到的地方！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW2.en:
There is a strange membrane blocking the way down, but {catname} sees something lodged in the barrier and reaches in to pull it out!

{catname} pulls it out, but the strange surface mutates {him}!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW2.zh:
有一层奇怪的薄膜挡住了向下的路，
但 {catname} 看到有什么东西嵌在了屏障里，
便伸手把它拽了出来！

{catname} 把它拔了出来，
但那个奇异的表面却让{him}发生了突变！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW3.en:
As {catname} approaches the crevice a terrifying monster rises up and attacks {him}!

{catname} is barely able to escape its grasp!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW3.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近缝隙时，
一个恐怖的怪物升了起来并攻击了{him}！

{catname} 勉强逃出了它的手掌心！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW4.en:
Fear grips {catname} as a terrifying monster looms out of the crack and attacks {him}!

{catname} runs for {his} life!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW4.zh:
当一个恐怖的怪物从裂缝中浮现并攻击 {catname} 时，
恐惧笼罩了{him}！

{catname} 拼命逃跑！

options.name: enter

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} follows the fracture down deep into the earth...
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 顺着地缝深入地下……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} can't shake a sense of foreboding as {he} scrambles {his} way down the narrow crack...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在窄缝中跌跌撞撞往下爬的时候，
无法摆脱一种不祥的预感……

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW5.en: {catname} follows the fracture down deep into the earth...

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW6.en: {catname} finds a hidden pathway leading downwards at top of the crack and follows it below...
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW6.zh:
{catname} 在裂缝顶部找到了一条向下通行的隐秘路径，
并顺着它走到了下方……

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW7.en: {catname} can't shake a sense of foreboding as {he} scrambles {his} way down the narrow crack...
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW7.zh:
{catname} 在窄缝中跌跌撞撞往下爬的时候，
无法摆脱一种不祥的预感……

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW8.en:
{catname} struggles, but manages to navigate a way down the steep crevice.

What misfortunes could lie below?
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW8.zh:
虽然很费劲，
但 {catname} 还是成功从陡峭的缝隙中下到了底部。

下方会有怎样的不幸在等着？

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} takes a wide berth around the large crevice and makes {his} way safely past.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 远远地绕过了这条巨大的裂隙，
安全地走了过去。

EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW9.en: {catname} takes a wide berth around the large crevice and makes {his} way safely past.
EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW9.zh:
{catname} 远远地绕过了这条巨大的裂隙，
安全地走了过去。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_CRACKINTHEEARTH_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a break in the wall as if someone has broken into it.

{He} thinks {he} sees treasure hiding inside!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现墙上有个缺口，
好像有人闯入过那里。

{He}觉得{he}看见里面藏着宝藏！

options.name: use_weapon

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} slams {his} weapon into the crack and manages to break it open farther!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用武器狠狠砸向裂缝，
并设法把它撑得更开了！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} wedges {his} weapon into the gap in the wall and pulls.

{His} weapon snaps and breaks!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把武器卡进墙上的缝隙并用力一撬。

武器咔嚓一声断了！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW1.en: {catname} slams {his} weapon into the crack and manages to break it open farther!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW1.zh:
{catname} 用武器狠狠砸向裂缝，
并设法把它撑得更开了！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW2.en:
{catname} uses {his} weapon to pry off part of the wall.

Coins spill out from widened the crack!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW2.zh:
{catname} 用武器撬下了墙的一部分。

金币从扩大的裂缝中流了出来！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW3.en:
{catname} wedges {his} weapon into the gap in the wall and pulls.

{His} weapon snaps and breaks!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 把武器卡进墙上的缝隙并用力一撬。

武器咔嚓一声断了！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW4.en:
{catname} strikes the wall with {his} weapon...

Rocks from the ceiling collapse down atop {him} and the party! Debris wedges its way into the crack, sealing it up.
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW4.zh:
{catname} 用武器敲击墙壁……

天花板上的岩石坍塌了下来，
砸在{him}和小队身上！碎石堵住了裂缝，
将其彻底封死了。

options.name: bash

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} swings at the crack in the wall but nothing happens so {he} walks off instead.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 对着墙上的裂缝挥了一下，
但什么也没发生，于是{he}直接走开了。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} punches the wall...

It hurts!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 捶了一下墙……

真疼！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW5.en: {catname} swings at the crack in the wall but nothing happens so {he} walks off instead.
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 对着墙上的裂缝挥了一下，
但什么也没发生，于是{he}直接走开了。

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW6.en:
{catname} strikes at the crack, breaking off pieces of the wall.

Some coins tumble out of the widened gap!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW6.zh:
{catname} 敲击裂缝，砸下了几块墙砖。

一些金币从扩大的缝隙中掉了出来！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW8.en:
{catname} winds up and swings at the crack with all {his} strength...

{He} howls in pain from the impact!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW8.zh:
{catname} 卯足了劲，
全力一击捶在裂缝上……

冲击的剧痛让{he}惨叫出声！

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} reaches through the crack in the wall and pulls out some loot!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把手伸进墙上的裂缝，
掏出了一些战利品！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} reaches through the crack looking for treasure, but all that is left is some old food.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 伸进裂缝寻找宝藏，
但剩下的只是一些陈旧的食物。

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW10.en: Jackpot! {catname} fishes out a bag of treasure that was stashed in the wall.
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW10.zh: 中大奖了！{catname} 掏出了一个藏在墙里的宝藏袋。

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW11.en: {catname} reaches through the crack looking for treasure, but all that is left is some old food.
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW11.zh:
{catname} 伸进裂缝寻找宝藏，
但剩下的只是一些陈旧的食物。

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW12.en:
{catname} pokes his head through the wall looking for treasure...

Something large grabs onto {him} and pulls {catname} through the wall!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW12.zh:
{catname} 探头进墙里寻找宝藏……

某个巨大的东西抓住了{him}，
把 {catname} 拽进了墙里！

EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW9.en: {catname} reaches through the crack in the wall and pulls out some loot!
EVENT_CRACKINTHEWALL_REW9.zh:
{catname} 把手伸进墙上的裂缝，
掏出了一些战利品！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a large crashed mechanical object!

Maybe it is some kind of large robot or ship?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个巨大的坠毁机械物体！

也许是某种大型机器人或飞船？

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} digs around in the wreckage until {he} finds something useful!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在残骸中四处挖掘，
直到{he}找到了一些有用的东西！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} digs through the wreckage but can't find anything worth salvaging.
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 翻遍了残骸，但没发现任何值得打捞的东西。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW1.en: {catname} digs around in the wreckage until {he} finds something useful!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW1.zh:
{catname} 在残骸中四处挖掘，
直到{he}找到了一些有用的东西！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW2.en: {catname} explores the crashed object and finds a sweet sci-fi weapon!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW2.zh:
{catname} 探索了坠毁物体，
并发现了一件超酷的科幻武器！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW3.en: {catname} digs through the wreckage but can't find anything worth salvaging.
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW3.zh: {catname} 翻遍了残骸，但没发现任何值得打捞的东西。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW4.en:
While examining the wreckage, {catname} accidentally sits on something. It hurts!

{catname} has been probed!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW4.zh:
在检查残骸时，{catname} 不小心坐在了什么东西上。
好疼！

{catname} 被植入探针了！

options.name: repair

good_prompt_texts.en:
Something whirs and clicks and a light turns on!

It doesn't seem to do much, but {catname} feels very smart for having figured it out!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
某种东西发出了嗡嗡声和咔嗒声，
灯亮了！

它似乎没起什么大作用，
但 {catname} 觉得自己能搞明白它真是太聪明了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to repair the ship but can't make heads or tails of it.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图修理这艘飞船，
但完全搞不清楚是怎么回事。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW5.en:
Something whirs and clicks and a light turns on!

It doesn't seem to do much, but {catname} feels very smart for having figured it out!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW5.zh:
某种东西发出了嗡嗡声和咔嗒声，
灯亮了！

它似乎没起什么大作用，
但 {catname} 觉得自己能搞明白它真是太聪明了！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW6.en:
The ship turns on, and stands up...

It was a big mech! {catname} is stoked, this looks very handy!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW6.zh:
飞船启动了，并且站了起来……

这是一台巨型机甲！{catname} 非常兴奋，
这东西看起来非常管用！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW7.en: {catname} tries to repair the ship but can't make heads or tails of it.
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图修理这艘飞船，
但完全搞不清楚是怎么回事。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW8.en: {catname} tinkers with the ship, trying to fix it, when a sharp piece of metal cuts {him} badly!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW8.zh:
{catname} 正忙着修理飞船，
一块锋利的金属片把{him}割伤得很严重！

options.name: inspect

good_prompt_texts.en: Tucked in a protected compartment, {catname} finds a robot and turns it on!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
在某个受保护的舱室里，
{catname} 发现了一个机器人并启动了它！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries {his} best to figure out the large pile of wreckage but it's no use.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 尽力想要搞清楚这堆庞大的残骸，
但根本没用。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW10.en:
After further inspection, the wreckage contains several robots, still in working condition!

{catname} powers them on!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW10.zh:
经过进一步检查，
残骸中包含几个仍处于工作状态的机器人！

{catname} 启动了它们！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW11.en: {catname} tries {his} best to figure out the large pile of wreckage but it's no use.
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW11.zh:
{catname} 尽力想要搞清楚这堆庞大的残骸，
但根本没用。

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW12.en: {catname} wastes so much time trying to figure out the wrecked ship that the party gets ambushed!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW12.zh:
{catname} 在搞清楚这艘废船上浪费了太多时间，
导致小队遭到了偷袭！

EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW9.en: Tucked in a protected compartment, {catname} finds a robot and turns it on!
EVENT_CRASHEDOBJECT_REW9.zh:
在某个受保护的舱室里，
{catname} 发现了一个机器人并启动了它！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a large wooden crate. It appears to be in good condition...

{catname} wonders what treasures could be inside?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个巨大的木箱。
它看起来完好无损……

{catname} 想知道里面会藏着什么宝藏？

options.name: smash

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} manages to crack open the crate and its contents spill out!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 设法撬开了木箱，里面的东西散落了一地！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Try as {he} might, {catname} fails to open the crate...

{catname} sulks away in shame. Cats love boxes!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
尽管{he}竭尽全力，
{catname} 还是没能打开木箱……

{catname} 羞愧地走开了。猫咪明明最喜欢箱子了！

EVENT_CRATE_REW1.en: {catname} manages to crack open the crate and its contents spill out!
EVENT_CRATE_REW1.zh: {catname} 设法撬开了木箱，里面的东西散落了一地！

EVENT_CRATE_REW2.en: A lavish can of wet cat food is inside! {catname} pries it open and enjoys the feast!
EVENT_CRATE_REW2.zh:
里面有一罐奢华的猫粮湿粮！
{catname} 撬开它，享受了一顿美餐！

EVENT_CRATE_REW3.en: Breaking the lid off the crate, {catname} uncovers the valuable object it was protecting!
EVENT_CRATE_REW3.zh: {catname} 掀开了木箱盖，发现了它保护着的贵重物品！

EVENT_CRATE_REW4.en:
Try as {he} might, {catname} fails to open the crate...

{catname} sulks away in shame. Cats love boxes!
EVENT_CRATE_REW4.zh:
尽管{he}竭尽全力，
{catname} 还是没能打开木箱……

{catname} 羞愧地走开了。猫咪明明最喜欢箱子了！

main_prompt_texts.en:
Amidst the vines and rocks a strange floating rock creature blocks the path forward.

The party must choose a weather option to proceed!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
在藤蔓和岩石之间，
一个奇怪的漂浮岩石生物挡住了前方的去路。

队伍必须选择一种天气方案才能继续前进！

options.name: w1

good_prompt_texts.en:
The cats look up in wonder as majestic balls of fire streak through the sky.

Their awe shifts to terror as the loud booms of meteors striking the ground reverberate through the air!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们惊奇地抬头看着雄伟的火球划过天空。

当陨石撞击地面的巨大轰鸣声在空气中回荡时，
它们的惊叹变成了恐惧！

EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORSHOWER_REW.en:
The cats look up in wonder as majestic balls of fire streak through the sky.

Their awe shifts to terror as the loud booms of meteors striking the ground reverberate through the air!
EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORSHOWER_REW.zh:
猫咪们惊奇地抬头看着雄伟的火球划过天空。

当陨石撞击地面的巨大轰鸣声在空气中回荡时，

A blinding light from the sky illuminates the landscape in terrifying clarity.

天空射下一道刺眼的光芒，
以恐怖的清晰度照亮了大地。

猫咪们在灼热的射线下畏缩着，
遮住了眼睛！

A blinding light from the sky illuminates the landscape in terrifying clarity.

遮住了眼睛！

good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们惊讶地看着周围的岩石开始在空中盘旋，

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a dark cave in the ground.

{He} can smell the musky odor of a large animal, perhaps resting within the den.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在地上发现了一个黑暗的洞穴。

{He}能闻到大型动物的麝香味，
也许它就在巢穴里休息。

options.name: investigate

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} enters the den and finds a sleepy bear and befriends it!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 进入巢穴，
发现了一只正在睡觉的熊并和它交了朋友！

bad_prompt_texts.en: A large angry bear comes charging out as {catname} approaches the den!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: 当 {catname} 靠近巢穴时，一只愤怒的大熊冲了出来！

EVENT_DARKDEN_REW1.en: {catname} enters the den and finds a sleepy bear and befriends it!
EVENT_DARKDEN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 进入巢穴，
发现了一只正在睡觉的熊并和它交了朋友！

EVENT_DARKDEN_REW2.en:
{catname} finds a strange glowing bear within the den. It saunters out and greets {him} with a very warm and furry hug.

{catname} feels {his} body shift as it takes on a bear-like appearance!
EVENT_DARKDEN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 在巢穴内发现了一只奇怪的发光熊。
它慢悠悠地走出来，
给了{him}一个非常温暖且毛茸茸的拥抱。

{catname} 感到身体发生了变化，
呈现出类似熊的外貌！

EVENT_DARKDEN_REW3.en: A large angry bear comes charging out as {catname} approaches the den!
EVENT_DARKDEN_REW3.zh: 当 {catname} 靠近巢穴时，一只愤怒的大熊冲了出来！

EVENT_DARKDEN_REW4.en:
{catname} enters the dimly lit den and pokes around...

The party hears a terrifying roar and {catname} sprints out of the cave, terrified, with a massive glowing bear in hot pursuit!
EVENT_DARKDEN_REW4.zh:
{catname} 进入昏暗的巢穴四处打探……

队伍听到了一声恐怖的怒吼，
{catname} 惊恐地从洞穴里冲了出来，
身后紧跟着一只巨大的发光熊！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en:

main_prompt_texts.en:
The ghastly figure of Death himself appears before {catname}!

[i]"Do you think you can so brazenly ignore me? I've seen you cheat death far too many times to be fair, and now I have come to reclaim what is rightfully mine... your soul!"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
死神那恐怖的身影出现在 {catname} 面前！

[i]“你以为你可以这样明目张胆地无视我吗？
我看过你太多次不公平地玩弄死神了，
现在我要收回理应属于我的东西……你的灵魂！
”[/i]

但我会饶你一命，
就这一次……仅仅是因为我知道如果我这么做了，
你会遭受更多的痛苦！”[/i]

bad_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"You can't talk your way out of this one! Your soul is mine!"[/i]

拿着这个信物，自豪地戴上它吧。

EVENT_DEATH_REW4.zh:
[i]“啊！你耍了我！好吧！
这次就算你命大。”[/i]

{catname} 对自己的成就露出了得意的笑容，
而死神则愤怒地拂袖而去。

EVENT_DEATH_REW5.en:
{catname} baits Death into betting more and more on the game until he bets his scythe.

[i]"This is unacceptable! You must be cheating somehow! Fine... I will just reclaim my scythe from your corpse later when you inevitably meet your demise!"[/i]
EVENT_DEATH_REW5.zh:
{catname} 引诱死神在游戏中越赌越大，
直到他押上了自己的镰刀。

[i]“这不可接受！你肯定在耍诈！
算了……等你将来不可避免地完蛋时，
我再去你的尸体上拿回我的镰刀！
”[/i]

good_prompt_texts.en:
While Death is still rambling on in an intimidating monologue, {catname} slips away.

[i]"Hey! Where'd that little brat run off to? You think you can escape me? I'll be back!"[/i]
good_prompt_texts.zh:
趁死神还在滔滔不绝地进行恐吓独白时，
{catname} 溜走了。

[i]“嘿！那个小混蛋跑哪去了？
你以为你能逃出我的手掌心？
我会回来的！”[/i]

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to dash off but Death swoops into his way.

[i]"No no no... You can't just scamper off and get away with this! Your demise is long overdue!"[/i]
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图冲出去，但死神猛地挡住了{he}的去路。

[i]“不，不，不……你不能就这么跑掉！
你早该没命了！”[/i]

EVENT_DEATH_REW8.en:
{catname} takes off before Death can react.

[i]"Damn it! Where did that cat just run off to? Whatever... I don't have time for chasing cats around all day."[/i]
EVENT_DEATH_REW8.zh:
{catname} 在死神反应过来之前就跑掉了。

[i]“该死！那只猫跑哪去了？
算了……我可没时间整天追着猫跑。
”[/i]

EVENT_DEATH_REW8_B.en:
{catname} takes off before Death can react.

[i]"Damn it! Why are these cats always running off? Which one was I supposed to kill this time? Whatever... I don't have time for these small fry brats."[/i]
EVENT_DEATH_REW8_B.zh:
{catname} 在死神反应过来之前就跑掉了。

[i]“该死！为什么这些猫总是在逃跑？
这次我本来该杀哪只来着？
算了……我没时间理会这些小毛贼。
”[/i]

EVENT_DEATH_REW9.en:
{catname} tries to dash off but Death swoops into his way.

[i]"No no no... You can't just scamper off and get away with this! Your demise is long overdue!"[/i]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} comes across the decaying remains of a long dead creature. It appears to move slightly, but {he} thinks it might have just been the numerous insects slowly devouring it.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 偶然发现了一个死去已久的生物的腐烂遗骸。
它似乎在轻微移动，
但{he}认为可能只是无数昆虫在慢慢吞噬它。

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname}'s eyes glint as {he} catches the scent of decay. Drawn by the odor {he} leans in and bites into the decaying flesh...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 捕捉到了腐烂的气味，
眼中闪烁着光芒。被气味吸引，
{he}凑上前去，
咬向那腐烂的血肉……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bites into the rotting carcass and swallows the flesh, still writhing with small things.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬进腐烂的尸骸，
吞下了还在被小虫子爬动的血肉。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW1.en: {catname}'s eyes glint as {he} catches the scent of decay. Drawn by the odor {he} leans in and bites into the decaying flesh...
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 捕捉到了腐烂的气味，
眼中闪烁着光芒。被气味吸引，
{he}凑上前去，
咬向那腐烂的血肉……

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW2.en: {catname} feasts on the ripe flesh, it's been a while since {his} last meal. {He} briefly feels an itching sensation, then a surge of energy!
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW2.zh:
{catname} 饱餐了一顿新鲜的血肉，
距离上一次进食已经有一段时间了。
{He}短暂地感觉到一阵瘙痒感，
随后是能量的涌动！

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW3.en: {catname} bites into the rotting carcass and swallows the flesh, still writhing with small things.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW3.zh:
{catname} 咬进腐烂的尸骸，
吞下了还在被小虫子爬动的血肉。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW4.en: {catname}'s primal instincts overcome {his} better judgement and he tears into the putrid flesh, ignoring the many creatures lurking within the decayed meat.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW4.zh:
{catname} 原始的本能战胜了理智，
撕咬着腐臭的血肉，
无视了潜伏在腐肉中的许多小生物。

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: As {catname} investigates the carcass, a large maggot crawls out, looking inquisitively at {him}. It seems friendly?
good_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 调查尸骸时，一只巨大的蛆虫爬了出来，
好奇地看着{him}。它似乎很友好？

bad_prompt_texts.en: As {catname} approaches the corpse, it shudders, as if letting out a final gasp of breath. Before {he} can react, the creature lashes out with a half decomposed limb and claws at {him}.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近尸体时，它颤抖了一下，
仿佛发出了最后的喘息。
还没等{he}反应过来，
这只生物就用半腐烂的肢体猛扑过来，
向{him}抓去。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW5.en: As {catname} investigates the carcass, a large maggot crawls out, looking inquisitively at {him}. It seems friendly?
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW5.zh:
当 {catname} 调查尸骸时，一只巨大的蛆虫爬了出来，
好奇地看着{him}。它似乎很友好？

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW6.en: Scavenging through the corpse, {catname} finds a small larva buried in the boney flesh.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW6.zh:
在尸体中搜寻时，
{catname} 发现了一只埋在骨肉中的小幼虫。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW7.en: As {catname} approaches the corpse, it shudders, as if letting out a final gasp of breath. Before {he} can react, the creature lashes out with a half decomposed limb and claws at {him}.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW7.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近尸体时，它颤抖了一下，
仿佛发出了最后的喘息。
还没等{he}反应过来，
这只生物就用半腐烂的肢体猛扑过来，
向{him}抓去。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW8.en: {catname} digs through the decomposing flesh and exposed bone, searching for something valuable. With {his} arm deep in the mass, {he} feels something latch onto {him}...
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW8.zh:
{catname} 挖掘着腐烂的血肉和裸露的白骨，
寻找有价值的东西。
当{he}的手臂深陷在肉堆中时，
{he}感觉到有什么东西钩住了{him}……

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} circles the carcass, nose wrinkling at the foul odor and does not see anything of note.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 绕着尸骸转，对难闻的气味皱起鼻子，
并没有看到任何值得注意的东西。

bad_prompt_texts.en: The pungent stench of the decaying carcass overwhelms {catname}'s senses. Unable to focus {he} turns away instead.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
腐烂尸骸刺鼻的恶臭压倒了 {catname} 的感官。
由于无法集中注意力，{he}转身走开了。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW10.en: {His} eyes alert, {catname} takes in every detail of the corpse. By studying the inverted flesh of bones and sinews, {catname} feels like {he} has a better grasp of anatomy.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW10.zh:
{catname} 目光警惕，观察着尸体的每一个细节。
通过研究这堆翻转的骨骼和筋腱，
{catname} 觉得自己对解剖学有了更好的理解。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW11.en: The pungent stench of the decaying carcass overwhelms {catname}'s senses. Unable to focus {he} turns away instead.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW11.zh:
腐烂尸骸刺鼻的恶臭压倒了 {catname} 的感官。
由于无法集中注意力，{he}转身走开了。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW12.en: {catname} extends a paw, prodding the carcass gently. As {he} does, a swarm of flies takes to the air and {catname} jumps back. It's too late however, as an opportunistic parasite latches on.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW12.zh:
{catname} 伸出脚爪，轻轻戳了戳尸骸。
就在此时，一群苍蝇飞向空中，
{catname} 吓得跳了回去。但为时已晚，
一个投机取巧的寄生虫已经粘了上来。

EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW9.en: {catname} circles the carcass, nose wrinkling at the foul odor and does not see anything of note.
EVENT_DECAYINGCARCASS_REW9.zh:
{catname} 绕着尸骸转，对难闻的气味皱起鼻子，
并没有看到任何值得注意的东西。

main_prompt_texts.en:
A large demonic statue sits before {catname}.

It clutches a large bowl in its hands and asks for a sacrifice!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一座巨大的恶魔雕像矗立在 {catname} 面前。

它手里捧着一个大碗，索要一份祭品！

options.name: damage_1

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} scratches {his} paw and releases some blood into the bowl...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 抓破了爪子，
往碗里滴了一些血……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} scratches {his} paw and releases some blood into the bowl...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 抓破了爪子，
往碗里滴了一些血……

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW1.en: {catname} scratches {his} paw and releases some blood into the bowl...
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW1.zh:
{catname} 抓破了爪子，
往碗里滴了一些血……

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW1_B.en: [i]"What an insult, you call that mere pittance a sacrifice?"[/i]
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW1_B.zh:
[i]“真是侮辱，
你把这点微不足道的施舍也叫作祭品吗？
”[/i]

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW2.en: Without hesitating, {catname} releases a drop of blood into the bowl...
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW2.zh:
{catname} 毫不犹豫地往碗里滴了一滴血…
…

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW2_B.en: [i]"At least you were quick about it."[/i] The terrifying figure looks pleased.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW2_B.zh:
[i]“至少你动作挺利索。
”[/i] 那个恐怖的形象看起来很满意。

options.name: damage_half

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} cuts {his} arm and allows the blood to flow into the bowl...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 划破了手臂，
让鲜血流进碗里……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname}'s blood flows into the bowl and {he} stumbles away, dizzy with weakness.

Nothing seems to happen.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 的血流进碗里，{he}摇摇晃晃地走开，
虚弱得感到头晕。

什么也没发生。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW3.en: {catname} cuts {his} arm and allows the blood to flow into the bowl...
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 划破了手臂，
让鲜血流进碗里……

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW3_B.en:
The demonic idol looks pleased!
[i]"Yes... more, more!"[/i]
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW3_B.zh:
恶魔神像看起来很满意！
[i]“没错……再多点，更多！”[/i]

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW4.en:
The demonic idol looks very pleased.

[i]"See? isn't that easy? You'll have to come back with the rest later..."[/i]
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW4.zh:
恶魔神像看起来非常满意。

[i]“瞧？这不是很简单吗？
剩下的你晚点得再拿回来……”[/i]

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW5.en:
{catname}'s blood flows into the bowl and {he} stumbles away, dizzy with weakness.

Nothing seems to happen.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 的血流进碗里，{he}摇摇晃晃地走开，
虚弱得感到头晕。

什么也没发生。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW6.en:
{catname}'s blood stains the ground and the bowl is full almost to the brim...

[i]Is that all you have to give? Insulting! I know you have much, much, more!"[/i]
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW6.zh:
{catname} 的鲜血染红了地面，
碗里几乎装满了……

[i]这就是你能给出的全部了吗？
真丢人！我知道你还有很多、
很多、更多！”[/i]

options.name: damage_full

label_texts.zh: 献血 (保留 1 点生命值)

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} nearly passes out as {he} drains {his} blood into the bowl...

[i]"Yes, give it all! Perfect!"[/i]  The demonic idol is grinning with pleasure at the sight of the full bowl of {catname}'s blood.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 把血放进碗里时，
{he}差点晕过去……

[i]“没错，全部交出来！太完美了！
”[/i] 看到装满 {catname} 鲜血的碗，
恶魔神像露出了愉悦的笑容。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname}'s blood drains into the bowl.

{He} feels only a little stronger for how much that hurt!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 的血排到了碗里。

相对于承受的痛苦，
{he}只感到变强了一点点！

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW5.en:
{catname}'s blood flows into the bowl and {he} stumbles away, dizzy with weakness.

Nothing seems to happen.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 的血流进碗里，{he}摇摇晃晃地走开，
虚弱得感到头晕。

什么也没发生。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW7.en:
{catname} nearly passes out as {he} drains {his} blood into the bowl...

[i]"Yes, give it all! Perfect!"[/i]  The demonic idol is grinning with pleasure at the sight of the full bowl of {catname}'s blood.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW7.zh:
当 {catname} 把血放进碗里时，
{he}差点晕过去……

[i]“没错，全部交出来！太完美了！
”[/i] 看到装满 {catname} 鲜血的碗，
恶魔神像露出了愉悦的笑容。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW8.en:
[i]"I am pleased by your commitment! A glorious sacrifice!"[/i]

The bowl of {catname}'s blood coagulates and shifts into a strange shape. The statue pours the bowl over {catname}'s head.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW8.zh:
[i]“我对你的忠诚很满意！
一次光荣的牺牲！”[/i]

碗里 {catname} 的血凝结成了一种奇怪的形状。
雕像将碗里的东西浇到了 {catname} 的头上。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW9.en:
{catname}'s blood drains into the bowl.

{He} feels only a little stronger for how much that hurt!
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW9.zh:
{catname} 的血排到了碗里。

相对于承受的痛苦，
{he}只感到变强了一点点！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} leaves the statue alone.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 没有理会雕像，径直离开了。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} leaves the statue alone.
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 没有理会雕像，径直离开了。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW10.zh: {catname} 没有理会雕像，径直离开了。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW11.en:
{catname} wants to leave but feels an overwhelming urge to please the statue...

{He} grits {his} teeth and shakes {his} mind free of the feeling.
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW11.zh:
{catname} 想要离开，
却感到一股强烈的
冲动想要取悦雕像……

{He}咬紧牙关，猛地摇头甩掉了这种感觉。

EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW12.en:
{catname} turns to leave...

[i]"How dare you deny me! What an insult! You think you can walk away unscathed?"[/i]
EVENT_DEMONICIDOL_REW12.zh:
{catname} 转身准备离开……

[i]“竟敢拒绝我！简直是侮辱！
你以为你可以毫发无伤地走掉吗？
”[/i]

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a dumpster. Oddly, there is a lock keeping it shut...

Why would you lock a dumpster?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个垃圾箱。奇怪的是，
有一把锁把它锁上了……

为什么要给垃圾箱上锁？

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a way to force the lock open and flings open the lid!

Leaping into the dumpster, {catname} rifles through the trash inside until {he} finds something valuable!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 找到了强行开锁的方法，
猛地掀开了盖子！

{catname} 跳进垃圾箱，翻找里面的垃圾，
直到{he}发现了一些有价值的东西！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} fiddles with the lock until {he} can break it open.

The cats look down in horror as they find the dumpster is full of cat skeletons! There are scratch marks all over the inside of the bin... What a terrifying way to go!

Not wanting to be the next victim, the party flees in terror!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 摆弄着那把锁，直到{he}把它砸开。

猫咪们惊恐地看着，
发现垃圾箱里装满了猫的骷髅！
垃圾箱内部到处都是抓痕……这种死法太可怕了！

猫群不想成为下一个受害者，
惊恐地逃跑了！
