{catname} finds a way to force the lock open and flings open the lid!

Leaping into the dumpster, {catname} rifles through the trash inside until {he} finds something valuable!
EVENT_LOCKEDDUMPSTER_REW1.zh:
{catname} 找到了强行开锁的方法，
猛地掀开了盖子！

{catname} 跳进垃圾箱，翻找里面的垃圾，
直到{he}发现了一些有价值的东西！

EVENT_LOCKEDDUMPSTER_REW2.en:
{catname} fiddles with the lock until {he} can break it open.

The cats look down in horror as they find the dumpster is full of cat skeletons! There are scratch marks all over the inside of the bin... What a terrifying way to go!

Not wanting to be the next victim, the party flees in terror!
EVENT_LOCKEDDUMPSTER_REW2.zh:
{catname} 摆弄着那把锁，直到{he}把它砸开。

猫咪们惊恐地看着，
发现垃圾箱里装满了猫的骷髅！
垃圾箱内部到处都是抓痕……这种死法太可怕了！

猫群不想成为下一个受害者，
惊恐地逃跑了！

EVENT_LOCKEDDUMPSTER_REW3.en:
The dumpster opens slightly and a skeletal hand reaches out, grabbing {catname}!

Horrific visions of the creature's terrible death torment {his} mind!
EVENT_LOCKEDDUMPSTER_REW3.zh:
垃圾箱微微打开，
一只骷髅手伸出来抓住了 {catname}！

这生物惨死时的恐怖景象折磨着{he}的心灵！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A dust storm ahead is blowing debris and sand everywhere.

Inside the dust storm {catname} sees the silhouette of a figure...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
前方的一场尘暴正把残骸和沙尘吹得到处都是。

在尘暴中，
{catname} 看到了一个身影的轮廓……

options.name: talk_to

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} calls out to the figure inside the storm.

It smiles, then turns and leaves.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 向风暴中的身影呼喊。

它微笑着，然后转身离开了。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} cries out to the figure in the storm, but {his} voice is lost in the torrent of wind.

The sand storm grows until it envelops the whole area!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 向风暴中的身影呼救，
但声音淹没在了狂风之中。

沙尘暴不断扩张，直到吞没了整个区域！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW1.en:
{catname} calls out to the figure inside the storm.

It smiles, then turns and leaves.
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW1.zh:
{catname} 向风暴中的身影呼喊。

它微笑着，然后转身离开了。

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW2.en:
The figure steps forward with a wide grin on its face...

The dust devil joins the party!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW2.zh:
那个身影带着灿烂的
笑容走上前来……

尘魔加入了队伍！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW3.en:
{catname} cries out to the figure in the storm, but {his} voice is lost in the torrent of wind.

The sand storm grows until it envelops the whole area!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW3.zh:
{catname} 向风暴中的身影呼救，
但声音淹没在了狂风之中。

沙尘暴不断扩张，直到吞没了整个区域！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW4.en: The figure inside the storm approaches and attacks!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW4.zh: 风暴中的身影走近并动了攻击！

options.name: run

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} escapes the cyclone of wind and dust!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 逃离了风尘旋涡！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to flee but the sand storm engulfs the area in never ending torrents of wind!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图逃跑，
但沙尘暴化作永不休止的
狂风巨浪吞没了整个区域！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW5.en: {catname} escapes the cyclone of wind and dust!

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW6.en:
Sand stings {catname}'s face as the wind gusts in a fervor around {him}.

{catname} runs like the wind and escapes!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW6.zh:
当狂风在{him}周围肆虐时，
风沙刺痛了 {catname} 的脸。

{catname} 像风一样奔跑并逃离了那里！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW7.en: {catname} tries to flee but the sand storm engulfs the area in never ending torrents of wind!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图逃跑，
但沙尘暴化作永不休止的
狂风巨浪吞没了整个区域！

EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW8.en:
{catname} turns to run but it is too late...

The figure inside the storm leaps forward and attacks!
EVENT_DUSTSTORM_REW8.zh:
{catname} 转头想跑，但已经太迟了……

风暴中的身影跃上前去并发动了攻击！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a dying fetus, quivering in fright and pain.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个垂死的胎儿，
正因为惊恐和痛楚而颤抖着。

options.name: comfort

good_prompt_texts.en:
Showing pity for the small thing, {catname} comforts it.

The fetus is pleased and joins the cats!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 对这个小生命心生怜悯，安抚了它。

胎儿很高兴并加入了猫咪们！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The fetus rejects {catname}'s attempts at comforting it, getting angry instead!

It attacks!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
胎儿拒绝了 {catname} 的安抚，反而变得愤怒！

它发动了攻击！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW1.en:
Showing pity for the small thing, {catname} comforts it.

The fetus is pleased and joins the cats!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 对这个小生命心生怜悯，安抚了它。

胎儿很高兴并加入了猫咪们！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW2.en: {catname}'s affection calms the fetus and it rests peacefully. Karma up!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW2.zh:
{catname} 的关爱让胎儿平静下来，
它安详地休息了。业力提升！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW3.en:
The fetus rejects {catname}'s attempts at comforting it, getting angry instead!

It attacks!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW3.zh:
胎儿拒绝了 {catname} 的安抚，反而变得愤怒！

它发动了攻击！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW4.en:
{catname} tries to comfort the fetus, but it bites {him}!

{catname}'s mouth deforms into a strange shape...
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图安抚胎儿，但它咬了{him}！

{catname} 的嘴部畸变成了奇怪的形状……

options.name: patch_up

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} deftly patches up the fetus, saving its life!

It is grateful and joins in for the next battle!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 灵巧地为胎儿包扎了伤口，
救了它一命！

它心存感激，并加入了下一场战斗！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to mend the fetus's wounds, but it thinks {he} is attacking and desperately swings at {catname}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图修补胎儿的伤口，
但它以为{he}在攻击，于是拼命向 {catname} 挥击！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW5.en:
{catname} deftly patches up the fetus, saving its life!

It is grateful and joins in for the next battle!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW5.zh:
{catname} 灵巧地为胎儿包扎了伤口，
救了它一命！

它心存感激，并加入了下一场战斗！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW6.en:
As {catname} patches the fetus's wounds, it looks up gratefully at {him}.

The fetus joins {catname} on the adventure!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW6.zh:
当 {catname} 包扎胎儿的伤口时，
它感激地抬头看着{him}。

胎儿加入了 {catname} 的冒险！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW7.en: {catname} tries to mend the fetus's wounds, but it thinks {he} is attacking and desperately swings at {catname}!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图修补胎儿的伤口，
但它以为{he}在攻击，于是拼命向 {catname} 挥击！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW8.en: Not used to this kind of pressure, {catname} fumbles and accidentally stabs {himself}!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW8.zh:
由于不习惯这种压力，
{catname} 笨手笨脚地不小心刺伤了{himself}！

options.name: put_out_of_misery

label_texts.en: Put it out of its misery

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} crushes the fetus's skull. It dies.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 捏碎了胎儿的颅骨。它死了。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} crushes the small fetus, killing it instantly.
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 捏碎了这个小胎儿，瞬间杀死了它。

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW10.en: {catname} squishes the fetus and its guts spill out!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW10.zh: {catname} 压扁了胎儿，它的内脏流了一地！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW11.en: {catname} crushes the small fetus, killing it instantly.
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW11.zh: {catname} 捏碎了这个小胎儿，瞬间杀死了它。

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW12.en:
{catname} hears a loud thumping and sliding sound and looks up in horror!

The fetus's mom is coming, and it looks angry!
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW12.zh:
{catname} 听到一声巨大的重击和滑动声，
惊恐地抬起头！

胎儿的妈妈来了，它看起来气疯了！

EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW9.en: {catname} crushes the fetus's skull. It dies.
EVENT_DYINGFETUS_REW9.zh: {catname} 捏碎了胎儿的颅骨。它死了。

main_prompt_texts.en:
Molten, glowing, radioactive waste slowly oozes from a fissure in the wall.

Even from this distance {catname} can feel a strange heat radiating from the elephant's foot on {his} soft skin.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
熔化的、
发光的放射性废料正从墙壁的缝隙中缓慢渗出。

即使在这个距离，
{catname} 也能感觉到这团“象脚”散发出的
古怪热量灼烧着{he}柔软的皮肤。

options.name: move_closer

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} lets out a yelp as the radiation pierces {his} body and mutates {him}.

And yet... something alluring about the hot feeling throughout {catname}'s body makes {him} want to stay longer...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
身体被辐射刺穿而突变，
{catname} 发出了一声尖叫。

然而……流向 {catname} 全身的
那种灼热感有着某种诱人的魔力，
让{him}想停留得更久一些……

bad_prompt_texts.en: The heat from the radiation is so hot {catname}'s skin begins to burn from the inside out!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
辐射产生的热量如此之高，
{catname} 的皮肤开始由内而外地燃烧！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW1.en:
{catname} lets out a yelp as the radiation pierces {his} body and mutates {him}.

And yet... something alluring about the hot feeling throughout {catname}'s body makes {him} want to stay longer...
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW1.zh:
身体被辐射刺穿而突变，

然而……流向 {catname} 全身的
那种灼热感有着某种诱人的魔力，
让{him}想停留得更久一些……

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW2.en: The heat emanating from the molten waste feels soothing to {catname}, even as it mutates {his} body!
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW2.zh:
从熔融废料中散发出的热量让 {catname} 感到很舒服，
即便它正在使身体发生突变！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW3.en: The heat from the radiation is so hot {catname}'s skin begins to burn from the inside out!
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW3.zh:
辐射产生的热量如此之高，
{catname} 的皮肤开始由内而外地燃烧！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW4.en:
The radiation blankets {catname}'s body and {he} can feel {himself} begin to boil from the inside out!

{catname} flees from the room, vomiting from a sickness deep in {his} belly.
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW4.zh:
辐射笼罩了 {catname} 的身体，
{he}能感觉到{himself}开始由内而外地沸腾！

{catname} 逃离了房间，
因腹部深处的剧烈恶心而呕吐不止。

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: The hot tingly feeling persists for a short while after leaving, but otherwise {catname} feels unaffected.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
离开后那种灼热刺痛感又持续了一会儿，
除此之外 {catname} 感觉并无大碍。

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW5.en: The hot tingly feeling persists for a short while after leaving, but otherwise {catname} feels unaffected.
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOT_REW5.zh:
离开后那种灼热刺痛感又持续了一会儿，
除此之外 {catname} 感觉并无大碍。

Heat from the elephant's foot now permeates every cell of {catname}'s body...

{catname} imagines this might be what it feels like to be nestled in {his} mother's womb.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
来自象脚的热量现在渗透进 {catname} 身体的
每一个细胞……

{catname} 想象着这或许就是依偎在母亲子宫里的感觉。

options.name: move_closer

good_prompt_texts.en: The tingling on {catname}'s skin erupts as {his} body mutates into a strange new form...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 皮肤上的刺痛感爆发了，
随后身体突变成了某种怪异的
新形态……

bad_prompt_texts.en: The tingling heat turns to pain and {catname} whimpers as {he} begins to burn alive!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
刺痛的热感转变为剧痛，
随着{he}开始被活活烧灼，{catname} 发出了哀鸣！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW1.en: The tingling on {catname}'s skin erupts as {his} body mutates into a strange new form...

{catname} 皮肤上的刺痛感爆发了，

新形态……

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW2.en: A euphoric sensation washes over {catname}. Now totally immersed in the sensation, {his} overstimulated mind craves more... more!
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW2.zh:
一种欣快感席卷了 {catname}。
由于完全沉浸在这种感觉中，
过度兴奋的大脑渴望更多……更多！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW3.en: The tingling heat turns to pain and {catname} whimpers as {he} begins to burn alive!
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW3.zh:
刺痛的热感转变为剧痛，
随着{he}开始被活活烧灼，{catname} 发出了哀鸣！

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW4.en: Every cell in {catname}'s body screams in agony and {he} stumbles away from the room in a daze...
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW4.zh:
{catname} 体内的每一个细胞都在痛苦中尖叫，
{he}恍惚地从房间里跌跌撞撞地走开
……

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en:
Coming to {his} senses, {catname} flees from the room!

Small dots sparkle in {catname}'s vision, like a sea of small stars being born then dying in the same instant.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 恢复了理智，逃离了房间！

点点星光在 {catname} 的视野中闪烁，
就像一片星海在同一瞬间诞生又毁灭。

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTCLOSER_REW5.en:
Coming to {his} senses, {catname} flees from the room!

Small dots sparkle in {catname}'s vision, like a sea of small stars being born then dying in the same instant.

main_prompt_texts.en:
Where is {he}? Is this hell? Is this heaven?

{His} brain is boiling yet {catname} wonders if {he} can hold out... just a little longer!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{he}在哪里？这里是地狱吗？还是天堂？

大脑正在沸腾，
但 {catname} 想知道{he}是否能再坚持……哪怕一会儿！

options.name: withstand

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} stands transfixed for several moments longer facing the glowing shrine, sweat drenching {his} fur.

{He} turns away at last, {his} body ravished and twisted by the radiation.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 对着发光的祭坛又站了好一会儿，
汗水浸透了皮毛。

{He}终于转身离开，
身体已被辐射摧残得扭曲不堪。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} can no longer feel the heat. {He} IS heat. 

{catname} finally manages to turn away from the glowing heap, a small cloud of steam following in {his} wake.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 再也感觉不到热量了。{He}本身就是热量。

{catname} 终于设法离开了那个发光的堆块，
身后留下了一小团蒸汽。

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTEVENCLOSER_REW2.en: Time seems to drag on, and {catname} is lost in the overwhelming sensations of heat, death, and power!
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTEVENCLOSER_REW2.zh:
时间仿佛变得漫长，{catname} 迷失在热量、
死亡和力量交织的压倒性快感中！

{catname} can no longer feel the heat. {He} IS heat. 

{catname} finally manages to turn away from the glowing heap, a small cloud of steam following in {his} wake.

EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTEVENCLOSER_REW4.en:
Sweat and blood are steaming out of {catname}'s fur like water off a hot iron. {catname} slumps to the floor unconscious, {his} body ravaged by the radiation. 

The other cats hastily drag {him} away to safety.
EVENT_ELEPHANTSFOOTEVENCLOSER_REW4.zh:
汗水和鲜血正从 {catname} 的皮毛中蒸发出来，
就像水滴落在烧红的铁上。
{catname} 因身体受到辐射严重破坏而瘫倒在地，
失去了知觉。

其他的猫匆忙地将{him}拖到了安全的地方。

漫步进后面寒冷、潮湿的房间里，

main_prompt_texts.zh: 一只新猫开始跟随队伍！

EVENT_ACAT_REW1.en: A new cat starts following the party!
EVENT_ACAT_REW1.zh: 一只新猫开始跟随队伍！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a small, helpless fetus lying on the floor.

It stares up at {him} with large, round eyes.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在地上发现了一个微小而无助的胎儿。

它睁着圆圆的大眼睛盯着{him}。

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: The cats chow down on the fetus. It is delicious!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们吃掉了这个胎儿。
味道好极了！

{catname} eats the fetus, but it tastes vile!

{catname} 中毒了！

{He} feels invigorated!

饱餐了一顿鲜嫩的血肉……

{He}感到精力充沛！

{catname} finds a grotesque mound of guts heaped into a large pile...

good_prompt_texts.en:
The whole party joins in on the feast! The guts taste tangy, but they go down easily.

Sometime later the cats feel a bit ill…

The cats are poisoned!

{catname} discovers something amazing hidden among the guts...

A small doodie! {He} hides {his} findings from the party. Such a precious turd will no doubt cause jealousy!
EVENT_GUTPILE_REW12.zh:
{catname} 在内脏中发现了令人惊奇的
东西……

一个小粑粑！{He}向队伍隐瞒了{he}的发现。
如此珍贵的粪便无疑会引起嫉妒！

EVENT_GUTPILE_REW9.en: {catname} looks around in the pile of guts and finds some edible scraps.
EVENT_GUTPILE_REW9.zh:
{catname} 在内脏堆里四处查看，
发现了一些可食用的残羹剩饭。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a hairball made of chunks of fur and hair.

It has small bones sticking out of it. It's honestly quite disgusting... Or is it?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个由毛皮和头发组成的毛球。

里面还插着一些小骨头。老实说，
这看起来相当恶心……或者另有乾坤？

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} takes a bite of the grey mass.

It's crunchy and bits of fur get stuck in {his} teeth.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 对着那一团灰色的东西咬了一口。

它脆生生的，有些毛皮卡在了牙缝里。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} starts eating the hairball, and starts gagging involuntarily. {He} starts to feel sick...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 开始吃起毛球，并不由自主地开始作呕。
{He}开始感到不适……

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW1.en:
{catname} takes a bite of the grey mass.

It's crunchy and bits of fur get stuck in {his} teeth.
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW1.zh:
{catname} 对着那一团灰色的东西咬了一口。

它脆生生的，有些毛皮卡在了牙缝里。

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW2.en: {catname} bites into the lumpy ball. There is a raw primal quality to it that makes it a very enjoyable experience!
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW2.zh:
{catname} 咬了一口那个疙疙瘩瘩的球。
它带有一种原始的力量感，
让这次体验非常享受！

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW3.en: {catname} starts eating the hairball, and starts gagging involuntarily. {He} starts to feel sick...
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 开始吃起毛球，并不由自主地开始作呕。
{He}开始感到不适……

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW4.en:
This might just be the worst thing {catname} has ever put in {his} mouth, and there has been a lot!

The hairball is both crunchy and mushy. {catname} thinks {he} might never eat again.
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW4.zh:
这可能是 {catname} 吃过最糟糕的东西了，
尽管{he}以前吃过的脏东西已经够多了！

这个毛球又脆又烂。
{catname} 觉得自己可能永远不想再吃东西了。

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} examines the hairball and feels something hard and metal buried inside...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查了毛球，
感觉到里面埋着某种坚硬的
金属物……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} picks up the hairball and pulls it apart, trying to wear it as a sweater.

The other cats don't have the heart to tell {him} how absolutely hideous it looks!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拿起毛球并将其撕开，
试图把它当毛衣穿。

其他的猫不忍心告诉{him}这看起来简直丑爆了！

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW5.en: {catname} examines the hairball and feels something hard and metal buried inside...
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 检查了毛球，
感觉到里面埋着某种坚硬的
金属物……

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW6.en:
The dim light must have tricked {him}!

{catname} stares in awe at the hairball, which is made entirely of gold!
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW6.zh:
昏暗的光线一定欺骗了{him}！

{catname} 敬畏地盯着那个毛球，
它居然完全是由金子做的！

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW7.en:
{catname} picks up the hairball and pulls it apart, trying to wear it as a sweater.

The other cats don't have the heart to tell {him} how absolutely hideous it looks!
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW7.zh:
{catname} 拿起毛球并将其撕开，
试图把它当毛衣穿。

其他的猫不忍心告诉{him}这看起来简直丑爆了！

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW8.en:
{catname} grabs the hairball and tries putting it on {his} head like a hat.

Something slimy moves inside it and bites {him}!
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW8.zh:
{catname} 抓起毛球，试着把它像帽子一样戴在头上。

里面有某种粘糊糊的东西动了一下，
并咬了{him}一口！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: That thing looks gross. {catname} leaves it alone.
good_prompt_texts.zh: 那东西看起来很恶心。{catname} 没有去碰它。

EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW9.en: That thing looks gross. {catname} leaves it alone.
EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW9.zh: 那东西看起来很恶心。{catname} 没有去碰它。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_HAIRBALL_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
Brambles begin rapidly growing all around the cats...

Something about the strange bulbs growing amidst the thorns is very off-putting!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
荆棘开始在猫咪周围迅速生长…
…

长在荆棘丛中那些奇怪的
球茎让人感到非常不舒服！

EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW2.en:
A blinding light from the sky illuminates the landscape in terrifying clarity.

The cats cower and cover their eyes from the scorching rays!
EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW2.zh:
天空射下一道刺眼的光芒，
以恐怖的清晰度照亮了大地。

猫咪们在灼热的射线下畏缩着，
遮住了眼睛！

EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW3.en: The cats look on in bewilderment as rocks around them begin hovering in the air and flying in every direction!
EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW3.zh:
猫咪们惊讶地看着周围的岩石开始在空中盘旋，
并向四面八方飞去！

EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW4.en: The air shimmers in vibrant hues and the cats retch as ripples in the air cause their bodies to warp and mutate!
EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW4.zh:
空气闪烁着鲜艳的色调，
随着空气中的涟漪导致猫咪们的身体扭曲和突变，
它们开始干呕！

EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW5.en:
Strange eggs begin to pop up all over the ground...

The cats look at them inquisitively, not sure what to do.
EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW5.zh:
地面上到处开始冒出奇怪的
蛋……

猫咪们好奇地看着它们，
不知道该怎么办。

EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW6.en:
Brambles begin rapidly growing all around the cats...

Something about the strange bulbs growing amidst the thorns is very off-putting!
EVENT_CRATERWEATHER_REW6.zh:
荆棘开始在猫咪周围迅速生长…
…

长在荆棘丛中那些奇怪的
球茎让人感到非常不舒服！

EVENT_HAPPENING_ACIDRAIN_REW.en:
A light rain begins to fall around the cats. At first they are not worried...

But it is raining acid! The cats howl as it burns them!
EVENT_HAPPENING_ACIDRAIN_REW.zh:
天空中下起了小雨。
起初猫咪们并没在意……

但那是酸雨！被灼烧的猫咪们发出了嚎叫！

EVENT_HAPPENING_ALIENINVASION_REW.en:
Aliens are invading!?!

The cats look around in bewilderment as flying saucers whiz by and little strange people hop out, firing lasers!
EVENT_HAPPENING_ALIENINVASION_REW.zh:
外星人入侵了！？！

当飞碟呼啸而过，
奇形怪状的小人跳出来发射激光时，
猫咪们困惑地环顾四周！

EVENT_HAPPENING_BIRDEMIC_REW.en:
The sky appears to darken as numerous birds circle above.

The cats look around them in surprise as birds begin to land everywhere!
EVENT_HAPPENING_BIRDEMIC_REW.zh:
随着无数鸟类在上方盘旋，
天空似乎变暗了。

当鸟儿开始落在各处时，
猫咪们惊讶地环顾四周！

EVENT_HAPPENING_BIRDMIGRATION_REW.en:
Flocks of birds travel above in the sky...

Some land on nearby perches, resting for a moment before continuing on their migration.
EVENT_HAPPENING_BIRDMIGRATION_REW.zh:
成群的鸟儿在天空中穿行……

有些落在附近的栖息处，
在继续迁徙前稍作休息。

EVENT_HAPPENING_BLESSEDDAY_REW.en: A radiant light fills the surroundings with holy energy, and the cats feel invigorated by its warm embrace.
EVENT_HAPPENING_BLESSEDDAY_REW.zh:
一束灿烂的光芒在周围充满了神圣能量，
猫咪们因这温暖的拥抱而感到精神焕发。

EVENT_HAPPENING_BLIZZARD_REW.en:
A violent frigid wind sweeps through, chilling the cats to their core!

The cats brace themselves against the frozen torrent, even as snow plasters against their faces and thunder rumbles in the air!
EVENT_HAPPENING_BLIZZARD_REW.zh:
一股猛烈的刺骨寒风席卷而过，
将猫咪们冻了个透心凉！

即使雪花拍打在脸上，
雷声在空气中隆隆作响，
猫咪们也在努力顶着冰冷的激流坚持着！

EVENT_HAPPENING_BUTTERFLIES_REW.en:
The cats can't believe their eyes!

Swarms of beautiful butterflies fill the air, landing on every surface in a blanket of color!
EVENT_HAPPENING_BUTTERFLIES_REW.zh:
猫咪们简直不敢相信自己的眼睛！

成群美丽的蝴蝶飞满了天空，
落在每一处表面上，
像地毯一样五彩斑斓！

EVENT_HAPPENING_COCKROACHES_REW.en:
Swarms of cockroaches ripple like waves across the surface of the ground!

The cats yelp in terror as the hard little creatures bite their paws and try to climb their legs!
EVENT_HAPPENING_COCKROACHES_REW.zh:
成群的蟑螂像波浪一样在地面上翻涌！

当这些坚硬的小生物咬住猫咪们的
肉垫并试图爬上它们的腿时，
猫咪们吓得大叫起来！

EVENT_HAPPENING_CRAZYWEATHER_REW.en:
The weather is going crazy! First rain, then snow, then lightning!

The cats don't know what is going on, but if they were back safe at home it might be fun to watch from a window.
EVENT_HAPPENING_CRAZYWEATHER_REW.zh:
天气变得疯狂了！先是下雨，
然后下雪，最后是打雷！

猫咪们不知道发生了什么，
但如果它们平安待在家里，
从窗户往外看可能会很有趣。

EVENT_HAPPENING_DRUGAWARENESS_REW.en: The cats seemed to have stumbled into a drug awareness day party!
EVENT_HAPPENING_DRUGAWARENESS_REW.zh: 猫咪们似乎偶然闯入了一个禁毒宣传日派对！

EVENT_HAPPENING_EARTHQUAKE_REW.en:
Tremors shake the ground beneath the cats' feet!

Rocks and debris tumble down around them, dislodged from the violent shaking!
EVENT_HAPPENING_EARTHQUAKE_REW.zh:
地面在猫咪脚下震颤！

剧烈的摇晃使得岩石和残骸从它们周围滚落下来！

EVENT_HAPPENING_ERUPTION_REW.en: Hot lava flows from a huge mound not far away! Molten debris flies through the air and dark clouds billow forth from the Earth's maw!
EVENT_HAPPENING_ERUPTION_REW.zh:
滚烫的熔岩从不远处的大堆中流出！
熔化的碎屑在空中飞舞，
黑云从大地的巨口中滚滚而出！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FIREFLIES_REW.en: Swarms of fireflies surround the cats, their bioluminescent lights dancing in a beautiful symphony of floating stars!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FIREFLIES_REW.zh:
成群的萤火虫环绕在猫咪身边，
它们的生物光交织成一支如漂浮星辰般的
唯美交响曲！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FIRESTORM_REW.en:
Walls of fire rapidly spring up, blocking the way!

The cats hurry to navigate the burning landscape, fleeing the fury of a firestorm!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FIRESTORM_REW.zh:
火焰之墙迅速升起，挡住了去路！

猫咪们急忙逃离火焰风暴的愤怒，
在燃烧的景观中穿行！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FLASHFLOOD_REW.en:
A torrent of water dumps from the sky and begins pooling in large pools around the cats!

The flash flood claims more and more of the terrain as the cats run to high ground!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FLASHFLOOD_REW.zh:
一股洪流从天而降，
开始在猫咪周围汇聚成一个个大水潭！

当猫咪们跑向高处时，
山洪淹没了越来越多的地面！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FLIES_REW.en:
Swarms of flies fill the air!

The cats swat at them and shake their tails but there are too many of them to stop!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FLIES_REW.zh:
空气中飞满了蝇群！

猫咪们拍打着它们，摇晃着尾巴，
但苍蝇实在是太多了，根本挡不住！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FOG_REW.en: A dense fog starts rolling in. The cats can barely see in front of them!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FOG_REW.zh: 浓雾开始弥漫。猫咪们几乎看不清前方！

EVENT_HAPPENING_FROGS_REW.en:
It's raining frogs!?!

The slimy little fellows bounce down like water balloons, and the air is filled with the sound of their ribbits!
EVENT_HAPPENING_FROGS_REW.zh:
下青蛙雨了！？！

这些粘乎乎的小家伙像水球一样跳了下来，
空气中充满了它们的呱呱声！

EVENT_HAPPENING_HAUNTEDNIGHT_REW.en:
Oh, what a horrible night to have a curse...

Ethereal cries of ghostly figures fill the air!
EVENT_HAPPENING_HAUNTEDNIGHT_REW.zh:
噢，
遭受诅咒的夜晚多么可怕……

空气中充斥着幽灵的空灵哀号！

EVENT_HAPPENING_HEATWAVE_REW.en:
A brutal heatwave settles in the air...

The cats sluggishly plod on, their warm fur exacerbating their misery.
EVENT_HAPPENING_HEATWAVE_REW.zh:
一股残酷的
热浪笼罩在空气中……

猫咪们吃力地向前走着，
它们温暖的毛皮加剧了这种痛苦。

EVENT_HAPPENING_HEAVYRAIN_REW.en: Dark clouds churn above as a heavy rain begins to pelt down, drenching the cats in a constant deluge.
EVENT_HAPPENING_HEAVYRAIN_REW.zh:
乌云在上方翻滚，一场大雨开始倾盆而下，
猫咪们被持续不断的洪水浸透了。

EVENT_HAPPENING_HUNTINGBOUNTIES_REW.en:
Gunshots ring out in the distance followed by an unnerving quiet...

Someone is hunting bounties... the cats had better be careful!
EVENT_HAPPENING_HUNTINGBOUNTIES_REW.zh:
远处传来枪声，
随后是令人不安的死寂……

有人正在进行赏金狩猎……猫咪们最好小心点！

EVENT_HAPPENING_HUNTINGSEASON_REW.en:
The cats notice an abundance of bear traps laid out.

It must be hunting season, they had better watch their step!
EVENT_HAPPENING_HUNTINGSEASON_REW.zh:
猫咪们注意到周围布满了捕兽夹。

现在肯定是狩猎季节，
它们最好留意脚下！

EVENT_HAPPENING_HURRICANE_REW.en: A terrible hurricane rips through the area, tossing everything up in the air and into a violent turmoil of wind and water!
EVENT_HAPPENING_HURRICANE_REW.zh:
一场可怕的飓风横扫了该地区，
将所有东西都抛向空中，
卷入风和水的剧烈动荡中！

EVENT_HAPPENING_INFESTATION_REW.en: Swarms of small insects darken the sky, latching onto and infesting everything in sight!
EVENT_HAPPENING_INFESTATION_REW.zh:
成群的小昆虫遮蔽了天空，
附着在并寄生在视线所及的所有东西上！

EVENT_HAPPENING_JUDGEMENTDAY_REW.en:
Blinding beams of holy light from the heavens begin striking the ground nearby, obliterating everything caught in their deadly rays.

It is judgment day!
EVENT_HAPPENING_JUDGEMENTDAY_REW.zh:
来自天堂的刺眼圣光光束开始击中附近的地面，
消灭了所有被困在致命光线下的东西。

审判日到了！

EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORNADO_REW.en: A giant meteornado engulfs the area! Large boulders and stones are swept up, pelting everything still foolishly standing in the path of the maelstrom!
EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORNADO_REW.zh:
一场巨大的陨石龙卷吞没了该地区！
大石块和岩石被席卷而起，
猛烈撞击着所有还傻站在这场大风暴路径上的
东西！

EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORSHOWER_REW.en:
The cats look up in wonder as majestic balls of fire streak through the sky.

Their awe shifts to terror as the loud booms of meteors striking the ground reverberate through the air!
EVENT_HAPPENING_METEORSHOWER_REW.zh:
猫咪们惊奇地抬头看着雄伟的火球划过天空。

当陨石撞击地面的巨大轰鸣声在空气中回荡时，
它们的惊叹变成了恐惧！

EVENT_HAPPENING_MINEFIELD_REW.en:
Large craters in the ground are scattered about, and the smell of sulfur is in the air.

The cats have stepped into a minefield!
EVENT_HAPPENING_MINEFIELD_REW.zh:
地面上散布着巨大的坑洞，
空气中弥漫着硫磺的味道。

猫咪们踏入了一片地雷区！

EVENT_HAPPENING_OILSPILL_REW.en: Large steel drums lay strewn about, their inky contents spilled out onto the ground!
EVENT_HAPPENING_OILSPILL_REW.zh:
周围散落着巨大的钢桶，
它们那漆黑的液体洒满了地面！

EVENT_HAPPENING_OVERGROWTH_REW.en:
Tall grass and brambles are thick here!

The cats push their way through the long grass, trying desperately not to get caught in the thorny branches.
EVENT_HAPPENING_OVERGROWTH_REW.zh:
这里长满了高草和荆棘！

猫咪们费力地穿过长草，
拼命想不被带刺的树枝挂住。

EVENT_HAPPENING_PAYDAY_REW.en: It's payday! Various coins lay scattered about, carelessly dropped in a rush to spend them!
EVENT_HAPPENING_PAYDAY_REW.zh:
今天是发薪日！各种金币散落一地，
肯定是在急着花掉它们的时候不小心掉的！

EVENT_HAPPENING_PIPEBLOCKAGE_REW.en:
A nearby sewer pipe erupts, triggering a chain reaction of other pipes nearby! Sewage sprays into the air, piling into large mounds of sludge.

Stench from the freed blockage permeates the air like thick molasses accosting the cats' sensitive noses...
EVENT_HAPPENING_PIPEBLOCKAGE_REW.zh:
附近的下水道管爆裂，
触发了附近其他管道的连锁反应！
污水喷向空中，堆成巨大的污泥堆。

疏通后的臭味像浓稠的糖蜜一样弥漫在空气中，
袭击着猫咪们敏感的鼻子……

EVENT_HAPPENING_RAIN_REW.en: The sky darkens with clouds and raindrops drizzle down, forming small puddles on the ground and wetting the cats' soft fur.
EVENT_HAPPENING_RAIN_REW.zh:
乌云笼罩了天空，雨滴淅淅沥沥地落下，
在地上形成了一个个小水洼，
弄湿了猫咪们柔软的毛皮。

EVENT_HAPPENING_RESTLESSDEAD_REW.en: Patches of earth begin to shake around the cats, as rotting paws reach up from beneath the ground! The dead are restless!
EVENT_HAPPENING_RESTLESSDEAD_REW.zh:
猫咪周围的泥土开始晃动，
腐烂的爪子从地底下伸了出来！
亡灵躁动不安！

EVENT_HAPPENING_ROBOTS_REW.en:
Noisy terrible machines are rolling around, snapping their strange metal arms at everything in sight!

A robot uprising has begun!
EVENT_HAPPENING_ROBOTS_REW.zh:
嘈杂可怕的机器正到处乱窜，
向视线内的一切挥舞着它们奇怪的金属臂！

机器人起义开始了！

EVENT_HAPPENING_SANDSTORM_REW.en: A thick sandstorm kicks up. Small grains of sand, travelling at furious speeds through the air, sting the cats through their fur!
EVENT_HAPPENING_SANDSTORM_REW.zh:
漫天黄沙扬起。
细小的沙粒在空中以极快的速度飞驰，
刺痛了猫咪们毛皮下的身体！

EVENT_HAPPENING_SNOW_REW.en:
The temperature suddenly drops and thick snow begins falling around the cats.

At first the cats swat at the pretty little snowflakes, but as the snow piles up the party decides they liked it much better when it was warm out.
EVENT_HAPPENING_SNOW_REW.zh:
气温骤降，厚厚的降雪开始在猫咪周围落下。

起初猫咪们还会拍打漂亮的小雪花，
但随着积雪越来越厚，
探险队觉得还是暖和的时候更好些。

EVENT_HAPPENING_SPIKES_REW.en:
Strange thorns start growing out of everything...

The cats look down in astonishment as thin barbs stick out from beneath their own fur!

It will be a while until their next bath!
EVENT_HAPPENING_SPIKES_REW.zh:
所有东西上都长出了奇怪的
荆棘……

猫咪们惊讶地低下头，
发现自己的毛皮下竟然伸出了细细的倒钩！

看来离下一次洗澡还有很长时间！

EVENT_HAPPENING_STEALTHMISSION_REW.en:
There is a strange stillness here...

The silence accentuates every step and the cats move as stealthily as they can!
EVENT_HAPPENING_STEALTHMISSION_REW.zh:
这里有一种奇怪的寂静……

这种寂静突显了每一个脚步，
猫咪们尽可能轻手轻脚地移动！

EVENT_HAPPENING_THEHOLLOWING_REW.en:
Strange muffled cries fill the night... the howls and screams of the dead, awakened from their slumber...

The Hollowing has begun!
EVENT_HAPPENING_THEHOLLOWING_REW.zh:
奇怪而低沉的
叫声充满了夜晚……那是被从沉睡中惊醒的
亡灵的嚎叫和尖叫……

活尸化开始了！

EVENT_HAPPENING_THUNDERSTORM_REW.en: The distant rumbling of thunder quickly turns into a full lightning storm, as rain pours down and fierce winds blow the cats off their now soggy feet!
EVENT_HAPPENING_THUNDERSTORM_REW.zh:
远处的雷声很快演变成了一场完整的雷暴，
大雨倾盆而下，
狂风把猫咪们从湿透的脚下吹得东倒西歪！

EVENT_HAPPENING_TORNADOES_REW.en:
Violent tornadoes form from distant air currents high above!

The windy tendrils reach down like fingers of a long hand and strike the earth, lifting debris up and tossing it indiscriminately into the air!
EVENT_HAPPENING_TORNADOES_REW.zh:
猛烈的龙卷风由高空远处的空气流形成！

风之触手像长手的手指一样伸下来击中地面，
将残骸卷起并胡乱抛向空中！

EVENT_HAPPENING_TRAININGDAY_REW.en:
Weird looking dummy cats can be seen about, just waiting to be pounced on!

It's training day? The cats wonder if striking the dummies will be like using the scratching post back home?
EVENT_HAPPENING_TRAININGDAY_REW.zh:
到处都能看到长相奇怪的假猫，
正等着被扑上去呢！

今天是训练日？猫咪们在想，
击打这些假猫会不会像在家里使用抓板一样？

EVENT_HAPPENING_TRASHDAY_REW.en: It must be trash day. Bags of discarded refuse line the path forward!
EVENT_HAPPENING_TRASHDAY_REW.zh:
今天一定是垃圾日。
成堆被丢弃的废弃物袋子整齐地排列在前进的
道路上！

EVENT_HAPPENING_WILDFIRE_REW.en:
Embers fill the air as a raging wildfire engulfs the horizon.

The cats cough, spitting out chunks of dry ash, as smoke fills their lungs.
EVENT_HAPPENING_WILDFIRE_REW.zh:
余烬弥漫在空气中，
一场肆虐的野火吞没了地平线。

当烟雾填满肺部时，猫咪们咳嗽着，
吐出大块干燥的灰烬。

EVENT_HAPPENING_WINDY_REW.en: A strong wind howls around the cats. Dirt and debris kicked up from the tempest pelt against them, nearly knocking the cats off their feet!
EVENT_HAPPENING_WINDY_REW.zh:
强风在猫咪周围呼啸。
风暴卷起的泥土和残骸拍打在它们身上，
差点把猫咪们掀翻！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A wrinkly, withered old head is tucked in the ring of a tire.

It stares blankly at {catname}.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个皱巴巴的、
枯萎的老脑袋被塞在轮胎圈里。

它茫然地盯着 {catname}。

options.name: kiss

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} puckers up and gives the weird head a kiss on the forehead...

Nothing seems to happen.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 嘟起嘴，
在那个古怪脑袋的
额头上亲了一下……

似乎什么也没发生。

bad_prompt_texts.en: The old wrinkled skin tastes disgusting and {catname} almost gags as the dry lips of the head try to kiss {him} back!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
干皱的皮肤尝起来令人作呕，
当那个脑袋干裂的双唇试图回吻时，
{catname} 差点吐了出来！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW1.en:
{catname} puckers up and gives the weird head a kiss on the forehead...

Nothing seems to happen.
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 嘟起嘴，
在那个古怪脑袋的
额头上亲了一下……

似乎什么也没发生。

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW2.en:
{catname} bravely gives the head a wet kiss and it grins happily!

Now that they are friends, {catname} gets the feeling it won't bother any future parties.
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 勇敢地亲了那个脑袋一下，
它开心地咧嘴笑了起来！

既然已经成了朋友，
{catname} 觉得它以后不会再找任何路过队伍的麻烦了。

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW3.en: The old wrinkled skin tastes disgusting and {catname} almost gags as the dry lips of the head try to kiss {him} back!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW3.zh:
干皱的皮肤尝起来令人作呕，
当那个脑袋干裂的双唇试图回吻时，
{catname} 差点吐了出来！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW4.en: {catname}'s rough tongue rips off a hunk of the decaying skin and {he} inadvertently swallows a leathery hunk of the rotting flesh!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 粗糙的舌头撕下了一块腐烂的皮肤，
{he}不小心吞下了一块皮革般坚韧的腐肉！

options.name: run

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} darts away before getting too close to the head!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 在靠得太近之前迅速跑开了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to dart past the head but it reaches out and bites into {his} leg!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图从那个脑袋旁掠过，
但它伸手咬住了{he}的大腿！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW5.en: {catname} darts away before getting too close to the head!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW5.zh: {catname} 在靠得太近之前迅速跑开了！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW6.en: {catname} leaps over the tire and continues on, feeling proud of {his} acrobatics!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 跃过轮胎并继续前进，
为{he}出色的杂耍动作感到自豪！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW7.en: {catname} tries to dart past the head but it reaches out and bites into {his} leg!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图从那个脑袋旁掠过，
但它伸手咬住了{he}的大腿！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW8.en: {catname} turns to run away but the head leaps forward and rips into {his} body, crushing bones! {catname} barely manages to wriggle free from its deadly grasp!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 转身想跑，但那个脑袋向前一跃，
撕开了{he}的身体，压断了骨头！
{catname} 好不容易才从它致命的纠缠中挣脱出来！

options.name: attack

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} strikes at the strange head and it deflates like a balloon further into the tire.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那个奇怪的脑袋，
它像个漏气的气球一样缩进了轮胎深处。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} trades blows with the head but it emerges the victor, biting into {his} soft face!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 与那个脑袋搏斗，但它成为了赢家，
咬伤了{he}娇嫩的小脸！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW10.en: With lighting fast strikes, {catname} rips open the head and it collapses into the tire.
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW10.zh:
{catname} 以闪电般的攻击撕开了那个脑袋，
它彻底瘫倒在轮胎里。

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW11.en: {catname} trades blows with the head but it emerges the victor, biting into {his} soft face!
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW11.zh:
{catname} 与那个脑袋搏斗，但它成为了赢家，
咬伤了{he}娇嫩的小脸！

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW12.en: {catname} goes to bite the head but it tries to devour {catname}, face first! Teeth scrape against {catname}'s skull as {he} pulls {himself} free...
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW12.zh:
{catname} 想去咬那个脑袋，它却试图先吃掉 {catname} 的脸！
牙齿在 {catname} 的头骨上摩擦着，
{he}拼命挣脱了身子……

EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW9.en: {catname} strikes at the strange head and it deflates like a balloon further into the tire.
EVENT_HEADINATIRE_REW9.zh:
{catname} 攻击了那个奇怪的脑袋，
它像个漏气的气球一样缩进了轮胎深处。

main_prompt_texts.en: A deep hole in the Earth lies before {catname}. Orange red light dances up from something burning deep below...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 面前出现了一个深邃的地洞。
橙红色的光芒随着地底深处燃烧的
某种东西向上跳跃……

options.name: enter

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} carefully crawls down the hole...

{He} emerges several minutes later with a glowing item clutched in {his} paw!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地爬进洞里……

几分钟后{He}爬了出来，
爪子里攥着一件发光的物品！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} leaps into the hole...

The smell of burning hair envelops the party as {catname} reemerges!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 纵身跳进洞里……

当 {catname} 重新出现时，
一股烧焦毛发的味道弥漫在队伍周围！

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW1.en:
{catname} carefully crawls down the hole...

{He} emerges several minutes later with a glowing item clutched in {his} paw!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW1.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地爬进洞里……

几分钟后{He}爬了出来，
爪子里攥着一件发光的物品！

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW2.en:
{catname} descends into the hole...

A hideous laugh breaks the nervous silence and moments later {catname} emerges with a devilish smirk on {his} face!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW2.zh:
{catname} 深入洞中……

一阵狰狞的笑声打破了令人紧张的寂静，
片刻之后 {catname} 爬了出来，
脸上带着邪恶的苦笑！

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW3.en:
{catname} leaps into the hole...

The smell of burning hair envelops the party as {catname} reemerges!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW3.zh:
{catname} 纵身跳进洞里……

当 {catname} 重新出现时，
一股烧焦毛发的味道弥漫在队伍周围！

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW4.en:
{catname} tries to carefully lower {himself} into the hole but tumbles in, head first!

{catname} cries out in pain as {he} struggles to escape from the burning flames below!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图小心翼翼地把自己放进洞里，
结果却头朝下栽了进去！

当 {catname} 在下方的烈焰中挣扎逃生时，
发出了痛苦的哀嚎！

options.name: throw

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tosses something from {his} backpack into the hole...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把背包里的
某样东西扔进了洞里……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tosses an item into the hole. {He} hears a faint hissing sound as it burns up deep below.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把一件物品扔进洞里。
随着它在地底深处烧尽，
它们听到了一声微弱的嘶嘶声。

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW5.en: {catname} tosses something from {his} backpack into the hole...
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW5.zh:
{catname} 把背包里的
某样东西扔进了洞里……

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW6.en:
{catname} offers up a sacrificial item to the hole...

From the depths of hell below a powerful item is returned!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW6.zh:
{catname} 向洞里供奉了一件祭品……

从下方的地狱深处，
一件强大的物品作为回报被送了上来！

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW7.en: {catname} tosses an item into the hole. {He} hears a faint hissing sound as it burns up deep below.
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW7.zh:
{catname} 把一件物品扔进洞里。
随着它在地底深处烧尽，
它们听到了一声微弱的嘶嘶声。

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW8.en: {catname} pulls an item from {his} bag to toss in the hole but knocks off an equipped item too, and they both tumble down into the chasm!
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW8.zh:
{catname} 正要从包里掏出一件物品扔进洞里，
却不小心把一件已装备的物品也撞落了，
两件东西都跌进了深渊！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} does peek into the ominous looking hole, but opts to walk carefully around it instead.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 确实瞥了一眼那个不祥的洞穴，
但决定还是小心翼翼地绕开它。

EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW9.en: {catname} does peek into the ominous looking hole, but opts to walk carefully around it instead.
EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW9.zh:
{catname} 确实瞥了一眼那个不祥的洞穴，
但决定还是小心翼翼地绕开它。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_HOLEINTHEEARTH_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
A skull lies before {catname}. The unblinking eyes of the skull stare at {him} like endless dark pits.

{catname} fights the urge to sit and stare into the skull forever...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个头骨摆在 {catname} 面前。
头骨那不会眨动的眼睛像深邃的黑洞一样盯着{him}。

{catname} 极力克制着坐下来永远盯着头骨看的
冲动……

options.name: smash

good_prompt_texts.en: Unperturbed by the creepy skull, {catname} flips it over and pulls out its teeth.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 并没有被这阴森的头骨吓到，
{he}把它翻了过来，拔掉了它的牙齿。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} moves close to the skull, debating what to do next, when suddenly spiders begin pouring out of the skull's eye sockets!

The spiders crawl all over {catname}, poisoning {him} with tiny bites!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 靠近头骨，正纠结下一步该做什么时，
突然间蜘蛛从头骨的眼眶里涌了出来！

蜘蛛爬满了 {catname} 的全身，
用细微的叮咬让{him}中毒了！

EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW1.en: Unperturbed by the creepy skull, {catname} flips it over and pulls out its teeth.
EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW1.zh:
{catname} 并没有被这阴森的头骨吓到，
{he}把它翻了过来，拔掉了它的牙齿。

EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW2.en: Unperturbed by the creepy skull, {catname} flips it over but doesn't find anything useful.
EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW2.zh:
{catname} 并没有被这阴森的头骨吓到，
把头骨翻了过来，
但没发现任何有用的东西。

EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW3.en: {catname} picks up the pale skull and holds the trophy over {his} head triumphantly!
EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 捡起苍白的头骨，
凯旋般地将这个战利品举过头顶！

EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW4.en:
{catname} moves close to the skull, debating what to do next, when suddenly spiders begin pouring out of the skull's eye sockets!

The spiders crawl all over {catname}, poisoning {him} with tiny bites!
EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW4.zh:
{catname} 靠近头骨，正纠结下一步该做什么时，
突然间蜘蛛从头骨的眼眶里涌了出来！

蜘蛛爬满了 {catname} 的全身，
用细微的叮咬让{him}中毒了！

EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW5.en:
{catname} knocks over the skull. A sudden sense of guilt washes over {him}.

Why is {his} first instinct to always desecrate the dead? What did it do to deserve this?
EVENT_HOLLOWSKULL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 撞倒了头骨。
一股突如其来的负罪感席卷了{him}。

为什么{he}的第一反应总是亵渎死者？
它做了什么要遭受这种对待？

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} sees something ahead. At first {he} is unable to distinguish the strange lump hanging loosely from the ceiling.

{His} ears go back and {his} eyes grow wide as {he} realizes it is the skin of a human head, dry and boneless...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 看到前方有东西。
起初{he}无法分辨那个从天花板上垂下来的
奇怪肿块是什么。

当{he}意识到那是人头的皮，
干燥且没有骨头时，{he}的耳朵弯到了后面，
眼睛睁得老大……

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tugs at the loose skin with {his} teeth, pulling chunks off and eating them. Tasty!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用牙齿拽着松弛的皮肤，
撕下肉块并吃掉。真香！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bites into the leathery skin. It is chewy and tastes weird. {He} feels {his} stomach begin to turn...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬入皮革般的皮肤。它很有嚼劲，
味道很怪。
{He}感到胃开始翻江倒海……

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW1.en: {catname} tugs at the loose skin with {his} teeth, pulling chunks off and eating them. Tasty!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 用牙齿拽着松弛的皮肤，
撕下肉块并吃掉。真香！

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW2.en: {catname} twitches as {he} chews on the dry skin. {He} feels a terrible itching sensation in {his} head as {catname}'s eyes mutate and become round!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 嚼着干皮时一阵抽搐。
{He}感到头部有一股可怕的瘙痒感，
随后 {catname} 的眼睛突变并变圆了！

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW3.en: {catname} bites into the leathery skin. It is chewy and tastes weird. {He} feels {his} stomach begin to turn...
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW3.zh:
{catname} 咬入皮革般的皮肤。它很有嚼劲，
味道很怪。
{He}感到胃开始翻江倒海……

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW4.en: {catname} chews on the tough skin. {His} eyes glaze over and {he} starts shaking uncontrollably!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW4.zh:
{catname} 嚼着坚韧的皮肤。{He}的眼神变得呆滞，
并开始不受控制地颤抖！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} examines the loose flaps of skin. Looking into the... mouth?

{He} sees something hidden there...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查着松散的皮肤褶皱。
盯着……嘴巴看？

{He}看到里面藏着什么东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Even though it has no eyes, {catname} feels as if it is staring right at {him}...

A shudder runs down {catname}'s spine and {his} hair stands on end.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
尽管它没有眼睛，
{catname} 还是觉得它正盯着{him}看……

一阵战栗传遍 {catname} 的全身，
毛发都竖了起来。

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW5.en:
{catname} examines the loose flaps of skin. Looking into the... mouth?

{He} sees something hidden there...
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW5.zh:
{catname} 检查着松散的皮肤褶皱。
盯着……嘴巴看？

{He}看到里面藏着什么东西……

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW6.en:
{catname} sticks {his} head inside the strange head, looking for anything within.

Before {he} can react, the leathery husk falls on {him}!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW6.zh:
{catname} 把头伸进那个奇怪的人头里，
寻找里面的任何东西。

在{he}反应过来之前，干枯的皮壳掉在了{him}身上！

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW7.en:
Even though it has no eyes, {catname} feels as if it is staring right at {him}...

A shudder runs down {catname}'s spine and {his} hair stands on end.
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW7.zh:
尽管它没有眼睛，
{catname} 还是觉得它正盯着{him}看……

一阵战栗传遍 {catname} 的全身，
毛发都竖了起来。

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW8.en:
{catname} stares at the ghastly head...

{He} blinks and shudders. How long has {he} been sitting here staring at it?

{catname} turns away, but when {he} closes {his} eyes, the face is still haunting {him}.
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW8.zh:
{catname} 盯着那颗阴森的人头……

{He}眨了眨眼，打了个寒颤。
{He}坐在这里盯着它看了多久了？

{catname} 转过身去，但当{he}闭上眼睛时，
那张脸依然纠缠着{him}。

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} walks around the strange husk but doesn't see anything worth taking.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 绕着那个奇怪的皮壳走了一圈，
但没发现什么值得带走的东西。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tugs at the skin, trying to find something useful to do with it, but is disappointed.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拽了拽那层皮，想找点有用的用途，
但很失望。

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW10.en: {catname} notices that the eyebrows on the head seem intact. {catname} tears the eyebrows off and wears them!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW10.zh:
{catname} 注意到头上的眉毛似乎完好无损。
{catname} 把眉毛撕下来戴在了身上！

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW11.en: {catname} tugs at the skin, trying to find something useful to do with it, but is disappointed.
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW11.zh:
{catname} 拽了拽那层皮，想找点有用的用途，
但很失望。

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW12.en:
{catname} pulls at the skin, and a large hunk tears off.

{He} tries to eat it, but as {catname} swallows the tough leather, {he} chokes!
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW12.zh:
{catname} 用力拉扯那层皮，撕下了一大块。

{He}试着把它吃掉，
但当 {catname} 吞下那块坚韧的皮革时，
{he}噎住了！

EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW9.en: {catname} walks around the strange husk but doesn't see anything worth taking.
EVENT_HUMANSKIN_REW9.zh:
{catname} 绕着那个奇怪的皮壳走了一圈，
但没发现什么值得带走的东西。

main_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Spare some change to help my nona?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“能不能给点零钱救救我祖母？
”[/i]

options.name: donate_5

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Sorry my Nona doesn't like you yet."[/i]
good_prompt_texts.zh: [i]“抱歉，我祖母还不喜欢你。”[/i]

bad_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"You don't even have enough for that!

Nona says it's mean to get my hopes up."[/i]
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“你甚至连这点钱都没有！

祖母说给我希望又让它破灭是很过分的。
”[/i]

EVENT_JACK_NOTENOUGHMONEY.en:
[i]"You don't even have enough for that!

Nona says it's mean to get my hopes up."[/i]
EVENT_JACK_NOTENOUGHMONEY.zh:
[i]“你甚至连这点钱都没有！

祖母说给我希望又让它破灭是很过分的。
”[/i]

EVENT_JACK_REW1.en: [i]"Sorry my Nona doesn't like you yet."[/i]

EVENT_JACK_REW2.en: [i]"Hey, Nona says you are pretty cool. Here take this!"[/i]
EVENT_JACK_REW2.zh:
[i]“嘿，祖母说你这人挺酷的。
呐，拿着这个！”[/i]

EVENT_JACK_REW3.en: [i]"Wow, Nona really likes you a lot! Here take this!"[/i]
EVENT_JACK_REW3.zh:
[i]“哇，祖母真的非常喜欢你！
呐，拿着这个！”[/i]

EVENT_JACK_REW4.en: [i]"What the heck! Nona says you are rich! Take this!"[/i]
EVENT_JACK_REW4.zh:
[i]“天呐！祖母说你是个大富翁！
拿着这个！”[/i]

main_prompt_texts.en: A jagged pathway leads downward ahead, riddled with bones and sharp rocks...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
前方是一条向下延伸的崎岖小路，
到处是枯骨和尖石……

options.name: push_through

good_prompt_texts.en:
The cats push through the dim and twisted rocky path, careful to stay clear of danger.

It leads to a narrow passageway to the next area, leading them into an ambush!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们穿过昏暗扭曲的岩石路径，
小心翼翼地避开危险。

这条路通向下一区域的一条狭窄通道，
结果带他们进入了一场埋伏！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to navigate through the dangerous caves, but slips and scratches {himself} on a sharp rocky outcrop...

{catname} howls as blood starts spraying from {his} wounds!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图在危险的洞穴中穿行，
但不小心滑倒并在尖锐的
岩石露头上划伤了{himself}……

{catname} 发出了哀嚎，鲜血从伤口中喷涌而出！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW1.en:
The cats push through the dim and twisted rocky path, careful to stay clear of danger.

It leads to a narrow passageway to the next area, leading them into an ambush!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW1.zh:
猫咪们穿过昏暗扭曲的岩石路径，
小心翼翼地避开危险。

这条路通向下一区域的一条狭窄通道，
结果带他们进入了一场埋伏！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW2.en:
{catname} makes {his} way carefully through the sharp rocks and scree...

{He} finds several items laying behind a large stalagmite!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW2.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地穿过尖锐的
岩石和碎石坡……

{He}在巨大的石笋后面发现了好几样物品！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to navigate through the dangerous caves, but slips and scratches {himself} on a sharp rocky outcrop...

{catname} howls as blood starts spraying from {his} wounds!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图在危险的洞穴中穿行，
但不小心滑倒并在尖锐的
岩石露头上划伤了{himself}……

{catname} 发出了哀嚎，鲜血从伤口中喷涌而出！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW4.en: The passageway is lined with sharp rocks and bones which tear into {catname} as {he} tries to push through...
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW4.zh:
通道两旁布满了尖锐的岩石和白骨，
在 {catname} 试图强行穿过时割伤了{he}……

options.name: find_another_way

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a different, less ominous looking path to carry on.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 发现了一条看起来不那么阴森的路继续前进。

bad_prompt_texts.en: Doubling back, {catname} tries to find a better way forward but ends up getting hopelessly lost!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 折返回去，试图找到一条更好的路，
结果却彻底迷路了！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW5.en: {catname} finds a different, less ominous looking path to carry on.
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW5.zh: {catname} 发现了一条看起来不那么阴森的路继续前进。

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW6.en:
Backtracking a ways, {catname} discovers a hidden passageway that the party had missed on their way by!

It branches into several caverns farther on, allowing the party to ambush the next two battles!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW6.zh:
往回走了一段路后，
{catname} 发现了一条队伍之前错过的隐藏通道！

它通向更深处的几处洞穴，
让队伍可以偷袭接下来的两场战斗！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW7.en: Doubling back, {catname} tries to find a better way forward but ends up getting hopelessly lost!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW7.zh:
{catname} 折返回去，试图找到一条更好的路，
结果却彻底迷路了！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW8.en: {catname} tries to climb back up the way {he} came, but accidentally dislodges a giant stalactite and it plummets downward, lodging into {his} skull!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_REW8.zh:
{catname} 试图爬回{he}来的地方，
但不小心弄松了一根巨大的钟乳石，
它垂直坠落，直接插进了头骨里！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} howls in pain at the giant stalactite buried in {his} skull!

The other cats bet they could help {him} by pulling it out... Should they?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 因插在头骨里的巨大钟乳石而痛苦哀嚎！

其他的猫觉得它们可以帮{him}拔出来……要试一试吗？

options.name: pull_it_out

good_prompt_texts.en:
The cats help {catname} carefully pull the stalactite out of {his} head...

They manage to pry it out, but {catname} passes out from the pain!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们帮助 {catname} 小心地将钟乳石从头
上拔出来……

它们设法撬出了它，
但 {catname} 因剧痛而晕了过去！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} howls in pain as the cats yank at the stalactite stuck in {his} head!

With a lurch, it pulls free and {catname} begins bleeding profusely from the gash in his skull!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当猫咪们用力拔插在头上的钟乳石时，
{catname} 发出了痛苦的惨叫！

随着猛地一抽，它被拔了出来，
{catname} 头骨上的裂口开始疯狂流血！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW1.en:
The cats help {catname} carefully pull the stalactite out of {his} head...

They manage to pry it out, but {catname} passes out from the pain!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW1.zh:
猫咪们帮助 {catname} 小心地将钟乳石从头
上拔出来……

它们设法撬出了它，
但 {catname} 因剧痛而晕了过去！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW2.en: The other cats carefully help {catname} extract the protruding rock from {his} head...
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW2.zh:
其他的猫小心地帮助 {catname} 拔出了插在头上的
岩石……

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW3.en:
{catname} howls in pain as the cats yank at the stalactite stuck in {his} head!

With a lurch, it pulls free and {catname} begins bleeding profusely from the gash in his skull!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW3.zh:
当猫咪们用力拔插在头上的钟乳石时，
{catname} 发出了痛苦的惨叫！

随着猛地一抽，它被拔了出来，
{catname} 头骨上的裂口开始疯狂流血！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW4.en:
The cats pull at the stalactite in {catname}'s skull, and it breaks off in pieces...

They extract the remaining chunks and look down at the bloody chasm on top of {catname}'s head. They're pretty sure there are supposed to be more brains in there... oh well!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW4.zh:
猫咪们拉扯着 {catname} 头骨里的钟乳石，
结果它断成了碎片……

它们取出了剩余的碎块，
看着 {catname} 头顶那道血淋淋的深沟。
它们确信那里本该有更多大脑的……算啦！

options.name: leave_it_in

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} is too afraid and won't let the cats get anywhere near the giant rock protruding from {his} skull!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 太害怕了，
不让任何猫靠近插在头骨上的那块巨石！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} is too afraid and won't let the cats get anywhere near the giant rock protruding from {his} skull!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 太害怕了，
不让任何猫靠近插在头骨上的那块巨石！

EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW5.en: {catname} is too afraid and won't let the cats get anywhere near the giant rock protruding from {his} skull!
EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 太害怕了，
不让任何猫靠近插在头骨上的那块巨石！

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_JAGGEDPATHWAY_STALACTITE_REW5"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a knife stuck in a wall.
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 发现一把小刀插在墙上。

options.name: pull

good_prompt_texts.en: Whoever put the knife here must have been very strong, because try as {he} might, {catname} can barely make it budge.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
把刀插在这的人一定力大无穷，
因为无论 {catname} 怎么尝试，
{he}都很难让它动弹半分。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pulls at the knife, but {his} paw slips and {he} cuts {himself} on the blade, causing {him} to start bleeding!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用力拔刀，但爪子滑了一下，
被刀刃割伤了{himself}，导致{him}流血不止！

EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW1.en: Whoever put the knife here must have been very strong, because try as {he} might, {catname} can barely make it budge.
EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW1.zh:
把刀插在这的人一定力大无穷，
因为无论 {catname} 怎么尝试，
{he}都很难让它动弹半分。

EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW2.en: {catname} pulls at the knife with all {his} strength but nothing happens.
EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW2.zh:
{catname} 使出浑身解数拔那把刀，
但什么也没发生。

EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW3.en: {catname} tries to pry the knife lose but fails. It is stuck fast.
EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图把刀撬下来，但失败了。
它卡得很死。

EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW4.en: With great effort, {catname} pulls on the knife... After a long moment, the knife pops out and {catname} lets out a loud meow in triumph!
EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW4.zh:
{catname} 费了九牛二虎之力猛拉那把刀……过了一会儿，
刀终于弹了出来，
{catname} 发出了胜利的响亮喵呜声！

EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW5.en: {catname} pulls at the knife, but {his} paw slips and {he} cuts {himself} on the blade, causing {him} to start bleeding!
EVENT_KNIFEINTHEWALL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 用力拔刀，但爪子滑了一下，
被刀刃割伤了{himself}，导致{him}流血不止！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a strange lump of pulsating meat hanging down from the ceiling.

Maybe it leaked through from another floor?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现一大块奇怪的、
搏动着的肉从天花板上垂下来。

也许是从另一层漏下来的？

options.name: eat_meat

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} takes a large bite out of the hanging meat. It tastes strange, but good.

{catname}'s body mutates!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 对着悬挂的肉块狠狠咬了一大口。
它的味道很奇怪，但还不错。

{catname} 的身躯发生了突变！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname}'s body begins to shake and mutate after {he} bites into the strange meat...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
在咬下这块奇怪的肉后，
{catname} 的身体开始颤抖并发生突变……

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW1.en:
{catname} takes a large bite out of the hanging meat. It tastes strange, but good.

{catname}'s body mutates!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW1.zh:
{catname} 对着悬挂的肉块狠狠咬了一大口。
它的味道很奇怪，但还不错。

{catname} 的身躯发生了突变！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW2.en: Juices run down {catname}'s chin as {he} devours the meat. It tastes delicious!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW2.zh:
汁液顺着 {catname} 的下巴流下，
{he}大口吞噬着肉块。味道好极了！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW3.en: {catname}'s body begins to shake and mutate after {he} bites into the strange meat...
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW3.zh:
在咬下这块奇怪的肉后，
{catname} 的身体开始颤抖并发生突变……

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW4.en: It tastes gross! {catname} spits out the rotting meat, but it is too late...
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW4.zh:
味道太恶心了！{catname} 吐出了这块腐烂的肉，
但已经太迟了……

options.name: kiss_meat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} licks the meat, swallowing the moist juices on the outside of the flesh. {his} body mutates!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 舔了舔肉块，吞下了肉块表面湿润的汁液。
身体发生了突变！

bad_prompt_texts.en: As {catname}'s tongue meets the flesh, it awakens and latches onto {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 的舌头接触到血肉时，
它苏醒了过来并死死缠住了{him}！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW5.en: {catname} licks the meat, swallowing the moist juices on the outside of the flesh. {his} body mutates!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW5.zh:
{catname} 舔了舔肉块，吞下了肉块表面湿润的汁液。
身体发生了突变！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW6.en:
{catname} kisses the strange flesh. It begins to move!

A large mouth opens up and greets {him}. It is friendly and wants to tag along!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW6.zh:
{catname} 亲吻了这块奇怪的血肉。
它开始动了！

一张大嘴张开并向{him}问好。它很友好，
想要一起加入旅程！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW7.en: As {catname}'s tongue meets the flesh, it awakens and latches onto {him}!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW7.zh:
当 {catname} 的舌头接触到血肉时，
它苏醒了过来并死死缠住了{him}！

EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW8.en:
{catname} approaches the strange meat and brings {his} lips to touch it...

Terror and confusion grips {catname}'s face as {his} mouth mutates into a horrifying shape!
EVENT_LEAKINGMEAT_REW8.zh:
{catname} 靠近那块奇怪的肉，
将嘴唇凑了上去……

{catname} 脸上充满了恐惧与混乱，
因为{he}发现嘴部突变成了毛骨悚然的形状！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a locked crate.
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 发现了一个上锁的木箱。

options.name: break_lock

good_prompt_texts.en: Worn with age, the fitting holding the lock snaps off easily under {catname}'s paw.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
由于年代久远，
固定锁扣的配件在 {catname} 的爪子下轻而易举地折断了。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Whatever was put inside the crate, the original owner did not want to be stolen...

Try as {he} might, {catname} can't get the lock to budge!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
不管木箱里装的是什么，
原主人都不希望它被偷走……

尽管{he}努力尝试，{catname} 还是无法让那把锁动弹分毫！

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW1.en: Worn with age, the fitting holding the lock snaps off easily under {catname}'s paw.
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW1.zh:
由于年代久远，
固定锁扣的配件在 {catname} 的爪子下轻而易举地折断了。

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW2.en: {catname} smashes the lock open and looks inside!

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW3.en:
Whatever was put inside the crate, the original owner did not want to be stolen...

Try as {he} might, {catname} can't get the lock to budge!
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW3.zh:
不管木箱里装的是什么，
原主人都不希望它被偷走……

尽管{he}努力尝试，{catname} 还是无法让那把锁动弹分毫！

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW4.en:
{catname} busts open the lock and looks inside...

A glowing skeletal corpse lies within! {catname} foolishly pokes around looking for something valuable and the radiated bones mutate {his} body!
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 砸开了锁并看向里面……

里面躺着一具发光的骸骨！
{catname} 傻乎乎地在周围乱摸想找点值钱的东西，
结果受辐射的骨头使{he}身体发生了突变！

options.name: pick_lock

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} carefully picks the lock.

In the crate {he} finds a bunch of junk, likely sentimental to whoever put it there.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 仔细地撬开了锁。

在木箱里，{he}发现了一堆垃圾，
可能对放它在那儿的人来说有某种纪念意义。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} fumbles with the lock for a while but eventually gives up.
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 摆弄了一会儿锁，但最终还是放弃了。

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW5.en:
{catname} carefully picks the lock.

In the crate {he} finds a bunch of junk, likely sentimental to whoever put it there.
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 仔细地撬开了锁。

在木箱里，{he}发现了一堆垃圾，
可能对放它在那儿的人来说有某种纪念意义。

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW6.en:
{catname} deftly picks the lock!

This must have been someone's emergency stache of gear!
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 利落地撬开了锁！

这一定是某人的应急装备囤货！

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW7.en: {catname} fumbles with the lock for a while but eventually gives up.
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW7.zh: {catname} 摆弄了一会儿锁，但最终还是放弃了。

EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW8.en: {catname} sneakily picks the lock, only to look down in horror at the glowing radioactive corpse the crate was protecting {him} from!
EVENT_LOCKEDCRATE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 偷偷摸摸地撬开了锁，
却惊恐地看到那具散发着辐射的
尸体——原本这个木箱是为了保护{him}免受其害的！

main_prompt_texts.en: A door bars the way forward. It looks like it could be locked. What should {catname} do?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一扇门挡住了去路。
看起来它可能锁上了。{catname} 该怎么做？

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
After fiddling with the handle, {catname} finds a way to open the door!

It leads to a small shop!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
摆弄了一会儿把手后，
{catname} 找到了打开门的方法！

通向一个小商店！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to pry the door open, but it slams shut on {his} head!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图把门撬开，但门猛地关上，
夹住了头！

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW1.en:
After fiddling with the handle, {catname} finds a way to open the door!

It leads to a small shop!
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW1.zh:
摆弄了一会儿把手后，
{catname} 找到了打开门的方法！

通向一个小商店！

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW2.en:
{catname} discovers the door is actually unlocked...

Beyond the doorway is a large shop full of shiny objects!
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW2.zh:
{catname} 发现门其实没锁……

门后是一家摆满闪亮物品的大商店！

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW3.en: {catname} tries to pry the door open, but it slams shut on {his} head!
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图把门撬开，但门猛地关上，
夹住了头！

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW4.en: The door creaks open, but when {catname} approaches the threshold it slams shut, crushing {him}!
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW4.zh:
门吱呀一声开了，但当 {catname} 靠近门槛时，
它猛地关上，压扁了{him}！

options.name: attack

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} proudly smashes down the door!

A startled shopkeeper within the room beyond yells out, [i]Why can't you just use the handle like a normal cat?![/i]

Oops!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 自豪地砸开了门！

房间里受惊的店主大喊道，
[i]为什么你就不能像只正常的猫一样用把手呢？
！[/i]

哎呀！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} winds up and slams {his} arm as hard as {he} can into the tough wooden door...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 蓄力后用手臂狠狠地撞向坚硬的
木门……

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW5.en:
{catname} proudly smashes down the door!

A startled shopkeeper within the room beyond yells out, [i]Why can't you just use the handle like a normal cat?![/i]

Oops!
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW5.zh:
{catname} 自豪地砸开了门！

房间里受惊的店主大喊道，
[i]为什么你就不能像只正常的猫一样用把手呢？
！[/i]

哎呀！

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW6.en:
A voice calls out from beyond the destroyed entrance...

[i]Why did I even bother installing a door?[/i]

The shopkeeper inside begrudgingly pulls out their best wares, hoping to make back enough coins to buy a new door.
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW6.zh:
一个声音从被毁的
入口另一边传来……

[i]我当初为什么要装门？[/i]

店主不情愿地拿出他们最好的商品，
希望能赚回买新门的钱。

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW7.en: {catname} winds up and slams {his} arm as hard as {he} can into the tough wooden door...
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW7.zh:
{catname} 蓄力后用手臂狠狠地撞向坚硬的
木门……

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW8.en:
The door cracks and splinters when {catname} hits it!

The wooden shards slide deep into {catname}'s skin...
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW8.zh:
当 {catname} 撞击时，门破裂并产生碎片！

木刺深深地扎进了 {catname} 的皮肤……

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} ignores the door and continues on.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 无视了那扇门，继续前进。

EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW9.en: {catname} ignores the door and continues on.
EVENT_LOCKEDDOOR_REW9.zh: {catname} 无视了那扇门，继续前进。

main_prompt_texts.en: While walking through the junkyard, {catname} spots a rusty old car. {He} feels a strong urge to look in the trunk, still locked after all these years.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
在穿过垃圾场时，
{catname} 发现了一辆锈迹斑斑的老爷车。
{He}强烈地想要看看车尾箱，
尽管过了这么多年它依然锁着。

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en: The lock worn with rust and weather, {catname} manages to pop the trunk open. {He} looks inside for anything worth taking...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
由于锁头因锈蚀和风化而松动，
{catname} 成功地撬开了后备箱。
{He}在里面寻找任何值得带走的
东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
An odd smell is emanating from the car... {catname} works the trunk lid loose and pops it open.

{He} stares down at the decomposing corpse within. Its mouth is open in a final cry for help, left forever unanswered. So tragic!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
车里散发出一股奇怪的味道……{catname} 撬开了后备箱盖。

{He}盯着里面那具腐烂的尸体。
它的嘴张着，发出最后的求救，
却永远得不到回应。太悲惨了！

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW1.en: The lock worn with rust and weather, {catname} manages to pop the trunk open. {He} looks inside for anything worth taking...
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW1.zh:
由于锁头因锈蚀和风化而松动，
{catname} 成功地撬开了后备箱。
{He}在里面寻找任何值得带走的
东西……

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW2.en: {catname} pries the lock open and looks inside the old trunk. Treasure! What fool leaves all this behind when they junked their car?
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW2.zh:
{catname} 撬开了锁，看向旧箱子内部。
宝藏！哪个傻瓜在报废车子时把这些全留下了？

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW3.en:
An odd smell is emanating from the car... {catname} works the trunk lid loose and pops it open.

{He} stares down at the decomposing corpse within. Its mouth is open in a final cry for help, left forever unanswered. So tragic!
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW3.zh:
车里散发出一股奇怪的味道……{catname} 撬开了后备箱盖。

{He}盯着里面那具腐烂的尸体。
它的嘴张着，发出最后的求救，
却永远得不到回应。太悲惨了！

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW4.en:
Feeling like this might be {his} lucky day, {catname} breaks into the trunk.

When the lid opens, a horrifying scream rings out as the ghost of some poor soul stuck inside is released! {catname} shudders as it passes through {him}...
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW4.zh:
{catname} 觉得今天可能是{he}的幸运日，
于是强行打开了箱子。

当盖子打开时，
一个被困在里面的可怜灵魂的幽灵被释放了出来，
发出了恐怖的尖叫！当幽灵穿过{him}身体时，
{catname} 不禁打了个寒颤……

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} shrugs. Probably just old car junk in there. What good could that be? {catname} uses paws, not wheels, after all.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 耸了耸肩。里面可能只是一些旧车垃圾。
那能有什么用？毕竟 {catname} 用的是爪子，
又不是轮子。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} shrugs. Probably just old car junk in there. What good could that be? {catname} uses paws, not wheels, after all.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 耸了耸肩。里面可能只是一些旧车垃圾。
那能有什么用？毕竟 {catname} 用的是爪子，
又不是轮子。

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW5.en: {catname} shrugs. Probably just old car junk in there. What good could that be? {catname} uses paws, not wheels, after all.
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW5.zh:
{catname} 耸了耸肩。里面可能只是一些旧车垃圾。
那能有什么用？毕竟 {catname} 用的是爪子，
又不是轮子。

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW6.en:
{catname} walks away from the old junker. It probably went fast in its day!

{catname} imagines sticking {his} head out the window and feeling the wind on {his} face as the car speeds along...
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW6.zh:
{catname} 走开了，离开了那辆旧车。
它全盛时期一定跑得很快！

{catname} 想象着把头伸出窗外，
在车子疾驰时感受风吹拂在脸上的
感觉……

EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW7.en:
{catname} walks a little closer, sniffing the air to identify an odd scent coming from the car. It doesn't smell good!

Better not investigate. {He} turns to leave, but the trunk pops open with a bang, revealing a frightening skeleton inside!
EVENT_LOCKEDTRUNK_REW7.zh:
{catname} 走近了一些，嗅着空气，
试图辨别车里传来的古怪气味。
闻起来可不妙！

最好还是不要调查。{He}转身准备离开，
但后备箱“砰”地一声弹开了，
露出了里面一具吓人的骷髅！

main_prompt_texts.en: While travelling, {catname} finds a locket. It appears to be in decent condition.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
在旅行时，{catname} 发现了一个吊坠盒。
它看起来品相还不错。

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} flips open the locket to find a picture of an unfamiliar face looking back at {him}.

The original owner must have cared about them, but it's useless to {catname}.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 弹开吊坠盒，发现一张陌生的面孔正盯着{him}看。

原主人一定很在意这张照片，
但对 {catname} 来说这没用。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to open the locket, but try as {he} might, it remains clamped shut. Oh, well.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图打开吊坠盒，但无论{he}怎么努力，
它都紧紧闭合着。好吧。

EVENT_LOCKET_REW1.en:
{catname} flips open the locket to find a picture of an unfamiliar face looking back at {him}.

The original owner must have cared about them, but it's useless to {catname}.
EVENT_LOCKET_REW1.zh:
{catname} 弹开吊坠盒，发现一张陌生的面孔正盯着{him}看。

原主人一定很在意这张照片，
但对 {catname} 来说这没用。

EVENT_LOCKET_REW2.en:
{catname} opens the locket and stares at the oddly familiar face within.

{catname} knows that {he} has never met them, but perhaps {he} will?
EVENT_LOCKET_REW2.zh:
{catname} 打开吊坠盒，
盯着里面那张奇怪地感到熟悉的面孔。

{catname} 知道{he}从未见过他们，但也许以后会呢？

EVENT_LOCKET_REW3.en: {catname} tries to open the locket, but try as {he} might, it remains clamped shut. Oh, well.
EVENT_LOCKET_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图打开吊坠盒，但无论{he}怎么努力，
它都紧紧闭合着。好吧。

EVENT_LOCKET_REW4.en: {catname} attempts to open the locket, but just ends up breaking it instead!
EVENT_LOCKET_REW4.zh: {catname} 试图打开吊坠盒，结果却把它弄坏了！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: After closer examination, {catname} discovers it is made of gold!
good_prompt_texts.zh: 经过仔细观察，{catname} 发现它是用黄金制成的！

bad_prompt_texts.en: After close inspection, the locket appears to be useless. {catname} tosses it away.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
仔细检查后，吊坠盒似乎毫无用处。
{catname} 随手把它扔了。

EVENT_LOCKET_REW5.en: After closer examination, {catname} discovers it is made of gold!
EVENT_LOCKET_REW5.zh: 经过仔细观察，{catname} 发现它是用黄金制成的！

EVENT_LOCKET_REW6.en: Looking closely at the locket, {catname} discovers a hidden compartment on the back! {He} pops it open!
EVENT_LOCKET_REW6.zh:
仔细观察吊坠盒，
{catname} 在背面发现了一个隐藏隔层！
{He}把它弹开了！

EVENT_LOCKET_REW7.en: After close inspection, the locket appears to be useless. {catname} tosses it away.
EVENT_LOCKET_REW7.zh:
仔细检查后，吊坠盒似乎毫无用处。
{catname} 随手把它扔了。

EVENT_LOCKET_REW8.en:
As {catname} inspects the locket, a small shard of the metal breaks off into the flesh of {his} paw!

{catname} tries to pull it out but it is stuck fast.
EVENT_LOCKET_REW8.zh:
当 {catname} 检查吊坠盒时，
一小块金属碎片崩进了爪子的肉里！

{catname} 试图把它拔出来，但它嵌得很深。

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} ignores the locket.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 无视了吊坠盒。

good_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"GOLEM FIND TREASURE! YOU HAVE NOW!"[/i]

因为 {his} DNA 被搅成了恐怖的混合物！

options.name: wish_items

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} is granted their wish and an item magically materializes in front of {him}! {catname} discards the rest of his armor to focus on wearing his new one!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 如愿以偿，一件物品奇迹般地出现在{him}面前！
{catname} 丢弃了其余的护甲，
专心穿上这件新护甲！

EVENT_MONKEYPAW_WISH3_REW.en: {catname} is granted their wish and an item magically materializes in front of {him}! {catname} discards the rest of his armor to focus on wearing his new one!

label_texts.zh: 习得深不可测的强大技能

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} feels a splitting pain in {his} head as {he} suddenly fathoms the vast possibilities of all things. {He} begins to drool as {his} brain cells are overridden with new knowledge.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 感到头部一阵剧痛，
因为{he}突然领悟了万事万物的广阔可能性。
随着脑细胞被新知识占领，
{he}开始流口水。
