main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a nest full of mice. They seem to be sleeping for the moment...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个满是老鼠的窝。
它们现在好像正在睡觉……

options.name: charm

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} sneaks among the snoozing mice and joins them for a nap.

One of the mice snuggles up in {his} fur. {catname} made a friend!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 悄悄溜进打盹的老鼠中间，
加入它们一起午睡。

一只老鼠依偎在{he}的皮毛里。
{catname} 交到了一个朋友！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to make friends with the mice, but they squeak loudly and bite {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图和老鼠交朋友，
但它们大声吱吱叫并咬了{him}！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW1.en:
{catname} sneaks among the snoozing mice and joins them for a nap.

One of the mice snuggles up in {his} fur. {catname} made a friend!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW1.zh:
{catname} 悄悄溜进打盹的老鼠中间，
加入它们一起午睡。

一只老鼠依偎在{he}的皮毛里。
{catname} 交到了一个朋友！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW2.en:
{catname} approaches the mice and says hello.

One of the mice leaps up onto {his} back, eager to join in on the adventure!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW2.zh:
{catname} 走近老鼠并打了声招呼。

其中一只老鼠跳到了{he}的背上，
渴望加入这场冒险！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW3.en: {catname} tries to make friends with the mice, but they squeak loudly and bite {him}!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图和老鼠交朋友，
但它们大声吱吱叫并咬了{him}！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW4.en: {catname} attempts to join the mice in their nap, but one of the mice bites {him}, infecting {catname} with a disease!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图加入老鼠一起午睡，
但其中一只老鼠咬了{him}，
导致 {catname} 感染了病症！

options.name: attack

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} leaps into the tussle of mice and bites and claws at them!

{catname} proudly displays {his} trophies to the other cats.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 跃入鼠群中疯狂撕咬抓挠！

{catname} 向其他猫咪自豪地展示{he}的战利品。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pounces into the mice nest, but they dart away too fast for {his} paws.

The mice scurry away with some of {his} food in the chaos!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 扑向老鼠窝，但它们溜得太快了，
{he}的爪子抓了个空。

混乱中，老鼠们偷走了一些食物溜掉了！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW5.en:
{catname} leaps into the tussle of mice and bites and claws at them!

{catname} proudly displays {his} trophies to the other cats.
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW5.zh:
{catname} 跃入鼠群中疯狂撕咬抓挠！

{catname} 向其他猫咪自豪地展示{he}的战利品。

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW6.en:
Carefully sneaking up first, {catname} lets out an intimidating roar and jumps on the mice.

They scurry in every direction, terrified!

{catname} decides to try that move in the next battle too!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW6.zh:
{catname} 先小心翼翼地潜伏过去，
然后发出一声威慑性的怒吼并跳向老鼠。

它们惊恐地四散奔逃！

{catname} 决定在下次战斗中也试试这一招！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW7.en:
{catname} pounces into the mice nest, but they dart away too fast for {his} paws.

The mice scurry away with some of {his} food in the chaos!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW7.zh:
{catname} 扑向老鼠窝，但它们溜得太快了，
{he}的爪子抓了个空。

混乱中，老鼠们偷走了一些食物溜掉了！

EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW8.en:
{catname} jumps into the middle of the mice nest, attempting to catch one.

They turn on {him} and bite at {catname} savagely, tearing into {his} fur!
EVENT_MOUSENEST_REW8.zh:
{catname} 跳进老鼠窝中心，试图抓一只。

结果它们反过来疯狂地攻击{him}，
撕扯着{he}的皮毛！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a mousetrap with a tasty looking fish on it. What should {he} do?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个捕鼠夹，
上面放着一条看起来很好吃的鱼。
{he}该怎么做？

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} doesn't see any way of safely getting the fish without triggering the trap and opts to leave it alone.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 看不出有什么办法能安全地拿到鱼而不触发陷阱，
于是选择不碰它。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to quickly swipe off the bait before the trap can trigger and isn't quick enough!

{catname} howls in pain as the metal bruises {his} paw!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图在陷阱触发前快速抓走诱饵，
但不够快！

金属夹伤了爪子，{catname} 痛苦地嚎叫！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW1.en: {catname} doesn't see any way of safely getting the fish without triggering the trap and opts to leave it alone.
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW1.zh:
{catname} 看不出有什么办法能安全地拿到鱼而不触发陷阱，
于是选择不碰它。

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW2.en: {catname} cleverly figures out how to remove the bait without triggering the trap!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW2.zh:
{catname} 聪明地想出了如何在不触发陷阱的
情况下取下诱饵！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to quickly swipe off the bait before the trap can trigger and isn't quick enough!

{catname} howls in pain as the metal bruises {his} paw!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图在陷阱触发前快速抓走诱饵，
但不够快！

金属夹伤了爪子，{catname} 痛苦地嚎叫！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW4.en: {catname} tries to disarm the mousetrap but accidentally trips it and the metal arm slams shut on {him}!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图解除捕鼠夹，但不小心触发了它，
金属杆猛地夹住了{him}！

options.name: sneak

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} decides it's best not to mess with it. It is by a trap after all!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 决定最好别惹它。毕竟这是个陷阱！

bad_prompt_texts.en: Trying to show off, {catname} leaps over the trap! It snaps shut!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
为了炫耀，{catname} 跳过了陷阱！
陷阱猛地关上了！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW5.en: {catname} decides it's best not to mess with it. It is by a trap after all!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW5.zh: {catname} 决定最好别惹它。毕竟这是个陷阱！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW6.en: Trying to show off, {catname} leaps over the trap! It snaps shut!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW6.zh:
为了炫耀，{catname} 跳过了陷阱！
陷阱猛地关上了！

EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW7.en: {catname} attempts to run past the trap as fast as possible, but it slams shut on {him}!
EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW7.zh: {catname} 试图尽快跑过陷阱，但它猛地夹住了{him}！

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_BAITEDMOUSETRAP_REW5"
                    //nothing, escape

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} comes across a mummified corpse.

The body is dried and hardened, frozen in time in the tragic pose of its final moment.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 偶遇了一具木乃伊尸体。

这具尸体已经干枯硬化，
时间将其定格在临终那一刻的悲惨姿态。

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tears into the fragile body, crumbling the bones and dry skin to dust.

{catname} feels very strong!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撕开了脆弱的身体，
将骨头和干枯的皮肤揉成粉碎。

{catname} 感到自己非常强壮！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pulls at the body but it is hard as rock and {he} is unable to break it.

How embarrassing! {catname} lags behind to lick {his} ego.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用力拉扯尸体，但它硬得像岩石一样，
{he}无法将其破坏。

真尴尬！{catname} 落在后面，舔舐着受挫的自尊。

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW1.en:
{catname} tears into the fragile body, crumbling the bones and dry skin to dust.

{catname} feels very strong!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 撕开了脆弱的身体，
将骨头和干枯的皮肤揉成粉碎。

{catname} 感到自己非常强壮！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW2.en:
{catname} mercilessly pulls the mummified body apart.

{catname} purrs as {his} demonstration of strength impresses the others!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 毫不留情地将木乃伊化的尸体扯成碎片。

{catname} 发出了呼噜声，
因为{he}的力量展示给其他同伴留下了深刻印象！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW3.en:
{catname} pulls at the body but it is hard as rock and {he} is unable to break it.

How embarrassing! {catname} lags behind to lick {his} ego.
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 用力拉扯尸体，但它硬得像岩石一样，
{he}无法将其破坏。

真尴尬！{catname} 落在后面，舔舐着受挫的自尊。

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW4.en: {catname} tears the corpse apart, and a swarm of fleas bursts out, biting {him} all over!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 撕开了尸体，一群跳蚤猛然冲出，
叮得{him}满身是包！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} looks closely at the body...

There are holes in its neck and the skin is chalk white as if all the blood was drained from the body.

What a horrifying way to go... {catname} shudders at the thought!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 仔细观察尸体……

它的脖子上有洞，皮肤像粉笔一样苍白，
仿佛全身的血液都被抽干了。

这种死法太恐怖了……{catname} 想到这里不禁打了个冷颤！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to pry into the fossilized remains but cuts {himself} on the hard exterior.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图撬开这些石化的残骸，
却被坚硬的外壳割伤了{himself}。

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW5.en:
{catname} looks closely at the body...

There are holes in its neck and the skin is chalk white as if all the blood was drained from the body.

What a horrifying way to go... {catname} shudders at the thought!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 仔细观察尸体……

它的脖子上有洞，皮肤像粉笔一样苍白，
仿佛全身的血液都被抽干了。

这种死法太恐怖了……{catname} 想到这里不禁打了个冷颤！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW6.en:
{catname} senses a creature lurking in the dark nearby...

{He} leads the party in an ambush!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 感觉到附近黑暗中潜伏着某个生
物……

{He}带领队伍发起了一场伏击！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW7.en: {catname} tries to pry into the fossilized remains but cuts {himself} on the hard exterior.
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图撬开这些石化的残骸，
却被坚硬的外壳割伤了{himself}。

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW8.en:
{catname}'s fur stands up on end as {he} senses something quietly entering the room...

{catname} turns to see the creature standing right behind {him}!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 感到有东西正静悄悄地进入房间，
全身的毛都竖了起来……

{catname} 转过头，看见那个生物就站在{him}身后！

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: Lumps of mummified flesh tumble away from the corpse as {catname} digs into it looking for treasure.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 为了寻找宝藏在尸体里挖掘时，
一块块木乃伊化的腐肉从尸体上滚落下来。

bad_prompt_texts.en: As {catname} is attempting to loot the corpse, it rolls oddly almost like it is alive and {catname} leaps in fright!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
就在 {catname} 试图搜刮尸体时，
它竟然诡异地翻动了一下，
就像活的一样，吓得 {catname} 跳了起来！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW10.en: {catname} examines the body and notices it is clutching something...
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW10.zh:
{catname} 检查了尸体，
发现它正紧紧抓着什么东西……

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW11.en: As {catname} is attempting to loot the corpse, it rolls oddly almost like it is alive and {catname} leaps in fright!
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW11.zh:
就在 {catname} 试图搜刮尸体时，
它竟然诡异地翻动了一下，
就像活的一样，吓得 {catname} 跳了起来！

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW12.en:
As {catname} is looking around the body for something useful, {he} catches its eye and could swear it winks at {him}.

{catname} cannot shake that image from {his} mind.
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW12.zh:
就在 {catname} 在尸体周围寻找有用之物时，
{he}对上了它的眼睛，并敢发誓它对{him}眨了眨眼。

{catname} 无法将那一幕从脑海中抹去。

EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW9.en: Lumps of mummified flesh tumble away from the corpse as {catname} digs into it looking for treasure.
EVENT_MUMMIFIEDCORPSE_REW9.zh:
当 {catname} 为了寻找宝藏在尸体里挖掘时，
一块块木乃伊化的腐肉从尸体上滚落下来。

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} has found a large mushroom. What should {he} do with it?
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 发现了一个大蘑菇。{He}该拿它怎么办？

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} munches on the soft flesh of the mushroom.

{He} feels {his} mind expanding with a temporary rush of brilliance. The possibilities are endless!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 啃食着蘑菇柔软的菌肉。

{He}感到才思敏捷，思维不断扩展。
充满了无限的可能性！

bad_prompt_texts.en: As {he} chews on the soft flesh of the mushroom, {catname}'s mind begins to spin. Despite having trouble focusing, {he} stumbles on.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当{he}咀嚼着蘑菇柔软的菌肉时，
{catname} 感到天旋地转。尽管难以集中注意力，
{he}还是跌跌撞撞地继续前行。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW1.en:
{catname} munches on the soft flesh of the mushroom.

{He} feels {his} mind expanding with a temporary rush of brilliance. The possibilities are endless!
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW1.zh:
{catname} 啃食着蘑菇柔软的菌肉。

{He}感到才思敏捷，思维不断扩展。
充满了无限的可能性！

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW2.en: Taking a large bite out of the mushroom, {catname} considers the many paths that led {him} to this strange situation.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW2.zh:
{catname} 咬了一大口蘑菇，
思考着将{him}带到这种奇怪境地的许多条道路。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW3.en: As {he} chews on the soft flesh of the mushroom, {catname}'s mind begins to spin. Despite having trouble focusing, {he} stumbles on.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW3.zh:
当{he}咀嚼着蘑菇柔软的菌肉时，
{catname} 感到天旋地转。尽管难以集中注意力，
{he}还是跌跌撞撞地继续前行。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW4.en:
{catname} takes a timid bite. Then another bite. {He} then furiously devours the supple mushroom!

{catname} looks around, eager for more...
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW4.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地咬了一口。
接着又咬了一口。
随后他们疯狂地吞噬了这朵多汁的蘑菇！

{catname} 环顾四周，渴望得到更多……

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} plucks the mushroom up by the stem. It might be useful later in a pinch.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 握住菌柄采下了蘑菇。
以后在紧急关头或许有用。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
As {catname} attempts to pull up the mushroom, it releases a cloud of spores!

{catname} stumbles back, {his} senses confused by the potent cloud.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
就在 {catname} 试图拔起蘑菇时，
它释放了一团孢子云！

{catname} 跌跌撞撞地退后，
感官被这团浓郁的云雾搞得一片混乱。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW5.en: {catname} plucks the mushroom up by the stem. It might be useful later in a pinch.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW5.zh:
{catname} 握住菌柄采下了蘑菇。
以后在紧急关头或许有用。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW6.en: In the dim light {catname} notices luminescent veins running down the stem of the mushroom. {He} delicately uproots the mushroom and tucks it away.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW6.zh:
在昏暗的光线下，
{catname} 注意到蘑菇柄上分布着发光的纹理。
{He}小心地将蘑菇连根拔起并收藏了起来。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW7.en:
As {catname} attempts to pull up the mushroom, it releases a cloud of spores!

{catname} stumbles back, {his} senses confused by the potent cloud.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW7.zh:
就在 {catname} 试图拔起蘑菇时，
它释放了一团孢子云！

{catname} 跌跌撞撞地退后，
感官被这团浓郁的云雾搞得一片混乱。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW8.en:
As {catname} roughly pulls at the mushroom, it releases a toxic cloud of spores!

Breathing in the dense particles, {catname} shudders. {His} eyes begin darting around menacingly.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW8.zh:
当 {catname} 粗暴地拉扯蘑菇时，
它释放了一团有毒的孢子云！

吸入这些浓密的颗粒后，
{catname} 打了个冷颤，眼神凶狠地四处扫视。

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} notices that the mushroom has grown up over the body of some long deceased creature.

Digging into the remains reveals something that could make great armor!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 注意到这个蘑菇生长在某个早已死去的
生物遗骸上。

在残骸中挖掘，
揭示出了一些可以制成精良护甲的东西！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} sees something poking out from beneath the mushroom...

As {he} moves closer to investigate, a skeletal arm reaches out and strikes {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 看到有什么东西从蘑菇下面露了
出来……

当{he}靠近调查时，
一只骷髅手臂伸了出来并击中了{him}！

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW10.en: Beneath the innocent looking shroom is the carcass of a powerful creature. {catname} pulls it out...
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW10.zh:
在这个看起来平平无奇的蘑菇下面，
隐藏着一具强大生物的尸骸。
{catname} 把它拉了出来……

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW11.en:
{catname} sees something poking out from beneath the mushroom...

As {he} moves closer to investigate, a skeletal arm reaches out and strikes {him}!
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW11.zh:
{catname} 看到有什么东西从蘑菇下面露了
出来……

当{he}靠近调查时，
一只骷髅手臂伸了出来并击中了{him}！

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW12.en:
Distracted sniffing the odd mushroom, a rotting skeletal hand reaches out from beneath it and strikes {catname}!

{He} howls as {his} skin begins to rot from some horrible disease.
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW12.zh:
{catname} 正专心地嗅着那朵古怪的蘑菇，
一只腐烂的骷髅手突然从下面伸出来击中了{he}！

{He}发出哀嚎，
皮肤开始因某种可怕的疾病而腐烂。

EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW9.en:
{catname} notices that the mushroom has grown up over the body of some long deceased creature.

Digging into the remains reveals something that could make great armor!
EVENT_MUSHROOM_REW9.zh:
{catname} 注意到这个蘑菇生长在某个早已死去的
生物遗骸上。

在残骸中挖掘，
揭示出了一些可以制成精良护甲的东西！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A mysterious building looms ahead. {catname} approaches cautiously...

An open doorway leads within, but {catname}'s eyes cannot pierce into the shadowed interior.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一座神秘的建筑耸立在前方。
{catname} 小心翼翼地靠近……

敞开的门口通向内部，
但 {catname} 的视线无法穿透阴影笼罩的内部。

options.name: enter

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} sneaks up to the doorway, fearing the worst...

Inside {he} finds a shop!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 做好了最坏的打算，
潜行到门口……

在里面，{he}发现了一家商店！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} thinks {he} can see something within the interior as {he} approaches the doorway.

Legs trembling, but not wanting to lose {his} nerve, {catname} ventures within...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近门口时，
{he}觉得自己能看到里面的某些东西。

尽管腿在打颤，但为了不让自己丧失勇气，
{catname} 闯了进去……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW1.en:
{catname} sneaks up to the doorway, fearing the worst...

Inside {he} finds a shop!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW1.zh:
{catname} 做好了最坏的打算，
潜行到门口……

在里面，{he}发现了一家商店！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW2.en:
{catname} boldly runs into the ominous structure...

Inside is a rare discounted shop!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW2.zh:
{catname} 大胆地跑进这座不祥的建筑……

里面是一家罕见的打折商店！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW3.en:
{catname} thinks {he} can see something within the interior as {he} approaches the doorway.

Legs trembling, but not wanting to lose {his} nerve, {catname} ventures within...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW3.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近门口时，
{he}觉得自己能看到里面的某些东西。

尽管腿在打颤，但为了不让自己丧失勇气，
{catname} 闯了进去……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW4.en:
{catname} can't shake the feeling this was a terrible idea...

A chill goes down {catname}'s spine and {his} hair stands up on end.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW4.zh:
{catname} 无法摆脱这种感觉：
这真是个糟糕的主意……

一股寒意袭向 {catname} 的脊梁，毛发根根直立。

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: This place is eerie enough as it is, no need to venture into ominous buildings!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
这个地方已经够阴森了，
没必要再去冒险进入那些不祥的建筑！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW5.en: This place is eerie enough as it is, no need to venture into ominous buildings!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSBUILDING_REW5.zh:
这个地方已经够阴森了，
没必要再去冒险进入那些不祥的建筑！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a mysterious cave. {He} can hear scary voices echoing from within the cave...

The darkness entrance beckons {catname} to explore it.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个神秘洞穴。
{He}能听到恐怖的
声音从洞穴深处回响……

黑暗的入口正诱使着 {catname} 前去探索。

options.name: enter

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} enters the cave.

{He} follows the cave downwards, squeezing through crevices and traveling deeper within...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 进入了洞穴。

{He}顺着洞穴向下走，挤过岩缝，
向着更深处进发……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} hears someone calling {his} name from within the cave!

Spooked by the strange voice, {catname} runs away in fear!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 听到洞穴里有人在叫{he}的名字！

被奇怪的声音吓坏了，{catname} 恐惧地逃走了！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW1.en:
{catname} enters the cave.

{He} follows the cave downwards, squeezing through crevices and traveling deeper within...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 进入了洞穴。

{He}顺着洞穴向下走，挤过岩缝，
向着更深处进发……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW2.en: {catname} hears a familiar voice echoing through the cave as {he} enters, a calming influence as {he} navigates deeper into the cave...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW2.zh:
当 {catname} 进入时，听到一个熟悉的声音在洞穴中回荡。
随着{he}向洞穴深处探索，
那声音仿佛带来了一股平静的
力量……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW3.en:
{catname} hears someone calling {his} name from within the cave!

Spooked by the strange voice, {catname} runs away in fear!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 听到洞穴里有人在叫{he}的名字！

被奇怪的声音吓坏了，{catname} 恐惧地逃走了！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW4.en:
Strange voices echo through the cave, clouding {catname}'s mind and filling his thoughts with chaos!

{catname} turns and flees in terror!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW4.zh:
奇怪的声音在洞穴中回荡，
搅乱了 {catname} 的思绪，让他的脑海充满了混乱！

{catname} 转身惊恐地逃离了这里！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} senses something strange about this cave, as if some being is guarding it.

{He} opts to leave it alone.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 感觉到这个洞穴有些古怪，
似乎有什么存在守护着它。

{He}选择不去理会它。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW5.en:
{catname} senses something strange about this cave, as if some being is guarding it.

{He} opts to leave it alone.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE_REW5.zh:

{He}选择不去理会它。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a rope tied above a deep shaft that leads into an abyss.

Should {he} rappel down into the chasm?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一根系在深井上方的绳子，
深井通向无底深渊。

{he}应该顺着绳子降入深渊吗？

options.name: repell

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} makes {his} way down the rope to the base of the chasm.

The darkness is broken by the soft glow of light splashing on the walls of the cavern ahead...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 顺着绳子下到了深渊底部。

前方的洞穴墙壁上泛着柔和的微光，
打破了黑暗……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Reverberating through the caves below, {catname} hears the stern voice of {his} father!

{He} scrambles back up the rope and flees the cave in fear!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 听到下方的洞穴中回荡着{he}父亲严厉的声音！

{he}惊恐地抓着绳子爬了回去，
逃离了洞穴！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW1.en:
{catname} makes {his} way down the rope to the base of the chasm.

The darkness is broken by the soft glow of light splashing on the walls of the cavern ahead...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW1.zh:
{catname} 顺着绳子下到了深渊底部。

前方的洞穴墙壁上泛着柔和的微光，
打破了黑暗……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW2.en:
{catname} feels as if {he} was destined to travel this path!

{He} rappels down the chasm effortlessly as if {he} has done it a thousand times before...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW2.zh:
{catname} 觉得这似乎是命中注定要走的路！

{he}轻而易举地降入深渊，
仿佛已经做过上千次一样……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW3.en:
Reverberating through the caves below, {catname} hears the stern voice of {his} father!

{He} scrambles back up the rope and flees the cave in fear!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW3.zh:
{catname} 听到下方的洞穴中回荡着{he}父亲严厉的声音！

{he}惊恐地抓着绳子爬了回去，
逃离了洞穴！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW4.en:
Strange sounds and voices fill the cave and {catname}'s mind fills with chaos!

{He} scrambles to safety outside the cave, visibly shaken with fear.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW4.zh:
奇异的声音充斥着洞穴，
{catname} 的大脑陷入了混乱！

{he}连滚带爬地逃到了洞穴外的安全地带，
显然被吓坏了。

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} peers down the chasm past the rope which leads into the darkness below...

Best not to risk it! {catname} returns to the surface.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 顺着绳子望向通往下方黑暗的
深渊……

最好不要冒险！{catname} 回到了地面。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW5.en:
{catname} peers down the chasm past the rope which leads into the darkness below...

Best not to risk it! {catname} returns to the surface.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE1_REW5.zh:
{catname} 顺着绳子望向通往下方黑暗的

最好不要冒险！{catname} 回到了地面。

main_prompt_texts.en:
A strange glowing figure sits before {catname}!

Power emanates from its body and strange words from the being echo in {catname}'s mind.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个奇异的发光身影坐在 {catname} 面前！

它的身体散发出力量，
奇异的话语在 {catname} 的脑海中回荡。

options.name: repell

good_prompt_texts.en:
A long time passes as the glowing one explains, using spoken and unspoken words, the meaning of life to {catname}.

{catname}'s mind is at peace and {his} heart is warmed by the knowledge imparted to {him}.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
过了很久，
发光者用言语和无声的
心灵感应向 {catname} 解释了生命的意义。

{catname} 感到内心平静，
这些传授给{him}的知识温暖了{he}的心房。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The glowing one speaks to {catname}, but the words have no meaning and just fill {him} with confusion.

{catname} turns away, ready to return to the surface.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
发光者对 {catname} 说话，但这些话毫无意义，
只是让{him}感到无比混乱。

{catname} 转过身，准备回到地面。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW1.en:
A long time passes as the glowing one explains, using spoken and unspoken words, the meaning of life to {catname}.

{catname}'s mind is at peace and {his} heart is warmed by the knowledge imparted to {him}.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW1.zh:
过了很久，
发光者用言语和无声的
心灵感应向 {catname} 解释了生命的意义。

{catname} 感到内心平静，
这些传授给{him}的知识温暖了{he}的心房。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW2.en:
The glowing one weaves together the story of {catname}'s life and purpose.

{catname} now fully understands who {he} really is!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW2.zh:
发光者编织出了关于 {catname} 的生命故事和使命。

{catname} 现在完全明白了{he}究竟是谁！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW3.en:
The glowing one speaks to {catname}, but the words have no meaning and just fill {him} with confusion.

{catname} turns away, ready to return to the surface.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW3.zh:
发光者对 {catname} 说话，但这些话毫无意义，
只是让{him}感到无比混乱。

{catname} 转过身，准备回到地面。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW4.en:
The glowing one tells {catname} dark and terrible secrets about the world.

{catname}'s blood runs cold and {his} ears invert back into {his} skull.

{He} was not supposed to hear those terrible words!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE2_REW4.zh:
发光者告诉了 {catname} 关于这个世界的阴暗而可怕的秘密。

{catname} 感到脊背发凉，缩回了耳朵。

{he}本不该听到那些可怕的话语！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} turns to the base of the rope and looks up...

It sure is a long way back up to the entrance of the cave!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 转头看向绳子的
底部并向上仰望……

要回到洞穴入口确实还有很长一段路要爬！

options.name: repell

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} climbs back up the way {he} came in and exits the cave.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 沿着进来的路爬了回去，
离开了洞穴。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to climb up but falls back to the bottom and breaks {his} leg!

{He} turns awkwardly back to the Glowing One who is now before {him} again...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图往上爬，却摔回了底部，
还摔断了腿！

{he}笨拙地转过身，
发现发光者又一次出现在{him}面前…
…

{catname} 沿着进来的路爬了回去，
离开了洞穴。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW2.en:
As {he} climbs back up, {catname} ponders the words that the Glowing One spoke to {him}.

A vigor and excitement for life fills {catname} as {he} thinks of the battle ahead!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW2.zh:
在往上爬的时候，{catname} 沉思着发光者对{him}说的话。

一想到接下来的战斗，
{catname} 就感到体内充满了活力和对生活的热忱！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to climb up but falls back to the bottom and breaks {his} leg!

{He} turns awkwardly back to the Glowing One who is now before {him} again...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图往上爬，却摔回了底部，
还摔断了腿！

{he}笨拙地转过身，
发现发光者又一次出现在{him}面前…
…

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW4.en: {catname} tries to use the rope to pull {himself} up, but slips and tumbles back down!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCAVE3_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图用绳子把{himself}拉上去，但脚下一滑，
又摔了下去！

main_prompt_texts.en:
In the center of a room {catname} finds mysterious chamber with a large chair inside.

Within the enclosure, {catname} finds 3 labelled buttons.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
在房间中央，{catname} 发现了一个神秘密室，
里面有一把大椅子。

在隔间内，{catname} 发现了 3 个贴有标签的按钮。

options.name: upgrade_yourself

good_prompt_texts.en:
The chamber whirs and a metal dome descends from the ceiling...

It lights up and {catname} feels a strong burst of energy course through {him}.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
密室发出嗡嗡声，
一个金属圆顶从天花板降下……

它亮了起来，{catname} 感到一股强劲的能量流经{him}。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The chamber lights up and {catname} sees metal components whirring above {him}...

Suddenly it starts emitting a loud blaring sound and {catname} is blinded by a harsh light.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
密室亮了起来，
{catname} 看到金属部件在{him}头顶旋转……

突然它开始发出巨大的轰鸣声，
{catname} 被一道强光晃得睁不开眼。

The chamber whirs and a metal dome descends from the ceiling...

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW2.zh:

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW3.en:

good_prompt_texts.en: The chamber injects {catname} and {he} feels a tension deep within {him} release.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
密室为 {catname} 进行了注射，
{he}感到{him}内心深处的一种紧绷感得到了释放。

bad_prompt_texts.en: The chamber starts beeping wildly and then it stabs {catname} with a syringe!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
密室开始疯狂地发出哔哔声，

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW5.zh:
密室为 {catname} 进行了注射，
{he}感到{him}内心深处的一种紧绷感得到了释放。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW6.en: {catname} feels a wave of calm wash over {him} as {his} ailments are washed away.
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW6.zh: 随着病症被洗净，{catname} 感到一阵平静涌上心头。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW7.en: The chamber starts beeping wildly and then it stabs {catname} with a syringe!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW7.zh:

good_prompt_texts.en: The chamber lights up and {catname} is teleported to a new place!
good_prompt_texts.zh: 密室亮了起来，{catname} 被传送到了一个新地方！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The doors slam shut and {catname} is whisked away to a new place...

Straight into an ambush!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
门猛地关上，
{catname} 被送往了一个新地方……

直接掉进了伏击圈！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW10.en:
The chamber beeps triumphantly and then in a bright flash of light it teleports {catname}!

Based on how the chamber reacted, {catname} guesses that {he} has been empowered for the next event somehow...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW10.zh:
密室得意地发出哔哔声，
然后在一道闪光中传送了 {catname}！

根据密室的反应，
{catname} 猜想它们在下个事件中以某种方
式得到了强化……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW11.en:
The doors slam shut and {catname} is whisked away to a new place...

Straight into an ambush!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW11.zh:
门猛地关上，
{catname} 被送往了一个新地方……

直接掉进了伏击圈！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW12.en:
An alarm siren blares as the doors to the chamber slam shut.

{catname} feels a sense of dread overwhelm {him} as the doors begin to slide open...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW12.zh:
随着密室的门猛地关上，
警报声大作。

当门开始滑开时，
{catname} 感到一种恐惧感笼罩了{him}……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW9.en: The chamber lights up and {catname} is teleported to a new place!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCHAMBER_REW9.zh: 密室亮了起来，{catname} 被传送到了一个新地方！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a mysterious crater in the ground.

{He} can't see what lies in shadow at the bottom, but {catname} thinks {he} could find a way down.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在地上发现了一个神秘陨坑。

{He}看不清底部阴影中藏着什么，
但 {catname} 觉得自己能找到下去的路。

options.name: enter_crater

good_prompt_texts.en: The cats descend carefully into the crater...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们小心翼翼地下降到陨坑中
……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} scrambles down the crater wall into the darkness below...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 顺着陨坑壁爬进了下方的
黑暗中……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW1.en: The cats descend carefully into the crater...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW1.zh:
猫咪们小心翼翼地下降到陨坑中
……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW2.en: In the crater {catname} finds fragments of a destroyed meteor!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW2.zh: 在陨坑里，{catname} 发现了一颗破碎陨石的碎片！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW3.en: {catname} scrambles down the crater wall into the darkness below...
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW3.zh:
{catname} 顺着陨坑壁爬进了下方的
黑暗中……

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW4.en: As {catname} descends into the crater, {he} is attacked by a giant Amoeba and a swarm of its babies!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCRATER_REW4.zh:

{he}遭到了一只巨型阿米巴及其成群幼崽的攻击！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a strange creature, its body deformed and distorted into a hideous mass of flesh.

{catname} can't determine what type of animal it was before it... mutated?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一只奇怪的生物，
它的身体扭曲变形，
变成了一团令人作呕的血肉之躯。

{catname} 无法判断它在发生……突变之前，
到底是什么动物。

options.name: inspect

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} reaches out and touches the strange deformed animal...

{His} body convulses as it mutates!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 伸手触摸了那只奇怪的
畸形动物……

随着身体发生突变，{He}全身开始剧烈抽搐！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} moves close and inspects the creature...

It reaches out and grabs hold of {catname}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 走上前去观察那个生物……

它突然伸手抓住了 {catname}！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW1.en:
{catname} reaches out and touches the strange deformed animal...

{His} body convulses as it mutates!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 伸手触摸了那只奇怪的
畸形动物……

随着身体发生突变，{He}全身开始剧烈抽搐！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW2.en:
The creature howls at {catname} in silent agony.

{catname} looks down as {his} body rapidly mutates... 

Was this some kind of blessing?
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW2.zh:
那个生物在无声的痛苦中对 {catname} 哀嚎。

{catname} 低头看去，
发现身体正在迅速发生突变……

这难道是某种祝福吗？

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW3.en:
{catname} moves close and inspects the creature...

It reaches out and grabs hold of {catname}!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 走上前去观察那个生物……

它突然伸手抓住了 {catname}！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW4.en: The creature rolls over and spits something gross all over {catname}!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW4.zh:
那个生物翻过身，
对着 {catname} 喷了一身恶心的东西！

options.name: run

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} runs away from the abhorrent creature!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 逃离了那个令人厌恶的生物！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to get past the creature but it reaches out and grabs {his} leg!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图绕过那个生物，
但它猛地伸手抓住了{he}的腿！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW5.en: {catname} runs away from the abhorrent creature!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW5.zh: {catname} 逃离了那个令人厌恶的生物！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW6.en:
{catname} and the party run past the strange creature.

They find an alternate route, allowing them to ambush the next battle!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 和小队绕过了那个奇怪的生物。

他们找到了一条备选路线，
这让他们在下一场战斗中获得了偷袭机会！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW7.en: {catname} tries to get past the creature but it reaches out and grabs {his} leg!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图绕过那个生物，
但它猛地伸手抓住了{he}的腿！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW8.en:
{catname} is mesmerized by the bizarre creature and turns away too late!

The creature touches {catname}, spreading a terrible blight to {him}!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSCREATURE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 被那个怪异的生物迷住了，
等回过头来已经太迟了！

那个生物触摸了 {catname}，
将一种可怕的枯萎传给了{him}！

main_prompt_texts.en: Try as {he} might to resist, {catname} feels an irresistible urge to open the jar and free whatever is trapped inside!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
尽管{he}试图克制，但 {catname} 感到一种不可抗拒的冲动，
想要打开罐子，释放困在里面的东西！

options.name: free

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} twists the lid of the jar off and tips it over, spilling the contents onto the ground...

Something tumbles out of the jar and looks up at {catname} with gratitude!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拧开罐盖并将其倾倒，
把里面的东西洒在地上……

某个东西从罐子里滚了出来，
感激地抬头看着 {catname}！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} twists the lid and it bursts open!

Before {he} can react, the monster inside attacks {catname}, then takes off!

{catname} looks around in surprise, bloodied, bruised and poisoned from the encounter.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拧开盖子，它猛地爆开了！

还没等{he}反应过来，
里面的怪物就袭击了 {catname} 并逃走了！

在这场遭遇后，{catname} 惊讶地环顾四周，
浑身是血、布满淤伤且已经中毒。

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSJAR_REW1.en:
{catname} twists the lid of the jar off and tips it over, spilling the contents onto the ground...

{catname} 拧开罐盖并将其倾倒，

{catname} twists the lid and it bursts open!

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds an oasis with a small shaded pool of water. 

{catname}'s dry throat longs for a wet reprieve from the endless dry heat of the desert...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一处拥有一小池阴凉池水的绿洲。

{catname} 干涸的喉咙渴望从沙漠无尽的
燥热中获得一丝湿润的解脱……

options.name: drink

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} gulps down the fresh water. {He} had forgotten how wonderful the feeling of water is!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 大口吞下清爽的泉水。
{He}早已忘记了水的滋味是多么美妙！

bad_prompt_texts.en: The warm water tastes salty, but {catname} continues drinking from the briny pool in desperation, poisoning {himself}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
温水尝起来咸咸的，
但 {catname} 在绝望中继续狂饮那咸水，
结果让自己中了毒！

EVENT_OASIS_REW1.en: {catname} gulps down the fresh water. {He} had forgotten how wonderful the feeling of water is!
EVENT_OASIS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 大口吞下清爽的泉水。
{He}早已忘记了水的滋味是多么美妙！

EVENT_OASIS_REW2.en: The cats drag themselves into the oasis and lay in the small pool, drinking as much as they can stomach!
EVENT_OASIS_REW2.zh:
猫咪们挣扎着进入绿洲，
躺在小池子里，尽其所能地喝个痛快！

EVENT_OASIS_REW3.en: The warm water tastes salty, but {catname} continues drinking from the briny pool in desperation, poisoning {himself}!
EVENT_OASIS_REW3.zh:
温水尝起来咸咸的，
但 {catname} 在绝望中继续狂饮那咸水，
结果让自己中了毒！

EVENT_OASIS_REW4.en:
{catname} laps up the water from the strange pool. It has a strange sweet taste that reminds {him} of {his} mother's warm milk.

{catname} has become a kitten!
EVENT_OASIS_REW4.zh:
{catname} 舔食着怪池子里的水。
它有一种奇特的甜味，
让{him}想起了母亲温热的乳汁。

{catname} 变成了一只小猫！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: Despite the dry heat of the desert, {catname} decides it would be best to move on. Free water in this dreadful place is too good to be true!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
尽管沙漠炎热干燥，{catname} 还是决定继续赶路。
这种鬼地方有免费的水喝，
听起来太不真实了！

EVENT_OASIS_REW5.en: Despite the dry heat of the desert, {catname} decides it would be best to move on. Free water in this dreadful place is too good to be true!
EVENT_OASIS_REW5.zh:
尽管沙漠炎热干燥，{catname} 还是决定继续赶路。
这种鬼地方有免费的水喝，
听起来太不真实了！

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_OASIS_REW5"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds an odd device with buttons and a lever controlling a robotic device.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个古怪的装置，
上面有按钮和一个控制机器人装置的杠杆。

options.name: push_buttons

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pushes some of the buttons!

An energy beam fires at {him}, mutating {his} body!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 按下了几个按钮！

一道能量束射向{him}，使身体发生了突变！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} presses a button on the console...

The machine emits a devastating beam that cuts into {catname}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 按下了控制台上的一个按钮……

机器发射出一道毁灭性的光束，
切入了 {catname} 的身体！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW1.en:
{catname} pushes some of the buttons!

An energy beam fires at {him}, mutating {his} body!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 按下了几个按钮！

一道能量束射向{him}，使身体发生了突变！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW2.en:
{catname} reaches up and presses the buttons...

A blinding hot laser beams down on {him} and {his} body mutates!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 伸手按下了按钮……

一道灼热刺眼的激光射向了{him}，
身体发生了突变！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW3.en:
{catname} presses a button on the console...

The machine emits a devastating beam that cuts into {catname}!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 按下了控制台上的一个按钮……

机器发射出一道毁灭性的光束，
切入了 {catname} 的身体！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW4.en:
{catname} smashes buttons on the machine until something happens...

A giant laser beam slices through {his} flesh!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 猛砸机器上的按钮，
直到发生了点什么……

一道巨大的激光束切开了{he}的皮肉！

options.name: pull_lever

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} yanks the lever down.

A glowing beam washes over {catname} and {he} feels... different!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 猛地拉下杠杆。

一道发光的光束洗刷了 {catname} 全身，
{he}感觉……不一样了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pulls the lever and is immediately struck with a sickening ray, blasting from an arm of the device above {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拉动了杠杆，
随即被上方装置手臂中射出的
一道令人作呕的射线击中了！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW5.en:
{catname} yanks the lever down.

A glowing beam washes over {catname} and {he} feels... different!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 猛地拉下杠杆。

一道发光的光束洗刷了 {catname} 全身，
{he}感觉……不一样了！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW6.en:
{catname} bravely pulls the lever on the device.

A powerful beam of light washes over {catname}, awakening new knowledge deep in {his} mind!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 勇敢地拉动了装置上的杠杆。

一道强大的光束洗刷了 {catname}，
唤醒了{he}脑海深处的新知识！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW7.en: {catname} pulls the lever and is immediately struck with a sickening ray, blasting from an arm of the device above {him}!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 拉动了杠杆，
随即被上方装置手臂中射出的
一道令人作呕的射线击中了！

EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW8.en:
{catname} yanks down the lever...

A purple cloud of toxic smoke streams down from the device, choking {catname} in foul fumes!
EVENT_ODDDEVICE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 猛地拉下杠杆……

一团紫色的有毒烟雾从装置中飘下，
让 {catname} 窒息在恶臭的烟雾中！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds an old can.

{He} can feel something sloshing around inside it.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个旧罐头。

{He}能感觉到里面有什么东西在晃动。

options.name: drink

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} cracks it open and drinks from the can...

A refreshing, delicious beverage! {catname} feels particularly ready for the next battle.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撬开罐头喝了下去……

多么清爽、美味的饮料！
{catname} 感觉为下一场战斗做好了充足的准备。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pops open the can and gulps down the thick liquid within.

{His} eyes begin to water and {his} head spins. {catname} sluggishly stumbles on.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 弹开罐头，咽下了里面浓稠的液体。

{He}的眼睛开始流泪，头晕目眩。
{catname} 步履蹒跚地继续前进。

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW1.en:
{catname} cracks it open and drinks from the can...

A refreshing, delicious beverage! {catname} feels particularly ready for the next battle.
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 撬开罐头喝了下去……

多么清爽、美味的饮料！
{catname} 感觉为下一场战斗做好了充足的准备。

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW2.en:
As {catname} gulps down the strange liquid, {he} feels a buzz of energy!

{His} toes quiver, itching to run forever!
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW2.zh:
当 {catname} 喝下那奇怪的液体时，
{he}感到一股能量爆发！

{He}的脚趾在颤抖，恨不得永远跑下去！

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW3.en:
{catname} pops open the can and gulps down the thick liquid within.

{His} eyes begin to water and {his} head spins. {catname} sluggishly stumbles on.
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW3.zh:
{catname} 弹开罐头，咽下了里面浓稠的液体。

{He}的眼睛开始流泪，头晕目眩。
{catname} 步履蹒跚地继续前进。

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW4.en:
{catname} pauses briefly after opening the can before tossing it down.

{His} senses feel dulled as the warm liquid begins to foam in {his} mouth. {catname} lets out a loud burp.
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW4.zh:
{catname} 打开罐头后迟疑了片刻，
然后一饮而尽。

温热的液体在{he}嘴里冒泡，
{he}感觉变得迟钝。{catname} 打了一个响亮的嗝。

options.name: take

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} picks up the can. It might be useful later?
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 捡起了罐头。也许以后会有用？

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} goes to stash the old can, but it bursts open in {his} paws and something foul leaps out!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 准备藏起那个旧罐头，
但它在{he}的爪子中突然爆开，
某种恶心的东西跳了出来！

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW5.en: {catname} picks up the can. It might be useful later?
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW5.zh: {catname} 捡起了罐头。也许以后会有用？

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW6.en: {catname} goes to stash the old can, but it bursts open in {his} paws and something foul leaps out!
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW6.zh:
{catname} 准备藏起那个旧罐头，
但它在{he}的爪子中突然爆开，
某种恶心的东西跳了出来！

options.bad_code:
set_frame 2
                    prompt "EVENT_OLDCAN_REW6"
                    get_parasite_from_pool parasites

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Probably not a good idea to drink random unmarked beverages. Still though..."[/i] {catname} thinks as {he} moves on.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“喝这种不明身份的饮料可能不是个好主意。
不过嘛……”[/i] {catname} 一边想着一边继续前进。

EVENT_OLDCAN_REW7.en: [i]"Probably not a good idea to drink random unmarked beverages. Still though..."[/i] {catname} thinks as {he} moves on.
EVENT_OLDCAN_REW7.zh:
[i]“喝这种不明身份的饮料可能不是个好主意。
不过嘛……”[/i] {catname} 一边想着一边继续前进。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_OLDCAN_REW7"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
A strange figure made of sticks and twine hangs before {catname}.

A shiver runs down {his} spine. This is an ominous sign...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个由木棍和麻绳组成的奇怪形状挂在 {catname} 面前。

一股寒意袭上脊梁。
这是一个不祥的标志……

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tears down the weird figure and pulls it apart easily, grinning in triumph.

A calm settles over {catname}. {He} feels reassured that this deed will be rewarded in the coming battle.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 扯下那个奇怪的形状并轻松将其拆散，
得意地笑了。

{catname} 恢复了平静。
{He}确信这种行为将在接下来的战斗中得到回报。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} swats at the hanging sign with {his} paw, but can't pull it down.

A sudden sense of foreboding tingles down {catname}'s spine...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用爪子拍打那个悬挂的标志，
但无法将其扯下。

一种突如其来的不祥感在 {catname} 的
脊梁上游走……

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW1.en:
{catname} tears down the weird figure and pulls it apart easily, grinning in triumph.

A calm settles over {catname}. {He} feels reassured that this deed will be rewarded in the coming battle.
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 扯下那个奇怪的形状并轻松将其拆散，
得意地笑了。

{catname} 恢复了平静。
{He}确信这种行为将在接下来的战斗中得到回报。

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW2.en:
{catname} rips the ominous figure down and pulls it apart with {his} paws.

A strange light briefly glows from {his} body as some distant entity blesses {catname} for destroying the foul sign.
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 撕下那个不祥的形状并用爪子将其拆解。

由于 {catname} 摧毁了这个污秽的标志，
一股奇异的光芒在身上闪现，
某个遥远的存在赐予了 {catname} 祝福。

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW3.en:
{catname} swats at the hanging sign with {his} paw, but can't pull it down.

A sudden sense of foreboding tingles down {catname}'s spine...
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW3.zh:
{catname} 用爪子拍打那个悬挂的标志，
但无法将其扯下。

一种突如其来的不祥感在 {catname} 的
脊梁上游走……

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW4.en: {catname} reaches up and touches the strange wooden figure, and lets out a cry of pain!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW4.zh:
{catname} 伸手触碰了那个奇怪的木制形状，
并发出了一声痛苦的尖叫！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} examines the ominous sign... It appears to be a warning!

The party takes care moving forward, allowing them to ambush the next battle!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查了那个不祥的
标志……它看起来像是一个警告！

队伍前进时倍加小心，
让他们在下一场战斗中成功伏击敌人！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} ponders the strange wooden figure for a while, not paying attention to {his} surroundings...

It's a trap!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 盯着那个奇怪的木制形状沉思了一会儿，
没有注意到周围的环境……

这是个陷阱！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW5.en:
{catname} examines the ominous sign... It appears to be a warning!

The party takes care moving forward, allowing them to ambush the next battle!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW5.zh:
{catname} 检查了那个不祥的
标志……它看起来像是一个警告！

队伍前进时倍加小心，
让他们在下一场战斗中成功伏击敌人！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW6.en:
{catname} stares at the strange sign and ponders its meaning...

After some time, an idea forms in {catname}'s mind for a new spell!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW6.zh:
{catname} 盯着那个奇怪的标志并思考它的
含义……

一段时间后，{catname} 脑海中形成了一个新法术的灵感！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW7.en:
{catname} ponders the strange wooden figure for a while, not paying attention to {his} surroundings...

It's a trap!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW7.zh:
{catname} 盯着那个奇怪的木制形状沉思了一会儿，
没有注意到周围的环境……

这是个陷阱！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW8.en:
The strange shape creeps into {catname}'s mind, and {he} begins seeing them everywhere!

Still shaking with fear at an image {he} can't unsee, the other cats manage to corral {catname} onward...
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW8.zh:
那个奇怪的形状渗入了 {catname} 的意识，
{he}开始觉得到处都是这种东西！

由于无法摆脱脑海中的画面，
{catname} 仍吓得浑身发抖，
其他猫好不容易才带着 {catname} 继续前进
……

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} gingerly pulls the ratty figure down and pockets it.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地把那个破烂的形状扯下来，
收进了口袋里。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to pull it down, but it keeps slipping through {his} paws!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 试图把它扯下来，但它总从爪子里滑走！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW10.en: {catname} carefully detaches the wooden shape and brings it back to the other cats.
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW10.zh: {catname} 仔细地取下木制形状并将其带回给其他猫。

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW11.en: {catname} tries to pull it down, but it keeps slipping through {his} paws!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW11.zh: {catname} 试图把它扯下来，但它总从爪子里滑走！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW12.en:
A terrifying screech echoes in {catname}'s mind as {he} touches the ominous sign... 

{He} recoils in pain, trying to pull {himself} away, but the wooden figure latches onto {him}!
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW12.zh:
当 {catname} 触碰那个不祥的标志时，
一声恐怖的
尖啸在脑海中回荡……

{He}因痛苦而退缩，试图挣脱，
但那个木制形状却死死缠住了{him}！

EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW9.en: {catname} gingerly pulls the ratty figure down and pockets it.
EVENT_OMINOUSSIGN_REW9.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地把那个破烂的形状扯下来，
收进了口袋里。

main_prompt_texts.en: [i]"I got itchies and wheezies here for you!"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“我这儿有‘瘙痒痒’和‘喘气气’给你！
”[/i]

options.name: itchies

bad_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Itchies it is!"[/i]
bad_prompt_texts.zh: [i]“那就来瘙痒痒！”[/i]

options.bad_code:
set_frame 2

                    prompt "EVENT_ORGANGRINDER_REW1"
                    get_parasite_from_pool parasites

options.name: wheezies

bad_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Wheezies it is!"[/i]
bad_prompt_texts.zh: [i]“那就来喘气气！”[/i]

options.bad_code:
set_frame 2

                    prompt "EVENT_ORGANGRINDER_REW2"
                    gain_disorder_from_pool diseases

options.name: nothanks

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"YOU WILL REGRET THAT!!!!"[/i]

options.good_code:
set_frame 3
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

                    prompt "EVENT_ORGANGRINDER_REW3"

                    next_event_from_set {
                        event Tragedy
                        count 1
                        same_cat true
                    }

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a pile of skulls.

It seems odd that there are no bodies?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一堆头骨。

奇怪的是，这里居然一具尸体都没有？

options.name: communicate

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to talk to the skulls, but don't respond as they are just bones.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图和这些头骨搭话，
但它们毕竟只是骨头，没有任何回应。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries both verbal and non-verbal communication but they seem to just be inert skulls.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 尝试了言语和肢体上的各种沟通，
但它们看起来只是些死气沉沉的头骨。

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW1.en: {catname} tries to talk to the skulls, but don't respond as they are just bones.
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 试图和这些头骨搭话，
但它们毕竟只是骨头，没有任何回应。

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW2.en:
The skulls tell {catname} of a place where there is buried treasure!

{catname} finds the spot and digs up something there...
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW2.zh:
头骨告诉 {catname} 一处埋藏宝藏的地方！

{catname} 找到了那个位置，
并从那里挖出了某些东西……

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW3.en: {catname} tries both verbal and non-verbal communication but they seem to just be inert skulls.
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW3.zh:
{catname} 尝试了言语和肢体上的各种沟通，
但它们看起来只是些死气沉沉的头骨。

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW4.en:
The skulls whisper to {catname}, telling {him} about the horrifying reality of being dead.

{catname}'s legs quiver with fear and {his} eyes dart around anxiously...
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW4.zh:
头骨对 {catname} 发出了低语，
告诉{him}死亡真相是多么可怕。

{catname} 吓得双腿发软，
眼神充满焦虑地环视四周……

options.name: pilfer

good_prompt_texts.en:
One of the skulls had a gold tooth! Score!

{catname} deftly pulls it out.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
其中一个头骨居然有一颗金牙！
赚到了！

{catname} 熟练地把它拔了出来。

bad_prompt_texts.en: One of the skulls clamps down on {catname}'s paw with its jaw!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: 其中一个头骨竟然咔哒一声咬住了 {catname} 的爪子！

One of the skulls had a gold tooth! Score!

{catname} deftly pulls it out.
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW5.zh:
其中一个头骨居然有一颗金牙！
赚到了！

{catname} 熟练地把它拔了出来。

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW6.en: {catname} pulls the bones apart and fashions them into gear!
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW6.zh: {catname} 拆解了这些骨头，并把它们改造成了装备！

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW7.en: One of the skulls clamps down on {catname}'s paw with its jaw!
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW7.zh: 其中一个头骨竟然咔哒一声咬住了 {catname} 的爪子！

EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW8.en:
As {catname} moves up to the skulls, they begin violently biting {him} in every place imaginable!

{catname} howls in pain under the barrage of clanking teeth!
EVENT_PILEOFSKULLS_REW8.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近那些头骨时，
它们开始对着{him}浑身上下能咬的地方疯狂乱啃！

在牙齿撞击声的围攻下，
{catname} 痛苦地哀嚎起来！

main_prompt_texts.en: A pill bottle lies before {catname}. {He} wonders what could be inside.
main_prompt_texts.zh: 一个药瓶横在 {catname} 面前。{He}好奇里面会有什么。

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pops the lid open and several pills tumble out into {his} paw.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 弹开瓶盖，几颗药丸滚落到了爪子里。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} opens the bottle and finds a strange looking pill inside.

Without hesitating {he} swallows it. {catname} feels an odd sensation...

{catname} got two random bad statuses!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:

{he}毫不犹豫地吞了下去。
{catname} 感到一种奇特的感觉……

{catname} 获得了两个随机减益效果！

EVENT_PILLBOTTLE_REW1.en: {catname} pops the lid open and several pills tumble out into {his} paw.

{catname} opens the bottle and finds a strange looking pill inside.

{catname} 打开瓶子，发现里面有一颗长相奇怪的药丸。

{he}毫不犹豫地吞了下去。
{catname} 感到一种奇特的感觉……

{catname} 获得了两个随机减益效果！

EVENT_PILLBOTTLE_REW4.en: {catname} was never told to not eat random things {he} finds, so after opening the bottle, {catname} quickly scarfs down the hard object inside.
EVENT_PILLBOTTLE_REW4.zh:
从来没人告诉过 {catname} 不要乱吃捡到的东西，
所以打开瓶子后，
{catname} 迅速吞下了里面的坚硬物体。

[i]"These smell FABULOUS!"[/i] {catname} thinks, before quickly stashing the bottle away so no one else can have them.

[i]“这些闻起来太棒了！”[/i] {catname} 心想，

不让别人拿到。

Embarrassed, {catname} runs off, not sure which is more bruised, {his} ego or {his} face...

{catname} 尴尬地跑开了，不确定是自尊心伤得更重，

EVENT_SOMEKINDOFPINATA_REW5.en: {catname} turns away, ashamed at {his} inability to land a good hit on the piñata.

EVENT_PITOFSNAKES_REW1.en: {catname} dives into the pit, dispatching snakes left and right!
EVENT_PITOFSNAKES_REW1.zh: {catname} 冲入坑中，左右开弓解决掉了蛇群！

{catname}'s body begins to mutate from all the venom flowing through {his} veins.
EVENT_PITOFSNAKES_REW4.zh:
{catname} 跌跌撞撞地爬出蛇坑时，
全身密密麻麻的咬痕触目惊心，
但{he}设法挺了过来……

由于静脉中流淌着大量毒液，

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{Catname} is dead.

They made it all this way together, and now {catname} will not be returning home.

在漫长的一段时间里，
没有人移动或说话……

它们一起走到了这里，
而现在 {catname} 无法再回家了。

QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW2.en:
{Catname} lies sacrificed on top of the altar. The altar is pleased, but not satisfied. It desires something specific... 

The remaining cats feel strengthened, and one of them begrudgingly pulls on {catname}'s corpse, salvaging it for useful parts.
QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW2.zh:
{Catname} 被献祭在祭坛顶端。祭坛很满意，
但并不满足。
它渴望一些特定的东西……

剩下的猫咪们感到力量增强了，
其中一只猫极不情愿地拖动着 {catname} 的尸体，
拆解下有用的部分以供回收。

QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW3.en:
{Catname} lies sacrificed on top of the altar. The altar is pleased, but not satisfied. It desires something specific... 

The remaining cats feel great though!
QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW3.zh:
{Catname} 被献祭在祭坛顶端。祭坛很满意，
但并不满足。
它渴望一些特定的东西……

不过剩下的猫咪们感觉棒极了！

QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW4.en:
{Catname} is dead.

For a long moment no one moves or speaks...

They made it all this way together, and now {catname} will not be returning home.
QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW4.zh:
{Catname} 死了。

在漫长的一段时间里，
没有人移动或说话……

它们一起走到了这里，
而现在 {catname} 无法再回家了。

QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW5.en:
{catname}'s last breath barely escapes {his} mouth before {his} corpse leaps up at them with a guttural howl.

[i]"Why did you do this to me? We were friends!"[/i]

The remaining cats flee in shame with their tails between their legs.
QEVENT_MEATALTAR_REW5.zh:
{catname} 的最后一口气还没呼出，
{he}的尸体就发出一声低沉的嚎叫向它们扑来。

[i]“为什么要这样对我？
我们明明是朋友！”[/i]

剩下的猫咪夹着尾巴羞愧地逃跑了。

main_prompt_texts.en: A small cubical obelisk protrudes from the ground.
main_prompt_texts.zh: 一个立方体形状的小型方尖碑从地面凸起。

options.name: touch

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} touches the obelisk. {He} feels {his} body mutate!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 触摸了方尖碑。{He}感觉到身体发生了突变！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} places {his} paw on the obelisk but nothing happens.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 将爪子放在方尖碑上，
但什么也没发生。

QEVENT_OBELISK_REW1.en: {catname} touches the obelisk. {He} feels {his} body mutate!
QEVENT_OBELISK_REW1.zh: {catname} 触摸了方尖碑。{He}感觉到身体发生了突变！

QEVENT_OBELISK_REW2.en: As {catname} touches the obelisk, {his} whole body convulses as a strange power from the obelisk mutates {him}!
QEVENT_OBELISK_REW2.zh:
当 {catname} 触摸方尖碑时，
由于方尖碑中的一股奇特力量使其发生突变，
全身都发生了抽搐！

QEVENT_OBELISK_REW3.en: {catname} places {his} paw on the obelisk but nothing happens.
QEVENT_OBELISK_REW3.zh:
{catname} 将爪子放在方尖碑上，
但什么也没发生。

QEVENT_OBELISK_REW4.en: {catname} pushes {his} paw onto the obelisk. {He} lets out a cry as searing pain courses up {his} arm!
QEVENT_OBELISK_REW4.zh:
{catname} 将爪子按在方尖碑上。
当灼热的痛楚传遍手臂时，
{He}发出了一声哀嚎！

options.name: activate_p

good_prompt_texts.en:
Pyrophina activates the obelisk.  It rises up out of the ground and shatters into small perfectly smooth fragments!

The fragments merge together into a broken mirror. {catname} looks on, seeing a strange new place opening up through the surface into a portal!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
派罗菲娜激活了方尖碑。
它从地面升起，并碎裂成极其平滑的小碎片！

这些碎片融合在一起，
变成了一面破碎的镜子。{catname} 注视着，
看到一个通往陌生新世界的
传送门在镜面上开启了！

QEVENT_OBELISK_MOON_REW_PYRO3.en:
Pyrophina activates the obelisk.  It rises up out of the ground and shatters into small perfectly smooth fragments!

The fragments merge together into a broken mirror. {catname} looks on, seeing a strange new place opening up through the surface into a portal!
QEVENT_OBELISK_MOON_REW_PYRO3.zh:
派罗菲娜激活了方尖碑。
它从地面升起，并碎裂成极其平滑的小碎片！

这些碎片融合在一起，
变成了一面破碎的镜子。{catname} 注视着，
看到一个通往陌生新世界的
传送门在镜面上开启了！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} gazes in awe at the large glowing orb at the end of time.

Next to the orb a transmitter has been set up.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 敬畏地凝视着时间尽头那个巨大的发光宝珠。

在宝珠旁边架设了一个发射器。

options.name: lick

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} approaches the orb and licks it...

Hot energy from the orb pulses through {his} body, mutating it.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 靠近宝珠并舔了它……

来自宝珠的灼热能量在{he}的体内脉动，
使其身体发生了突变。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} approaches the orb and licks it...

Hot radiation blasts {catname}, ravaging every cell in {his} body.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 靠近宝珠并舔了它……

炽热的辐射冲击了 {catname}，
摧残着体内的每一个细胞。

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW1.en:
{catname} approaches the orb and licks it...

Hot energy from the orb pulses through {his} body, mutating it.
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW1.zh:
{catname} 靠近宝珠并舔了它……

来自宝珠的灼热能量在{he}的体内脉动，
使其身体发生了突变。

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW2.en:
As {catname} licks the orb, {his} mind is overwhelmed with knowledge about all things.

{catname}'s body shifts as {he} grows a human head and enters an evolved state of being!
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW2.zh:
当 {catname} 舔宝珠时，关于万物的知识充斥了{he}的头脑。

{catname} 的身体发生了转变，长出了一个人头，
并进入了进化的存在状态！

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW3.en:
{catname} approaches the orb and licks it...

Hot radiation blasts {catname}, ravaging every cell in {his} body.
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW3.zh:
{catname} 靠近宝珠并舔了它……

炽热的辐射冲击了 {catname}，
摧残着体内的每一个细胞。

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW4.en: In a blinding flash of intense heat, the orb explodes, eradicating everything around it, instantly vaporizing {catname}!
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW4.zh:
在强光闪烁的高热中，宝珠爆炸了，
摧毁了周围的一切，瞬间将 {catname} 蒸发了！

options.name: attach_antenna

good_prompt_texts.en:
{Catname} sets up the antenna on the orb.

The time signal is complete! The future and the past now meet up!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{Catname} 在宝珠上架设了天线。

时间信号完整了！未来与过去现在汇合了！

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW5.en:
{Catname} sets up the antenna on the orb.

The time signal is complete! The future and the past now meet up!
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW5.zh:
{Catname} 在宝珠上架设了天线。

时间信号完整了！未来与过去现在汇合了！

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW6.en:
{Catname} attaches the antenna to the orb.

The signal is not yet complete.
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW6.zh:
{Catname} 将天线连接到了宝珠上。

信号尚未完整。

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {Catname} basks in the warm light of the orb for a few moments before leaving.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{Catname} 在宝珠温暖的光芒中沐浴了片刻，
随后离开。

QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW7.en: {Catname} basks in the warm light of the orb for a few moments before leaving.
QEVENT_GLOWINGORB_REW7.zh:

随后离开。

                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: A large lattice of throbbing arteries protrudes from the ground. Where there was once thick flesh binding the veins together, now only shriveled husks remain.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
地里伸出一大网搏动的动脉。
曾经将静脉束缚在一起的厚实肉块，
如今只剩下干枯的躯壳。

options.name: bite

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bites into the artery and a dark red liquid gushes out. The cats excitedly lap up the warm blood and they feel the stresses of their long journey wash away...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬破了动脉，一股深红色的液体喷涌而出。
猫咪们兴奋地舔着温暖的鲜血，
感到长途跋涉的
压力一扫而空……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tears into the tough flesh of the artery, and an inky black fluid sprays out onto {him}! {He} tries to jump back but the thick fluid splashes onto {catname}, deforming {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撕开了动脉坚韧的肉块，
墨黑色的流体喷到了{him}身上！
{He}试图往后跳，但浓稠的流体溅到了 {catname} 身上，
使{him}毁容了！

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW1.en: {catname} bites into the artery and a dark red liquid gushes out. The cats excitedly lap up the warm blood and they feel the stresses of their long journey wash away...
QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW1.zh:
{catname} 咬破了动脉，一股深红色的液体喷涌而出。
猫咪们兴奋地舔着温暖的鲜血，
感到长途跋涉的
压力一扫而空……

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW2.en: {catname} bites into the throbbing artery and is bathed in a warm liquid. {His} body twists as a strange sensation washes over {catname}, healing {his} injuries but leaving {him} forever mutilated...
QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW2.zh:
{catname} 咬入搏动的动脉，
全身沐浴在温暖的液体中。
当一种奇怪的感觉席卷全身时，
{catname} 的身体发生了扭曲，治愈了{he}的创伤，
但让{him}永远毁容了……

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW3.en: {catname} tears into the tough flesh of the artery, and an inky black fluid sprays out onto {him}! {He} tries to jump back but the thick fluid splashes onto {catname}, deforming {him}!
QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW3.zh:
{catname} 撕开了动脉坚韧的肉块，
墨黑色的流体喷到了{him}身上！
{He}试图往后跳，但浓稠的流体溅到了 {catname} 身上，
使{him}毁容了！

options.name: attach_leech

good_prompt_texts.en: {Catname} places {his} head near the throbbing artery. The putrid leech detaches from {his} head and latches onto the artery. The arteries and veins shrivel up, revealing a hole in the ground!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{Catname} 将头靠近搏动的动脉。
腐臭水蛭从{he}的头上脱落，锁在了动脉上。
动脉和静脉随之萎缩，
露出了地上的一个洞！

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW5.en: {Catname} places {his} head near the throbbing artery. The putrid leech detaches from {his} head and latches onto the artery. The arteries and veins shrivel up, revealing a hole in the ground!
QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW5.zh:
{Catname} 将头靠近搏动的动脉。
腐臭水蛭从{he}的头上脱落，锁在了动脉上。
动脉和静脉随之萎缩，
露出了地上的一个洞！

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW6.en: {Catname} places {his} head near the throbbing artery. The putrid leech detaches from {his} head and latches onto the artery. The arteries and veins shrivel up, revealing the fleshy earth beneath. It seems impenetrable.
QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW6.zh:
{Catname} 将头靠近搏动的动脉。
腐臭水蛭从{he}的头上脱落，锁在了动脉上。
动脉和静脉随之萎缩，
露出了下方的血肉大地。
它看起来坚不可摧。

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {Catname} ignores the strange veiny mound.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {Catname} 无视了那个奇怪的布满血管的土堆。

QEVENT_THROBBINGARTERY_REW_IGNORE.zh: {Catname} 无视了那个奇怪的布满血管的土堆。

                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]
