EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW1.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近时，那颗头对{he}低语了些什么，
但 {catname} 听不清它在说什么。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW2.en: {catname} finds a small boil on the back of the head. Pushing the boil causes the head's eyeball to drop to the floor, blinking in seemingly random intervals.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW2.zh:
{catname} 在头后面发现了一个小脓包。
挤压脓包导致头的眼球掉到了地上，
似乎以随机的间隔眨着眼。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW3.en: A chill runs up {catname}'s spine as the head tells {him} a secret. {He} will no doubt take this to the grave.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW3.zh:
当那颗头告诉 {catname} 一个秘密时，
一股寒意顺着脊梁骨升起。
{He}无疑会将这个秘密带进坟墓。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW4.en:
The head screams, and its eye rolls back into its head!

{catname}'s brain flashes with memories that are not {his} own.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW4.zh:
那颗头尖叫起来，眼球翻回了脑袋里！

{catname} 的大脑中闪过不属于自己的记忆。

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} attempts to attack the fleshy head, but stops short when {he} hears it start to whimper. A single tear drops from its quivering eyeball.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图攻击这颗肉乎乎的头，
但听到它开始呜咽时停了下来。
一滴眼泪从它颤抖的眼球上滑落。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname}'s paw snags on the large head's tooth, tearing {his} flesh. The head seems to smile as {catname} bleeds profusely.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 的爪子挂在了大头的牙齿上，
撕裂了{he}的皮肉。当 {catname} 大量流血时，
那颗头似乎在微笑。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW5.en: {catname} attempts to attack the fleshy head, but stops short when {he} hears it start to whimper. A single tear drops from its quivering eyeball.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW5.zh:
{catname} 试图攻击这颗肉乎乎的头，
但听到它开始呜咽时停了下来。
一滴眼泪从它颤抖的眼球上滑落。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW6.en:
The head weeps as {catname} tears it apart with all of {his} might.

A single tooth flies from its gaping maw… It looks valuable!
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW6.zh:
当 {catname} 用尽全力撕碎它时，那颗头在哭泣。

一颗牙齿从它张开的
大嘴里飞了出来……看起来很值钱！

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW7.en: {catname}'s paw snags on the large head's tooth, tearing {his} flesh. The head seems to smile as {catname} bleeds profusely.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW7.zh:
{catname} 的爪子挂在了大头的牙齿上，
撕裂了{he}的皮肉。当 {catname} 大量流血时，
那颗头似乎在微笑。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW8.en: The head's mouth opens impossibly wide as {catname} moves in to attack. It snaps down on {his} arm, tearing muscle from the bone!
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW8.zh:
当 {catname} 上前攻击时，
那颗头的嘴张得不可思议地大。
它猛地咬住{he}的手臂，
将肌肉从骨头上撕了下来！

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bites into the head. It tastes bland and unsatisfying.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 咬了一口那颗头。味道平淡，
令人不满足。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
As {catname} gets close, the head shoots something from its eye socket that attaches to {catname}'s head.

{catname} feels strange...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近时，那颗头从眼窝里射出了什么东西，
吸附在 {catname} 的头上。

{catname} 感觉很奇怪……

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW10.en:
{catname} bites through the skull of the strange head, tasting its salty brains…

{He} feels invigorated!
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW10.zh:
{catname} 咬穿了那颗奇怪头颅的骨头，
尝到了它咸咸的脑浆……

{He}感到精神焕发！

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW11.en:
As {catname} gets close, the head shoots something from its eye socket that attaches to {catname}'s head.

{catname} feels strange...
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW11.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近时，那颗头从眼窝里射出了什么东西，
吸附在 {catname} 的头上。

{catname} 感觉很奇怪……

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW12.en:
{catname} stops short as a guttural gurgling begins to resonate from the bottom half of the head.

{catname}'s stomach churns, and {he} begins to vomit profusely.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW12.zh:
{catname} 突然停下，
因为喉音般的咯咯声开始从那颗头的
下半部分共鸣传出。

{catname} 感到胃里翻江倒海，开始剧烈呕吐。

EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW9.en: {catname} bites into the head. It tastes bland and unsatisfying.
EVENT_SEVEREDHEAD_REW9.zh:
{catname} 咬了一口那颗头。味道平淡，
令人不满足。

main_prompt_texts.en: Beneath the surface of a murky pool of water {catname} spies something shiny!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
在混浊的水池表面下，
{catname} 发现了一些闪亮的东西！

options.name: dive

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} wades into the water and finds some coins at the bottom!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 涉水而入，在池底发现了一些硬币！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} leaps recklessly into the pool and only gets a mouthful of toxic water in return!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 鲁莽地跳进池里，
结果只换来满嘴的有毒池水！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW1.en: {catname} wades into the water and finds some coins at the bottom!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW1.zh: {catname} 涉水而入，在池底发现了一些硬币！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW2.en:
With a splash, {catname} dives into the pool...

Moments later {catname} breaches the surface of the water with an item clutched in {his} paws!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW2.zh:
噗通一声，{catname} 跳进了水池……

片刻后 {catname} 浮出水面，爪子里攥着一件物品！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW3.en: {catname} leaps recklessly into the pool and only gets a mouthful of toxic water in return!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW3.zh:
{catname} 鲁莽地跳进池里，
结果只换来满嘴的有毒池水！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW4.en:
{catname} dives into the water trying to reach the bottom of the pool but almost drowns in the foul muck!

The other cats manage to pull {catname} out.
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW4.zh:
{catname} 潜入水中试图到达池底，
但险些淹死在污秽的烂泥里！

其他的猫设法把 {catname} 拉了上来。

options.name: use_item

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pulls an item out from {his} backpack and fishes out the item from the bottom of the pool!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 从背包里拿出一件物品，
成功捞出了池底的东西！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} reaches into the pool with an item from {his} backpack but fumbles and drops it!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拿着一件背包里的物品伸向水池，
但不小心手滑弄丢了它！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW5.en: {catname} pulls an item out from {his} backpack and fishes out the item from the bottom of the pool!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW5.zh:
{catname} 从背包里拿出一件物品，
成功捞出了池底的东西！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW6.en: {catname} reaches into the murky water and pulls up the item at the bottom!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW6.zh:
{catname} 伸手探进浑浊的水中，
捞起了底部的物品！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW7.en: {catname} reaches into the pool with an item from {his} backpack but fumbles and drops it!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW7.zh:
{catname} 拿着一件背包里的物品伸向水池，
但不小心手滑弄丢了它！

EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW8.en: {catname} trips into the pool and almost drowns in the foul water!
EVENT_SHINYTHINGINAPOOL_REW8.zh: {catname} 摔进了水池，险些在那肮脏的水里淹死！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} spies a cute little bird.

It looks very soft... And also very tasty!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一只可爱的小鸟。

它看起来毛茸茸的……而且也一定很美味！

options.name: catch

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} pounces on the bird, and catches it in {his} teeth!

This will make a fine treat!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 扑向小鸟，用牙齿叼住了它！

这会是一份绝佳的美食！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} leaps after the bird, but it evades {him}!

Feathers fly as the bird swoops at {catname}, stealing some of {his} coins!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 跃起追向小鸟，但它避开了{him}！

羽毛飞舞间，小鸟向下俯冲，
偷走了 {catname} 的一些金币！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW1.en:
{catname} pounces on the bird, and catches it in {his} teeth!

This will make a fine treat!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW1.zh:
{catname} 扑向小鸟，用牙齿叼住了它！

这会是一份绝佳的美食！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW2.en:
{catname} stalks the small bird, {his} tail low to the ground and {his} ears quivering.

The bird hops around, and {catname} follows it into the next room...
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW2.zh:
{catname} 追踪着那只小鸟，尾巴紧贴地面，
双耳微微颤动。

小鸟跳来跳去，
{catname} 跟着它进了下一个房间……

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW3.en:
{catname} leaps after the bird, but it evades {him}!

Feathers fly as the bird swoops at {catname}, stealing some of {his} coins!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW3.zh:
{catname} 跃起追向小鸟，但它避开了{him}！

羽毛飞舞间，小鸟向下俯冲，
偷走了 {catname} 的一些金币！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW4.en:
{catname} attempts to sneak up on the bird, but at the last minute it takes off!

It circles back around and plants a massive spray of white excrement all over {catname}'s head!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图偷袭那只鸟，但在最后关头它起飞了！

它盘旋着绕回来，
在 {catname} 的头上喷了一大滩白色的排泄物！

options.name: charm

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} saunters up to the small bird and offers it a seed.

The bird happily hops over, eager for snack. Little does it know but IT will be the snack today!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 慢悠悠地走到小鸟面前，
给了它一颗种子。

小鸟高兴地跳了过来，渴望得到零食。
它哪里知道，它今天才是那份零食！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
Attempting to charm the little bird, {catname} holds out a few coins in his paw.

The bird snatches them away before {he} can react!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图魅惑那只小鸟，
爪子里抓着几枚金币递过去。

小鸟在{he}反应过来之前就迅速把金币叼走了！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW5.en:
{catname} saunters up to the small bird and offers it a seed.

The bird happily hops over, eager for snack. Little does it know but IT will be the snack today!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW5.zh:
{catname} 慢悠悠地走到小鸟面前，
给了它一颗种子。

小鸟高兴地跳了过来，渴望得到零食。
它哪里知道，它今天才是那份零食！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW6.en:
{catname} makes some chirping sounds deep in {his} throat, and the bird flies over and lands on {his} head!

The other cats are very impressed with {catname}'s new skill.
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW6.zh:
{catname} 喉咙深处发出几声啾啾声，
那只鸟飞了过来，落在了{he}的头上！

其他猫咪对 {catname} 的新技能印象深刻。

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW7.en:
Attempting to charm the little bird, {catname} holds out a few coins in his paw.

The bird snatches them away before {he} can react!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图魅惑那只小鸟，
爪子里抓着几枚金币递过去。

小鸟在{he}反应过来之前就迅速把金币叼走了！

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW8.en:
{catname} places some seeds on {his} head, hoping that the bird will come land on it.

Instead, it swoops down and sprays white excrement in {his} face!
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW8.zh:
{catname} 在头上放了一些种子，
希望小鸟能落下来。

结果它俯冲下来，
在{he}的脸上喷了一脸白色排泄物！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: It may look cute and fluffy but {catname} knows birds can be a pain so {he} leaves it alone.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
它看起来虽然软萌可爱，
但 {catname} 知道鸟类可能会很麻烦，
所以{he}没有理会它。

EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW9.en: It may look cute and fluffy but {catname} knows birds can be a pain so {he} leaves it alone.
EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW9.zh:
它看起来虽然软萌可爱，
但 {catname} 知道鸟类可能会很麻烦，
所以{he}没有理会它。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_SMALLBIRD_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en: A small black hole beckons {catname} toward it, pulling at every hair on {his} body...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个小黑洞在招引 {catname} 靠近，
拉扯着{he}全身的毛发……

options.name: reach_inside

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname}'s hand disappears into the darkness of the hole as {he} reaches inside.
good_prompt_texts.zh: 当 {catname} 伸手进去时，手消失在黑洞的黑暗中。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} reaches into the black hole with {his} arm and feels a terrible crushing sensation as the arm disintegrates into nothing!

{He} recoils in horror from the black hole but it is too late. {catname}'s arm is gone!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 将胳膊伸进黑洞，感到一种恐怖的挤压感，
胳膊随后化为虚无！

{He}惊恐地从黑洞旁退缩，但为时已晚。
{catname} 的胳膊没了！

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1.en: {catname}'s hand disappears into the darkness of the hole as {he} reaches inside.
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1.zh: 当 {catname} 伸手进去时，手消失在黑洞的黑暗中。

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1A.en: With great effort, {catname} pulls {his} arm from the black hole clutching a rare item in {his} paw!
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1A.zh:
{catname} 费了九牛二虎之力从黑洞中拔出胳膊，
爪子里攥着一件稀有物品！

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1B.en: With great effort, {catname} pulls {his} arm from the black hole only to find it mutated into a strange new shape!
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW1B.zh:
{catname} 费了九牛二虎之力从黑洞中拔出胳膊，
却发现它突变成了一种奇怪的新形状！

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW2.en:
{catname} swipes at the black hole...

{His} body convulses as it is overcome with numerous strange mutations!
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 拍打了一下黑洞……

随着身体被无数奇怪的突变占据，
身体开始剧烈抽搐！

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW3.en:
{catname} reaches into the black hole with {his} arm and feels a terrible crushing sensation as the arm disintegrates into nothing!

{He} recoils in horror from the black hole but it is too late. {catname}'s arm is gone!
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 将胳膊伸进黑洞，感到一种恐怖的挤压感，
胳膊随后化为虚无！

{He}惊恐地从黑洞旁退缩，但为时已晚。
{catname} 的胳膊没了！

EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW4.en:
{catname} reaches for the black hole and is completely sucked in!

A blink of the eye later, {catname} is thrown out the other side, {his} body distorted and riddled with severe mutations.
EVENT_SMALLBLACKHOLE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 伸手去摸黑洞，结果整只猫都被吸了进去！

转瞬之后，{catname} 被从另一侧扔了出来，
身体扭曲变形，布满了严重的突变。

main_prompt_texts.en:
A putrid stench is on the air.

{catname} wrinkles {his} nose as {he} finds the source, an incredibly smelly bag.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
空气中弥漫着一股腐臭味。

{catname} 在找到源头——一个臭得不可思议的袋子时，
皱起了鼻子。

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} sees something poking out through the top of the bag and pulls it out...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 看到袋口露出了什么东西，
并把它拔了出来……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} gets close to the bag and a large worm slides out and bites {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 靠近了袋子，
一只巨大的蠕虫滑了出来并咬了{him}一口！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW1.en: {catname} sees something poking out through the top of the bag and pulls it out...
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW1.zh:
{catname} 看到袋口露出了什么东西，
并把它拔了出来……

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW2.en: {catname} finds an old string holding the bag shut and carefully pulls it open...
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW2.zh:
{catname} 发现一根旧绳子系住了袋子，
于是小心翼翼地把它拉开……

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW3.en: {catname} gets close to the bag and a large worm slides out and bites {him}!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW3.zh:
{catname} 靠近了袋子，
一只巨大的蠕虫滑了出来并咬了{him}一口！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW4.en: As {catname} approaches the bag, a parasite leaps out and latches onto {him}!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW4.zh:
当 {catname} 靠近袋子时，
一只寄生虫跳了出来，
死死地吸附在{him}身上！

options.name: destroy

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} rips open the smelly bag and finds something among the trash...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撕开了那个发臭的袋子，
在垃圾中发现了一些东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The bag leaps forward and attacks {catname}!

{catname} bolts in surprise and the Chum Bag pursues {him} to the next area!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
袋子突然跳起来攻击了 {catname}！

{catname} 惊慌失措地逃窜，
而那个诱饵袋一直追着{him}跑到了下一个区域！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW5.en: {catname} rips open the smelly bag and finds something among the trash...
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW5.zh:
{catname} 撕开了那个发臭的袋子，
在垃圾中发现了一些东西……

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW6.en: The rotting bag succumbs to {catname}'s assault and breaks open, revealing several items within!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW6.zh:
腐烂的袋子在 {catname} 的攻击下裂开了，
露出了里面的几件物品！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW7.en:
The bag leaps forward and attacks {catname}!

{catname} bolts in surprise and the Chum Bag pursues {him} to the next area!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW7.zh:
袋子突然跳起来攻击了 {catname}！

{catname} 惊慌失措地逃窜，
而那个诱饵袋一直追着{him}跑到了下一个区域！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW8.en: As {catname} goes to strike what {he} thought was just a bag, it bites {his} face!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW8.zh:
正当 {catname} 准备攻击那个{he}以为只是袋子的东西时，
它咬了{he}的脸！

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pries open the bag and reaches in, looking for something useful...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撬开袋子把手伸了进去，
寻找着有用的东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} reaches into the bag and digs around. {He} feels something latch onto {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把手伸进袋子里四处乱挖。
{He}感觉到有什么东西钩住了{him}！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW10.en: {catname} pulls the stinky bag open and a bunch of items tumble out!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW10.zh:
{catname} 拉开了发臭的袋子，
一堆物品掉了出来！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW11.en: {catname} reaches into the bag and digs around. {He} feels something latch onto {him}!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW11.zh:
{catname} 把手伸进袋子里四处乱挖。
{He}感觉到有什么东西钩住了{him}！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW12.en: As {catname} digs through the bag, the waste and filth stick to {his} fur like glue!
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW12.zh:
当 {catname} 在袋子里挖掘时，
废料和污物像胶水一样粘在了毛皮上！

EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW9.en: {catname} pries open the bag and reaches in, looking for something useful...
EVENT_SMELLYBAG_REW9.zh:
{catname} 撬开袋子把手伸了进去，
寻找着有用的东西……

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} hears something whispering from the darkness...

Should the party keep on going forward?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 听到黑暗中传来阵阵低语……

小队应该继续前进吗？

options.name: keep_going

good_prompt_texts.en:
The cats carry on, their ears alert to signs of danger.

After traveling for a time, the whispering fades into the distance.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们继续前进，
竖起耳朵警惕着危险的迹象。

走了一段时间后，低语声在远处消失了。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
As {catname} moves forward, the whispering turns into chanting coming from beneath {his} feet!

{catname} runs for {his} life in fear!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 前进时，低语声变成了从脚下传来的吟唱声！

{catname} 惊恐万分地拼命逃跑！

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW1.en:
The cats carry on, their ears alert to signs of danger.

After traveling for a time, the whispering fades into the distance.
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW1.zh:
猫咪们继续前进，
竖起耳朵警惕着危险的迹象。

走了一段时间后，低语声在远处消失了。

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW2.en: {catname} bravely leads on despite the ominous whispering.
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW2.zh:
尽管低语声不怀好意，
{catname} 还是勇敢地带领大家前进。

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW3.en:
As {catname} moves forward, the whispering turns into chanting coming from beneath {his} feet!

{catname} runs for {his} life in fear!
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW3.zh:
当 {catname} 前进时，低语声变成了从脚下传来的吟唱声！

{catname} 惊恐万分地拼命逃跑！

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW4.en:
Suddenly, large red hands burst through the earth beneath the cats feet and grab hold of them!

It's an ambush!
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW4.zh:
突然，巨大的红色手掌从猫咪们脚下的地面冲出，
死死抓住了他们！

这是一场偷袭！

options.name: find_another_way

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} turns away from the path and finds a new one that is less disconcerting.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 离开了这条路，
找到了一条不那么让人心慌的新路。

bad_prompt_texts.en: The cats wander lost through endless caves that all look alike...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们迷失在了无数个长得一模一样的
洞穴里……

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW5.en: {catname} turns away from the path and finds a new one that is less disconcerting.
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW5.zh:
{catname} 离开了这条路，
找到了一条不那么让人心慌的新路。

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW6.en: {catname} finds a better way through the caves!
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW6.zh: {catname} 在洞穴里找到了一条更好的出路！

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW7.en: The cats wander lost through endless caves that all look alike...
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW7.zh:
猫咪们迷失在了无数个长得一模一样的
洞穴里……

EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW8.en:
Worried it is a bad omen, {catname} leads the party away.

As the party wanders through the caves, {catname} can't shake the feeling that {he} made a mistake...
EVENT_SOMETHINGWHISPERING_REW8.zh:
担心这是不祥之兆，{catname} 带着小队离开了。

当小队在洞穴中徘徊时，
{catname} 无法消除那种{he}犯了错的感觉……

main_prompt_texts.en: Dense cobwebs line the walls and ceiling, blocking {catname}'s way forward.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
茂密的蜘蛛网布满了墙壁和天花板，
挡住了 {catname} 的前路。

options.name: sneak

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a small gap amidst the webs and wriggles {his} way carefully through the sticky maze!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在蛛网中发现了一个小缝隙，
小心翼翼地扭动身体穿过了这个粘稠的迷宫！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} attempts to sneak between the webs but gets tangled!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 试图在蛛网之间穿行，但被缠住了！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW1.en: {catname} finds a small gap amidst the webs and wriggles {his} way carefully through the sticky maze!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 在蛛网中发现了一个小缝隙，
小心翼翼地扭动身体穿过了这个粘稠的迷宫！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW2.en: {catname} attempts to sneak between the webs but gets tangled!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW2.zh: {catname} 试图在蛛网之间穿行，但被缠住了！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to push through the dense canopy but is caught up in the webs and held fast...

From within the sticky maze, {catname} sees a dark shadow moving quickly through the webs toward {him}!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图从密集的网幕中挤过去，
但被蛛网缠住动弹不得……

在粘稠的迷宫深处，
{catname} 看到一个黑影正穿过蛛网迅速向{him}逼近！

set_frame 2
                    prompt "EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW1"

options.name: attack

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} successfully claws through the cobwebs and continues onward.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 成功抓破蜘蛛网，继续前进。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} and the cats try to push through, but get tangled in the cobwebs!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 和猫咪们试图强行通过，
但被蜘蛛网缠住了！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW4.en: {catname} successfully claws through the cobwebs and continues onward.
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW4.zh: {catname} 成功抓破蜘蛛网，继续前进。

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW5.en: Dismantling the cobwebs as {he} goes, {catname} finds a flea trapped in the webs and rescues it!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW5.zh:
{catname} 一边清理蜘蛛网一边前进，
发现一只被困在网里的跳蚤并救了它！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW6.en: {catname} and the cats try to push through, but get tangled in the cobwebs!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW6.zh:
{catname} 和猫咪们试图强行通过，
但被蜘蛛网缠住了！

EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW7.en:
While biting through a particularly messy cobweb, {catname} feels a sharp bite on {his} face!

{catname} howls as {his} flesh mutates!
EVENT_SPIDERWEBS_REW7.zh:
在咬断一张特别乱的蜘蛛网时，
{catname} 感觉脸上传来一阵剧痛！

{catname} 随着肉体发生突变而嚎叫！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a spooky apparition! Spectral tears wash silently down its face as it watches {his} every move...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个诡异的幻影！
它注视着{he}的一举一动，
幽灵般的泪水静静地流过它的
脸庞……

options.name: sneak

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} doesn't stick around to find out what it wants!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 没留下来搞清楚它想要什么！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to turn and run, but {his} legs won't move...

The apparition stares into {catname}'s soul!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图转身逃跑，但腿动不了……

幻影凝视着 {catname} 的灵魂！

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW1.en: {catname} doesn't stick around to find out what it wants!
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW1.zh: {catname} 没留下来搞清楚它想要什么！

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW2.en:
{catname} tries to turn and run, but {his} legs won't move...

The apparition stares into {catname}'s soul!
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW2.zh:
{catname} 试图转身逃跑，但腿动不了……

幻影凝视着 {catname} 的灵魂！

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to leave, but cannot help but stare at the apparition for what seems like an eternity...

{catname}'s skin wrinkles, {his} fur turns white, and {his} eyes become milky with age.
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图离开，
但忍不住盯着幻影看了似乎一个
世纪……

{catname} 的皮肤起了皱纹，毛发变白，
眼睛因衰老而变得浑浊。

options.good_code: prompt "EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW1"

options.name: talk

good_prompt_texts.en: The apparition presents {catname} with a small box, which {catname} eagerly opens...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
幻影送给 {catname} 一个小盒子，
{catname} 急切地打开了它……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to turn and run, but {his} legs won't move...

The apparition stares into {catname}'s soul!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图转身逃跑，但腿动不了……

幻影凝视着 {catname} 的灵魂！

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW4.en: The apparition presents {catname} with a small box, which {catname} eagerly opens...
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW4.zh:
幻影送给 {catname} 一个小盒子，
{catname} 急切地打开了它……

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW5.en:
The apparition leads {catname} into a small basement and points to an ornate chest in the corner of the room.

{catname} cautiously opens it...
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW5.zh:
幻影把 {catname} 带进一个小地下室，
指着房间角落里一个华丽的箱子。

{catname} 小心翼翼地打开了它……

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW6.en:
{catname} tries to turn and run, but {his} legs won't move...

The apparition stares into {catname}'s soul!
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW6.zh:
{catname} 试图转身逃跑，但腿动不了……

幻影凝视着 {catname} 的灵魂！

EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW7.en:
The apparition regales {catname} with a long, meandering and tragic story about its previous life...

{catname} listens in captivated silence, spellbound to hear the story through to the conclusion.
EVENT_SPOOKYAPPARATION_REW7.zh:
幻影向 {catname} 讲述了一个关于它前世的漫长、
曲折而悲惨的故事……

{catname} 着迷地静静听着，听得入了神，
直到故事结束。

main_prompt_texts.en:
There is a mysterious stain on the ground here...

{catname} wonders what type of strange happenings could have caused it?
main_prompt_texts.zh:
这儿的地上有一块神秘污渍……

{catname} 想知道是什么奇怪的事情造成了它？

options.name: lick

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} licks the strange surface...

It tastes sweet, with lumps of brain matter hiding beneath the dried blood. Delicious!

{catname} feels a surge of energy for the next battle!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 舔了舔这奇怪的表面……

味道很甜，干血下面藏着脑块。
美味！

{catname} 感觉一股能量涌上心头，
足以应对下一场战斗！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} drags {his} tongue over the ground, tearing up dry flakes of the material into {his} mouth...

{catname} retches as old hairs in the stain get stuck in {his} teeth!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在地上拖动舌头，
将干燥的碎片卷入口中……

污渍里的旧毛发卡在牙缝里，
{catname} 干呕起来！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW1.en:
{catname} licks the strange surface...

It tastes sweet, with lumps of brain matter hiding beneath the dried blood. Delicious!

{catname} feels a surge of energy for the next battle!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 舔了舔这奇怪的表面……

味道很甜，干血下面藏着脑块。
美味！

{catname} 感觉一股能量涌上心头，
足以应对下一场战斗！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW2.en:
The stain on the ground tastes funny, but {catname} keeps licking it, swallowing flakes of dried blood and hair.

When {he} is done licking it clean, {catname} feels a strange sensation grip {him} as {his} body mutates!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW2.zh:
地上的污渍尝起来很怪，
但 {catname} 不停地舔着，吞下了干血片和毛发。

当{he}把它舔干净后，
{catname} 感到一种奇怪的感觉抓住了{him}，
身体发生了突变！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW3.en:
{catname} drags {his} tongue over the ground, tearing up dry flakes of the material into {his} mouth...

{catname} retches as old hairs in the stain get stuck in {his} teeth!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW3.zh:
{catname} 在地上拖动舌头，
将干燥的碎片卷入口中……

污渍里的旧毛发卡在牙缝里，
{catname} 干呕起来！

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW4.en: Dried blood and hairs from the stain make {catname}'s stomach turn as {he} digests the rough surface, giving {him} cramps!
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW4.zh:
污渍中的
干血和毛发让 {catname} 在消化这粗糙表层时胃里翻腾，
导致{him}痉挛！

options.name: leave

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} opts to not place {his} soft tongue on the new surface. Who knows what it could have been?
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 选择不把柔软的舌头放在这新的表面上。
谁知道那是什么东西？

EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW5.en: {catname} opts to not place {his} soft tongue on the new surface. Who knows what it could have been?
EVENT_MYSTERIOUSSTAIN_REW5.zh:
{catname} 选择不把柔软的舌头放在这新的表面上。
谁知道那是什么东西？

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a large hole dug into the ground.
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 在地上发现了一个巨大的坑。

options.name: dig

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} makes some progress digging into the ground.

{He} hears a thunk as {his} shovel hits something...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在挖掘泥土方面取得了一些进展。

随着铲子碰到某物，
{he}听到了一声“咚”响……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to dig but injures {himself} instead!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 试图挖掘，结果却弄伤了{himself}！

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW1.en:
{catname} makes some progress digging into the ground.

{He} hears a thunk as {his} shovel hits something...
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW1.zh:
{catname} 在挖掘泥土方面取得了一些进展。

随着铲子碰到某物，
{he}听到了一声“咚”响……

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW2.en: {catname} digs furiously and makes huge progress expanding the hole!
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW2.zh:
{catname} 疯狂地挖掘，
并在扩建坑洞方面取得了巨大进展！

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW3.en: {catname} tries to dig but injures {himself} instead!
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW3.zh: {catname} 试图挖掘，结果却弄伤了{himself}！

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW4.en:
The old spade handle is rough and splinters from the old wood dig into {catname}'s paws!

{catname} howls in pain and scrambles out of the hole, pulling dirt back down to the bottom.
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW4.zh:
旧铲子的手柄很粗糙，
陈年木材的木刺扎进了 {catname} 的爪子里！

{catname} 痛苦地嚎叫着，连滚带爬地逃出坑洞，
还把土给带回了坑底。

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} climbs into the hole and finds a treasure box at the bottom!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 爬进坑里，在底部发现了一个宝箱！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} looks around at the bottom of the hole...

There's nothing there. Perhaps it was already looted?
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 环视着坑底……

那里什么都没有。也许已经被搜刮过了？

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW5.en: {catname} climbs into the hole and finds a treasure box at the bottom!
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW5.zh: {catname} 爬进坑里，在底部发现了一个宝箱！

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW6.en: {catname} reaches down into the hole and pulls out a treasure box!
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW6.zh: {catname} 伸手进坑里，拉出了一个宝箱！

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW7.en:
{catname} looks around at the bottom of the hole...

There's nothing there. Perhaps it was already looted?
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW7.zh:
{catname} 环视着坑底……

那里什么都没有。也许已经被搜刮过了？

EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW8.en:
{catname} attempts to scramble down into the hole and look for treasure...

The fragile dirt walls of the hole collapse, partially filling in the hole!
EVENT_STARTDIGGING_REW8.zh:

{catname} 扑向录音机，
扯出磁带并将其撕成一堆没用的塑料片！

录音机已经被[b]永久[/b]损毁了。

EVENT_TAPERECORDER_REW7.en:
The tape recorder spins and a strange howling emits from the speakers...

{catname} begins to hear strange sounds from beneath the ground around {him}...
EVENT_TAPERECORDER_REW7.zh:
录音机飞速旋转，
扬声器里发出奇怪的嚎叫声……

{catname} 开始听到周围地底下传出奇怪的
声音……

EVENT_TAPERECORDER_REW8.en:
The tape recorder emits a terrifying howling sound!

{catname}'s hair stands up on end. Something truly horrifying is happening and it is too late to stop!
EVENT_TAPERECORDER_REW8.zh:
录音机发出恐怖的嚎叫！

{catname} 毛骨悚然。某种真正恐怖的事情正在发生，
现在阻止已经太迟了！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} ignores the recorder.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 无视了录音机。

options.good_code:
prompt "EVENT_TAPERECORDER_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a large pit full of tar.

It has a terribly pungent smell like rotting eggs.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个充满焦油的巨大深坑。

那里有一股像臭鸡蛋一样极其刺鼻的味道。

options.name: cross

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} gracefully sprints over the tar pits without getting stuck.

It gives the party an opportunity to ambush the next battle!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 优雅地冲过了焦油坑，没有被困住。

这让小队有机会在下一场战斗中进行偷袭！

bad_prompt_texts.en: It wasn't easy, but {catname} manages to make it to the other side only partially coated in sticky tar.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
过程并不轻松，但 {catname} 成功到达了另一边，
身上只沾了一点粘稠的焦油。

EVENT_TARPITS_REW1.en:
{catname} gracefully sprints over the tar pits without getting stuck.

It gives the party an opportunity to ambush the next battle!
EVENT_TARPITS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 优雅地冲过了焦油坑，没有被困住。

这让小队有机会在下一场战斗中进行偷袭！

EVENT_TARPITS_REW2.en: {catname} wades into the tar and befriends some tar creatures on the way over!
EVENT_TARPITS_REW2.zh: {catname} 涉入焦油中，并在路途中结识了一些焦油生物！

EVENT_TARPITS_REW3.en: It wasn't easy, but {catname} manages to make it to the other side only partially coated in sticky tar.
EVENT_TARPITS_REW3.zh:
过程并不轻松，但 {catname} 成功到达了另一边，
身上只沾了一点粘稠的焦油。

EVENT_TARPITS_REW4.en:
The cats get stuck in the deep tar pit...

While still trying to pull themselves free, the party is ambushed!
EVENT_TARPITS_REW4.zh:
猫咪们被困在了深邃的
焦油坑里……

就在它们试图挣脱时，
小队遭遇了偷袭！

options.name: go_around

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} navigates around the tar pit to the other side.
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 绕过焦油坑，到达了另一边。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to find a way around but gets lost in the dense flora...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图寻找绕行的路线，
却在茂密的植物中迷了路……

EVENT_TARPITS_REW5.en: {catname} navigates around the tar pit to the other side.
EVENT_TARPITS_REW5.zh: {catname} 绕过焦油坑，到达了另一边。

EVENT_TARPITS_REW6.en:
{catname} finds an alternate path away from the tar pit...

It leads to a strange cave!
EVENT_TARPITS_REW6.zh:
{catname} 找到了一条避开焦油坑的
替代路径……

它通向一个奇异的洞穴！

EVENT_TARPITS_REW7.en: {catname} tries to find a way around but gets lost in the dense flora...
EVENT_TARPITS_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图寻找绕行的路线，
却在茂密的植物中迷了路……

EVENT_TARPITS_REW8.en:
{catname} gets hopelessly lost!

There is so much undergrowth here it is impossible for {him} to navigate.
EVENT_TARPITS_REW8.zh:
{catname} 完全迷路了！

这里的下层植被太过茂密，
{him}根本无法辨别方向。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds an old can. It looks like it was buried long ago. 

[i]"I wonder what could be inside?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个旧罐子。
看起来是很久以前埋下的。

[i]“我很好奇里面会有什么？”[/i]

options.name: smash

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} breaks the lid off and an assortment of items tumble out.

Looks like it was a time capsule left by someone long ago.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 砸开了盖子，各种物品滚落了出来。

看来这是很久以前有人留下的时间胶囊。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} smacks the old tin, breaking it, but cuts {himself} in the process!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 猛击旧锡罐，把它打碎了，
但在这个过程中割伤了{himself}！

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW1.en:
{catname} breaks the lid off and an assortment of items tumble out.

Looks like it was a time capsule left by someone long ago.
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 砸开了盖子，各种物品滚落了出来。

看来这是很久以前有人留下的时间胶囊。

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW2.en:
{catname} deftly cracks open the can. {He} pulls out an old tattered note which crumbles to dust in {his} paws.

{catname} reaches further into the time capsule...
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 熟练地撬开了罐子。
{He}抽出了一张破烂的旧便条，
它在爪中碎成了灰烬。

{catname} 进一步伸向时间胶囊内部……

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW3.en: {catname} smacks the old tin, breaking it, but cuts {himself} in the process!
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 猛击旧锡罐，把它打碎了，
但在这个过程中割伤了{himself}！

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW4.en:
{catname} hears a crunching sound as {he} breaks the canister.

{He} feels a sharp pain as shards of metal burrow into {his} paw.
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 打碎罐子时听到一声嘎吱声。

{He}感到一阵剧痛，金属碎片刺入了爪子。

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
It appears to be an old time capsule!

{catname} carefully opens the container and something tumbles out...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
这似乎是一个旧的时间胶囊！

{catname} 小心地打开了容器，
有什么东西掉了出来……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} studies the old canister. It seems harmless?

{He} goes to open it, but it bursts open before {he} gets the chance! It was booby trapped!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 研究着这个旧罐子。它看起来无害？

{He}正准备打开它，但还没等动手它就爆开了！
里面装了诡雷！

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW5.en:
It appears to be an old time capsule!

{catname} carefully opens the container and something tumbles out...
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW5.zh:
这似乎是一个旧的时间胶囊！

{catname} 小心地打开了容器，
有什么东西掉了出来……

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW6.en:
{catname} shakes the old capsule and hears something tumbling about inside.

{He} excitedly opens the lid...
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 摇了摇旧胶囊，听到里面有东西翻滚的声音。

{He}兴奋地打开了盖子……

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW7.en:
{catname} studies the old canister. It seems harmless?

{He} goes to open it, but it bursts open before {he} gets the chance! It was booby trapped!
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 研究着这个旧罐子。它看起来无害？

{He}正准备打开它，但还没等动手它就爆开了！
里面装了诡雷！

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW8.en:
{catname} opens the lid and peeks inside the canister and sees a bunch of wires and...

IT'S A BO-M-B! Too late! It explodes!
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW8.zh:
{catname} 打开盖子往罐子里偷看，
看到一堆电线和……

那是炸-弹！太晚了！它爆炸了！

options.name: ignore

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} bats the can around for a bit then gets bored and moves on.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拍打了一会儿罐子，然后觉得无聊，
继续前进了。

EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW9.en: {catname} bats the can around for a bit then gets bored and moves on.
EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW9.zh:
{catname} 拍打了一会儿罐子，然后觉得无聊，
继续前进了。

prompt "EVENT_TIMECAPSULE_REW9"
                    play_animation [resultLeave 0]

main_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"Ok, ugly. Answer me this… Which is better?

Tappy toes or pirouette?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“听好了，丑八怪。
回答我这个……哪个更好？

踢踏舞步还是足尖旋转？”[/i]

options.name: tappytoes

good_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"Oh, honey, you couldn't be more right!

Can you do the running man?"[/i]

{catname} feels a burst of speed!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“噢，亲爱的，你简直不能更正确了！

你会跳‘太空步’吗？”[/i]

{catname} 感到速度爆发！

EVENT_TINK_REW1.en:
[i]"Oh, honey, you couldn't be more right!

Can you do the running man?"[/i]

{catname} feels a burst of speed!
EVENT_TINK_REW1.zh:
[i]“噢，亲爱的，你简直不能更正确了！

你会跳‘太空步’吗？”[/i]

{catname} 感到速度爆发！

EVENT_TINK_REW2.en:
[i]"My god, yes! I'll tap these toes all over your face, honey!

Watch and learn."[/i]
EVENT_TINK_REW2.zh:
[i]“天哪，没错！
我会跳着踢踏舞步踩遍你的脸，
亲爱的！

看着学点儿。”[/i]

options.name: pirouette

good_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"Spin, baby, spin! You got this, honey!"[/i]

{catname} spins and spins until {he}'s dizzy. {He} feels a lot more nimble!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“转起来，宝贝，转起来！
你能行的，亲爱的！”[/i]

{catname} 转了一圈又一圈，直到{he}感到晕头转向。
{He}感觉灵巧多了！

EVENT_TINK_REW3.en:
[i]"Spin, baby, spin! You got this, honey!"[/i]

{catname} spins and spins until {he}'s dizzy. {He} feels a lot more nimble!
EVENT_TINK_REW3.zh:
[i]“转起来，宝贝，转起来！
你能行的，亲爱的！”[/i]

{catname} 转了一圈又一圈，直到{he}感到晕头转向。
{He}感觉灵巧多了！

EVENT_TINK_REW4.en:
[i]"Listen, gurl. If you wanna spin like a queen…

You gotta become a queen! Lemme show you how it's done!"[/i]
EVENT_TINK_REW4.zh:
[i]“听着，姑娘。
如果你想转得像个女王……

你就得成为女王！让我来给你示范一下！
”[/i]

main_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Which is better?"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh: [i]“哪个更好？”[/i]

options.name: makeup

good_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"Well, yeah. No crap! Makeup IS better than an old book…

Here's some lip gloss."[/i]
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“呃，是的。废话！
化妆品当然比旧书好……

给你点唇彩。”[/i]

EVENT_TINK2_REW1.en:
[i]"Well, yeah. No crap! Makeup IS better than an old book…

Here's some lip gloss."[/i]
EVENT_TINK2_REW1.zh:
[i]“呃，是的。废话！
化妆品当然比旧书好……

给你点唇彩。”[/i]

EVENT_TINK2_REW2.en:
[i]"And you know what's even better than makeup? Lip injections!

Here, hold still…"[/i]
EVENT_TINK2_REW2.zh:
[i]“而且你知道比化妆品更好的是什么吗？
丰唇针！

来，别动……”[/i]

options.name: book

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Well, then go read you uggo library lady!"[/i]
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“行吧，那去读你的书吧，
你这个丑陋的图书管理员！”[/i]

EVENT_TINK2_REW3.en: [i]"Well, then go read you uggo library lady!"[/i]
EVENT_TINK2_REW3.zh:
[i]“行吧，那去读你的书吧，
你这个丑陋的图书管理员！”[/i]

EVENT_TINK2_REW4.en: [i]"Well, I sure hope it's a book about how to fix that jacked up mug of yours, sister…"[/i]
EVENT_TINK2_REW4.zh:
[i]“好吧，
我真希望那是本教你如何修复你那张烂脸的书，
妹妹……”[/i]

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a large vat of a strange, green liquid, its contents oozing and bubbling over the side...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一大桶奇怪的绿色液体，
液体正从桶边渗出并冒着泡……

options.name: sneak

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} takes a wide path around the vat, staying clear!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 绕了一大圈避开了那桶废料，
保持了安全距离！

bad_prompt_texts.en: Acid from the vat splashes over the rim and burns {catname}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh: 桶里的酸液溅过边缘，烧伤了 {catname}！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW1.en: {catname} takes a wide path around the vat, staying clear!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW1.zh:
{catname} 绕了一大圈避开了那桶废料，
保持了安全距离！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW2.en:
{catname} walks around the bubbling vat, but as {he} does, a glob of it splashes over onto {him}!

{catname}'s flesh churns under the hot liquid, mutating!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 绕着冒泡的桶走，但当{he}走过时，
一团液体溅到了{him}身上！

{catname} 的血肉在灼热的液体下翻腾，
发生了突变！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW3.en: Acid from the vat splashes over the rim and burns {catname}!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW3.zh: 桶里的酸液溅过边缘，烧伤了 {catname}！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW4.en:
{catname} slips on the ground while trying to pass and accidentally splashes into a pool of the green liquid on the ground!

It burns! {catname} cries out in pain!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW4.zh:
{catname} 在路过时滑倒了，
不小心掉进地上的一滩绿色液体中！

好烫！{catname} 发出痛苦的叫声！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} smells the liquid, breathing deeply, trying to identify it...

The toxins fill {his} lungs, mutating {catname}'s body!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 闻了闻液体，深深地吸气，
试图辨认它……

毒素充满了肺部，
使 {catname} 的身体发生了突变！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} approaches the vat and before {he} can react, it explodes! 

Green ooze sprays all over {catname}, poisoning {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 靠近木桶，还没来得及反应，
它就爆炸了！

绿色的软泥喷了 {catname} 一身，使{him}中毒了！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW5.en:
{catname} smells the liquid, breathing deeply, trying to identify it...

The toxins fill {his} lungs, mutating {catname}'s body!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW5.zh:
{catname} 闻了闻液体，深深地吸气，
试图辨认它……

毒素充满了肺部，
使 {catname} 的身体发生了突变！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW6.en: {catname} carefully approaches the vat and sniffs the fumes... it smells very strange!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地靠近木桶并嗅了嗅烟
雾……闻起来非常奇怪！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW7.en:
{catname} approaches the vat and before {he} can react, it explodes! 

Green ooze sprays all over {catname}, poisoning {him}!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 靠近木桶，还没来得及反应，
它就爆炸了！

绿色的软泥喷了 {catname} 一身，使{him}中毒了！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW8.en:
The foul-smelling liquid sprays out from the vat, covering {catname}'s fur!

{catname} tries to escape the fumes, but they are stuck to {him}, driving {catname} crazy!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW8.zh:
散发着恶臭的液体从桶中喷出，
盖住了 {catname} 的毛皮！

{catname} 试图逃离烟雾，但烟雾粘在了{him}身上，
让 {catname} 陷入疯狂！

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: The green liquid tastes really odd, like nothing {catname} has eaten before!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
这些绿色液体的味道真的很怪，
就像 {catname} 以前从未吃过的东西！

bad_prompt_texts.en: The liquid tastes disgusting, and {catname}'s body spasms in pain!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
这液体的味道令人作呕，
{catname} 的身体因疼痛而痉挛！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW10.en:
{catname} aggressively drinks from the bubbling vat, not caring as it splashes over {his} fur and runs down {his} body...

{catname}'s skin bubbles and mutates under the green liquid!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW10.zh:
{catname} 猛烈地喝着冒泡桶里的水，
完全不在意水溅在毛皮上，
顺着身体流下……

{catname} 的皮肤在绿色液体下起泡并突变！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW11.en: The liquid tastes disgusting, and {catname}'s body spasms in pain!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW11.zh:
这液体的味道令人作呕，
{catname} 的身体因疼痛而痉挛！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW12.en: {catname} gulps down a large swallow of the toxic liquid before recoiling in disgust!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW12.zh:
{catname} 猛地吞下一大口有毒液体，
然后厌恶地退缩了！

EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW9.en: The green liquid tastes really odd, like nothing {catname} has eaten before!
EVENT_AVATOFTOXICWASTE_REW9.zh:
这些绿色液体的味道真的很怪，
就像 {catname} 以前从未吃过的东西！

main_prompt_texts.en:
[i]"Yeah, I got some stuff. How much are you willing to donate?

It's for a good cause…"[/i]
main_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“对，我这儿有些东西。
你愿意捐赠多少？

这都是为了崇高的事业……”[/i]

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"Uh, here. Take this... You deserve it!"[/i]
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“呃，给。拿着这个……这是你应得的！
”[/i]

bad_prompt_texts.en:

You know there are HUNDREDS of dying animals who need this cash a lot more than you, right?

Shame!"[/i]

[i]“你的钱不够……下次也许该试着别那么贪心。

你知道有成百上千垂死的动物比你更需要这笔钱，
对吧？

真可耻！”[/i]

”[/i]

真可耻！”[/i]

EVENT_TRACY_REW2.zh: {catname} 获得了随机属性下降……这是暂时的。

EVENT_TRACY_REW4.en: {catname} gets a random stat up… Temporarily.
EVENT_TRACY_REW4.zh: {catname} 获得了随机属性提升……这是暂时的。

options.good_code:
set_frame 2

                    random_pool_consider_luck [ //sort worst to best for luck
                        { //cursed item
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW1"
                            weight 1
                            get_parasite_from_pool cursed_items
                            play_animation resultBad
                        }
                        { //temp random stat down
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW2"
                            weight 1
                            self_status_next_fight {
                                RandomStatUp -1
                            }
                            play_animation resultBad
                        }
                        { //nothing
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW3"
                            weight 1
                            play_animation resultConfused
                        }
                        { //food
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW3B"
                            weight 1
                            gain_food [1 2]
                        }
                        { //temp random stat up
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW4"
                            weight 1
                            self_status_next_fight {
                                RandomStatUp 1
                            }
                        }
                        { //temp druid familiar
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW5"
                            weight .5
                            gain_familiar Squirrel
                        }
                        { //temp druid familiar
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW6"
                            weight .5
                            gain_familiar Snake
                        }
                        { //temp druid familiar
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW7"
                            weight .5
                            gain_familiar Toad
                        }
                        { //temp druid familiar
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW8"
                            weight .5
                            gain_familiar Turtle
                        }
                        { //random consumable
                            prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW9"
                            weight 1
                            get_item_from_pool consumables
                        }

                    ]

set_frame 2
                    prompt "EVENT_TRACY_REW21"

main_prompt_texts.en: Someone pushes {catname}! {He} tumbles roughly onto a pile of sharp rocks.
main_prompt_texts.zh: 有人推了 {catname}！{He}重重地摔在一堆锋利的岩石上。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW1.en: {catname} feels like an outcast in the group. {He} strays a bit further from the pack.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW1.zh: {catname} 感觉被群体排挤了。{He}离族群又远了一点。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW10.en:
Whatever {catname} last ate must have been spoiled...

{He} got food poisoning!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW10.zh:
{catname} 上次吃的东西肯定坏了……

{He}食物中毒了！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW12.en:
{catname} trips on a rock, face planting into the ground!

{catname}'s forehead swells up and {he} feels sluggish from the head trauma.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW12.zh:
{catname} 被石头绊了一下，脸朝地摔了一跤！

{catname} 的额头肿了起来，
因为头部外伤而感到行动迟缓。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW15.en:
Rats jump out from a nearby crevice and bite {catname}!

{Catname} is suffering a string of bad luck... What did {he} do to deserve this?
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW15.zh:
老鼠从附近的裂缝中窜出来咬了 {catname}！

{catname} 正遭遇一连串的厄运……{he}做了什么要遭这种罪？

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW16.en:
Out of nowhere, {catname} spontaneously combusts!

{catname} howls in surprise as {his} fur lights on fire!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW16.zh:
火焰不知从哪儿冒出，
{catname} 竟然燃烧起来了！

皮毛着起了火，{catname} 惊讶地嚎叫起来！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW17.en:
{catname} finds a little friend! {He} proudly shows it off to the party.

Isn't it cute!?
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW17.zh:
{catname} 找到了一个小伙伴！
{He}自豪地向伙伴们炫耀它。

它难道不可爱吗！？

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW18.en:
{catname} feels something lumpy under the ground at {his} feet and digs it up...

It latches onto {him}!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW18.zh:
{catname} 感觉到脚下的泥土里有什么肿块，
并把它挖了出来……

它粘到了{him}身上！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW19.en: Memories of battles flash in {catname}'s mind, driving {him} into an insatiable rage!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW19.zh:
战斗的回忆在 {catname} 脑中闪过，
让{him}陷入了难以抑制的狂怒！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW2.en: {catname} remembers a time when things were easier and wishes {he} was back home.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW2.zh:
{catname} 想起一段无忧无虑的时光，
渴望回到家里。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW20.en: Someone pushes {catname}! {He} tumbles roughly onto a pile of sharp rocks.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW20.zh: 有人推了 {catname}！{He}重重地摔在一堆锋利的岩石上。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW3.en: {catname} recalls fond memories of being cared for by {his} mother.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW3.zh: {catname} 想起了被母亲照顾的美好回忆。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW4.en: {catname} experiences existential dread. What's the point of it all if it just ends in death?
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW4.zh:
{catname} 陷入了存在主义的恐惧。
如果一切终将以死亡结束，
那还有什么意义？

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW6.en: {catname} feels pangs of hunger. {He} licks {his} wounds but they won't heal!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW6.zh:
{catname} 感到阵阵饥饿。{He}舔舐着自己的伤口，
但它们无法愈合！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW7.en:
{catname} feels emotionally drained... This adventure has been quite the ordeal.

{catname} won't start with mana next battle.
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW7.zh:
{catname} 感到心力交瘁……这次冒险真是一场严酷的考验。

{catname} 在下场战斗开始时将没有法力值。

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW8.en: {catname} accidentally snags {himself} on a rusted nail. {He} can't stop the bleeding!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW8.zh:
{catname} 不小心被生锈的钉子勾到了。
{He}血流不止！

EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW9.en:
{catname} hears the voice of {his} father calling to him!

{catname} turns to see a terrifying face {he} can't describe… It is horrifying!
EVENT_TRAGEDY_REW9.zh:
{catname} 听到{he}父亲的呼唤！

{catname} 转过头，
看到一张无法形容的恐怖面孔……太惊悚了！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a bunch of trash bags. They look full!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一堆垃圾袋。
它们看起来装得满满的！

options.name: eat

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} rips the bags open and devours anything that looks remotely edible. In one of the bags {he} finds a weird foot.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撕开袋子，吞噬任何看起来勉强能吃的东西。
在其中一个袋子里，
{he}发现了一只奇怪的脚。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} feverishly devours whatever trash is in the bags, and {his} stomach starts cramping.

Something {he} ate doesn't sit well with {him}...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 狂热地吞食着袋子里的垃圾，
随后肚子开始抽筋。

{he}吃下去的
东西让{him}感到很不舒服……

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW1.en: {catname} rips the bags open and devours anything that looks remotely edible. In one of the bags {he} finds a weird foot.
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW1.zh:
{catname} 撕开袋子，吞噬任何看起来勉强能吃的东西。
在其中一个袋子里，
{he}发现了一只奇怪的脚。

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW2.en: {catname} gobbles up leftover food within the bags. Tasty!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW2.zh: {catname} 吃光了袋子里的剩菜。味道真不错！

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW3.en:
{catname} feverishly devours whatever trash is in the bags, and {his} stomach starts cramping.

Something {he} ate doesn't sit well with {him}...
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW3.zh:
{catname} 狂热地吞食着袋子里的垃圾，
随后肚子开始抽筋。

{he}吃下去的
东西让{him}感到很不舒服……

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW4.en:
{catname} digs through the trash bags eating random scraps of spoiled meat.

Part-way through {he} feels an overwhelming revulsion towards what {he} is doing...
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW4.zh:
{catname} 在垃圾袋里翻找并吃下一些变质肉块碎屑。

吃到一半，
对自己的所作所为感到一种无法抑制的
厌恶……

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} pulls open the bags and digs around in the filth looking for something useful...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拉开袋子，在污秽中挖掘，
寻找任何有用的东西……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} leaps into the trash bags, digging through the refuse. When {he} emerges, there is waste stuck all over {him}.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 跳进垃圾袋，在废弃物中挖掘。
当{he}出来时，满身都沾满了垃圾。

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW5.en: {catname} pulls open the bags and digs around in the filth looking for something useful...
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW5.zh:
{catname} 拉开袋子，在污秽中挖掘，
寻找任何有用的东西……

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW6.en: {catname} opens the bags, looking for treasure...

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW7.en: {catname} leaps into the trash bags, digging through the refuse. When {he} emerges, there is waste stuck all over {him}.
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW7.zh:
{catname} 跳进垃圾袋，在废弃物中挖掘。
当{he}出来时，满身都沾满了垃圾。

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW8.en: {catname} breaks open the bags, and the disgusting sludge barely held within spills out and covers {him}!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW8.zh:
{catname} 撕开袋子，里面勉强装载的恶心污泥喷涌而出，
盖了{him}一身！

options.name: attack

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} leaps onto the bags with claws out, slashing! Something in one of the bags moves for a moment, then is still. You can't hide from {catname}!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 亮出爪子跳上袋子一阵乱划！
其中一个袋子里的东西动了一下，
然后不动了。你躲不过 {catname} 的法眼！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} attacks one of the bags, but it burts open and a garbage monster attacks {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 攻击了其中一个袋子，但它突然裂开，
一个垃圾怪物袭击了{him}！

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW10.en: {catname} strikes at the bags, tearing them open. Rotting gunk from within the bags bursts out onto {catname}'s paws!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW10.zh:
{catname} 击打垃圾袋并把它们撕开。
袋子里腐烂的粘液迸溅到了 {catname} 的爪子上！

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW11.en: {catname} attacks one of the bags, but it burts open and a garbage monster attacks {him}!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW11.zh:
{catname} 攻击了其中一个袋子，但它突然裂开，
一个垃圾怪物袭击了{him}！

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW12.en:
{catname} hits one of the bags, but it wasn't trash!

A giant chummy emerges from the thin plastic and strikes {him}!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW12.zh:
{catname} 击打了一个袋子，但那里面装的不是垃圾！

一个巨大的诱饵怪从薄塑料袋里钻出来攻击了{him}！

EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW9.en: {catname} leaps onto the bags with claws out, slashing! Something in one of the bags moves for a moment, then is still. You can't hide from {catname}!
EVENT_TRASHBAGS_REW9.zh:
{catname} 亮出爪子跳上袋子一阵乱划！
其中一个袋子里的东西动了一下，
然后不动了。你躲不过 {catname} 的法眼！

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a large trash bin. The lid is ajar, and stench from the refuse floods {catname}'s nostrils.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个大垃圾桶。盖子半开着，
垃圾的恶臭直扑 {catname} 的鼻孔。

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} carefully pushes the lid of the bin off and peers inside...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地推开桶盖，
往里窥视……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} tries to get into the bin, but accidentally tips it over, spilling its spoiled contents all over {himself}!

{catname} scurries away, covered in poisonous filth...
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图钻进桶里，却不小心把它弄翻了，
变质的内容物溅了{himself}一身！

{catname} 浑身沾满了带毒的污物，
仓皇逃走……

EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW1.en: {catname} carefully pushes the lid of the bin off and peers inside...
EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW1.zh:
{catname} 小心翼翼地推开桶盖，
往里窥视……

EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW2.en:
{catname} knocks the bin over, spilling bags and scraps of food everywhere!

Amidst the debris and trash {he} begins seeing movement...
EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW2.zh:
{catname} 撞翻了垃圾桶，
让垃圾袋和食物残渣散落一地！

在残骸和垃圾中，
{he}开始看到有东西在动……

EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW3.en:
{catname} tries to get into the bin, but accidentally tips it over, spilling its spoiled contents all over {himself}!

{catname} scurries away, covered in poisonous filth...
EVENT_TRASHBIN_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图钻进桶里，却不小心把它弄翻了，
变质的内容物溅了{himself}一身！

{catname} 浑身沾满了带毒的污物，
仓皇逃走……

main_prompt_texts.en:
The cats discover the entrance to an ancient necropolis!

Who knows how deep the path will lead? Only one way to find out.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们发现了一个古老的大墓地入口！

谁知道这条路会通向多深的地方？
只有探查过才知道。

options.name: traverse

good_prompt_texts.en:
The cats wander lost through a winding crypt. They begin to choke on the stale, toxic air.

Eventually the party emerges, exhausted. Toxins from the air have sunk in, poisoning the whole party.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们在蜿蜒的墓穴中迷路了。
陈腐而有毒的空气让他们开始感到窒息。

最终小队筋疲力竭地走了出来。
空气中的毒素已经渗入体内，
导致全队中毒。

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW1.en:
The cats wander lost through a winding crypt. They begin to choke on the stale, toxic air.

Eventually the party emerges, exhausted. Toxins from the air have sunk in, poisoning the whole party.
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW1.zh:
猫咪们在蜿蜒的墓穴中迷路了。
陈腐而有毒的空气让他们开始感到窒息。

最终小队筋疲力竭地走了出来。
空气中的毒素已经渗入体内，
导致全队中毒。

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW2.en:
{catname} leads the way down into the necropolis.

The other cats hear a loud scraping sound and suddenly {catname} goes flying past them, bleeding profusely.

[i]We're leaving![/i] {catname} shouts as {he} runs past the party back up the stairs!
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW2.zh:
{catname} 带头走进了大墓地。

其他猫听到一声响亮的刮擦声，
突然 {catname} 鲜血淋漓地倒飞出来。

[i]快跑！[/i] {catname} 一边喊着，
一边冲过同伴跑向楼梯！

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW3.en:
The cats descend into the dark crypt...

What seems like hours later they return, quivering in fear!
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW3.zh:
猫咪们进入了阴暗的墓穴……

感觉过了好几个小时后，
他们才跑回来，吓得瑟瑟发抖！

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW4.en:
The party descends down the stairs into the necropolis...

Moments later they come running back up, battered and bruised!

{catname} refuses to talk about what just happened.
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW4.zh:
小队走下台阶进入大墓地……

片刻之后，他们就遍体鳞伤、
满身淤伤地跑了回来！

{catname} 拒绝讨论刚才发生了什么。

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW5.en:
The cats explore the necropolis for a time until...

{catname} finds a treasure room!
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW5.zh:
猫咪们在大墓地里探索了一段时间，
直到……

{catname} 发现了一个藏宝室！

EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW6.en: While travelling through endless rooms, the cats manage to salvage some old skeletons into makeshift gear.
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW6.zh:
在穿过无数个房间的过程中，
猫咪们设法利用一些旧骸骨制作出了临时装备。

The steps lead down, and down...

Into a black market shop!
EVENT_TRAVERSETHENECROPOLIS_REW7.zh:

一直向下……

竟然通向了一家黑市商店！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} wrinkles {his} nose.

What is that familiar smell? Is it... Tuna??
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 皱了皱鼻子。

这熟悉的味道是什么？
难道是……金枪鱼？？

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} cracks open the can of tuna. Absolutely delectable! What a treat!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 撬开了金枪鱼罐头。绝对美味！
真是太享受了！

bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图用牙齿咬开罐头。
嘴被锋利的金属割破了。

{catname} lets out a yelp as {he} discovers the tuna is full of glass and spits it out!

{catname} 发出一声惨叫，{he}发现金枪鱼里满是玻璃，
赶紧把它吐了出来！

main_prompt_texts.en: An unmarked grave lies in the ground before {catname}.
main_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 面前的地里有一座无名坟墓。

options.name: inspect

{catname} examines the tombstone and finds the name of an enemy on it!

That should make the next battle easier...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 检查了墓碑，发现上面刻着一个敌人的名字！

这应该会让下一场战斗变得轻松
一些……

bad_prompt_texts.en:
{catname}'s mother's name is on the tomb!

A deep fear grips {catname} and {he} runs away.
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
墓碑上居然刻着 {catname} 母亲的名字！

一股深切的恐惧攫住了 {catname}，
{he}转身跑掉了。

一些……

{catname}'s name is on the tomb!

墓碑上居然刻着 {catname} 的名字！

{catname} 凑近仔细看，但墓碑上没有日期。

{catname}'s mother's name is on the tomb!

{catname} reads {his} own name on the tombstone!

{catname} 在墓碑上读到了自己的名字！

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} turns and runs away from the grave!
good_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 转身逃离了那座坟墓！

力量迫使{he}去读墓碑上的名字……

EVENT_UNMARKEDGRAVE_REW6.zh:

main_prompt_texts.en: {catname} finds a well used toilet. Who knows what might lurk within it?
main_prompt_texts.zh:

谁知道里面潜伏着什么？

{catname} carefully uses the toilet...

{His} contribution is appreciated! The toilet man is happy.
good_prompt_texts.zh:

{His}“贡献”得到了赞赏！马桶人很开心。

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to go but is nervous and only releases a tiny turd... it is not worthy!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:

只拉出了一小坨……马桶人觉得这不够格！

{His} contribution is appreciated! The toilet man is happy.

{His}“贡献”得到了赞赏！马桶人很开心。

EVENT_USETHETOILET_REW2.zh: 马桶人对 {catname} 的表现非常满意！

{catname} howls in pain as it grabs at {him} from inside the bowl!

马桶人从马桶里伸手抓向{him}，
{catname} 痛苦地哀嚎起来！

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} sits on the toilet and moments later the party hears a satisfying 'sploosh' sound.

{He} feels a lot better!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 坐在马桶上，

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries as hard as {he} can but just ends up hurting {himself}.

{catname} sits on the toilet and moments later the party hears a satisfying 'sploosh' sound.

当它随着能量脉动时，
{He}听到了一声低沉的嗡嗡声……

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} reaches out and grabs the meteor, pocketing it!

main_prompt_texts.en:
A large pile of trash blocks {catname}'s way ahead.

The large heap is composed of deceased cats... A truly horrifying sight!
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一大堆垃圾挡住了 {catname} 前进的道路。

那堆巨大的
垃圾里全是死猫……真是令人毛骨悚然的景象！

options.name: loot

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} climbs onto the pile and pulls at some of the objects, looking for anything useful.

Most of it looks like junk but {he} manages to salvage some scraps!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 爬上垃圾堆，翻找着一些物件，

虽然大部分看起来都是垃圾，
但{he}还是成功搜刮到了一些废料！

{catname} pulls at the pile, digging for scraps.

Tossing aside bodies and bags of trash, something cuts {his} arm, causing it to bleed!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 拉扯着那堆东西，试图搜刮废料。

在把尸体和垃圾袋扔到一旁时，
有什么东西割伤了{he}的手臂，
导致流血了！

{catname} climbs onto the pile and pulls at some of the objects, looking for anything useful.

EVENT_WALLOFCATS_REW2.zh:

在垃圾堆深处，
{he}发现了一些东西……

EVENT_WALLOFCATS_REW7.en: {catname} tries to force {his} way into the pile of cat bodies but is scratched by some of their claws and starts to bleed!
EVENT_WALLOFCATS_REW7.zh:
{catname} 试图强行冲进那堆猫尸里，
但被一些利爪抓伤了，开始流血！

{catname} attacks the pile of bodies, trying to push it over...

Instead the pile collapses on {catname}, and something sharp buried in the pile stabs {him}!
EVENT_WALLOFCATS_REW8.zh:
{catname} 攻击那堆尸体，
试图把它推倒……

结果尸体堆塌下来压在了 {catname} 身上，
埋在里面的锋利物件刺伤了{him}！

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} carefully searches through some of the nearby cats and finds some useful items in their pockets.
good_prompt_texts.zh:

在它们的口袋里发现了一些有用的物品。

main_prompt_texts.zh:

无数双眼睛从黑暗中窥视着外面。

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} carefully sneaks by the wall and nothing appears to happen.
good_prompt_texts.zh:

bad_prompt_texts.zh: {catname} 为了尽快逃离，拔腿就跑！

EVENT_WATCHINGEYEBALLS_REW2.zh:
{catname} 溜过那条看起来很诡异的裂缝，

The eyes glare directly at {catname} as {he} attempts to sneak by...

EVENT_WATCHINGEYEBALLS_REW3.zh: {catname} 为了尽快逃离，拔腿就跑！

EVENT_WATCHINGEYEBALLS_REW4.en:
{catname} approaches the crack in the wall, trying to discern what creature's eyes are staring at {him}...

The unnerving gaze of the eyeballs terrifies {catname}, and the cats turn tail and run for their lives, right into an ambush!
EVENT_WATCHINGEYEBALLS_REW4.zh:
眼球那令人不安的注视吓坏了 {catname}，
猫咪们夹着尾巴逃命，
正好撞进了伏击圈！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en:
After closer examination, {catname} discovers it was just a trick of the light...

The eyes were coins!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
经过仔细检查，
{catname} 发现那只是光线的把戏……

那些眼睛其实是硬币！

bad_prompt_texts.en:
The cats look directly at the eyes, no one wanting to move first. Their eyes begin to water in pain as they resist the urge to blink.

No one says anything but together the cats all turn and run in terror!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
猫咪们直视着那些眼睛，
谁也不愿先动。它们强忍着不眨眼，
眼睛开始因疼痛而流泪。

虽然谁也没说话，
但猫咪们不约而同地转身，
惊恐地逃跑了！

main_prompt_texts.en:
A massive deformed head lies before {catname}.

Mouth agape, its single, unmoving eye stares at {catname}...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
一个巨大的畸形头颅横在 {catname} 面前。

它张大着嘴巴，那只唯一的、
僵死不动的眼睛死死盯着 {catname}……

options.name: fight

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} leaps at the strange head, striking it before it has time to react!

{catname} rips out its single eye as a trophy.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 跳向这个奇怪的头，
在它还来不及反应时就发起了攻击！

{catname} 挖出了它那只唯一的眼睛作为战利品。

{catname} 打击了这个怪物头颅！它颤抖了一下，

{catname} 在残骸中搜寻，

{catname} sneaks up to attack, but it rises up and makes a terrifying sucking sound!

The cats howl in pain as their faces are ripped towards it!

Each cat lost part of their face!

猫咪们痛苦地嚎叫着，
它们的脸都被吸向了它！

每只猫都失去了部分面容！

这并不是{he}来的那条路……但它怎么又出现在这了？

那颗头颅独眼紧盯着{him}。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a strange egg. It is larger than any normal egg {he} has seen before.

It appears to be quivering slightly, although that might be an illusion.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一个奇怪的蛋。
它比以前见过的任何正常的蛋都要大。

它似乎在轻微颤抖，
虽然那可能只是错觉。

options.name: smash

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} cracks the egg open and a delicious liquid flows out. {He} eagerly laps it up.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 敲开了蛋，流出一种美味的液体。
{He}急切地舔食着。

bad_prompt_texts.en:
As {catname} cracks the egg open, {he} is horrified as a small creature tumbles out.

It makes a small squawk before keeling over. What has {he} done?!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
当 {catname} 敲开蛋时，看到一个小生物滚落出来，
{he}被吓坏了。

它发出微弱的叫声，然后倒地不起了。
{he}做了什么？！

EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW1.en: {catname} cracks the egg open and a delicious liquid flows out. {He} eagerly laps it up.
EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW1.zh:
{catname} 敲开了蛋，流出一种美味的液体。
{He}急切地舔食着。

EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW2.en: {catname} smashes open the egg with a resounding 'crack!' A pale, invigorating liquid pools on the floor.
EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW2.zh:
{catname} 伴随着响亮的“咔嚓”声砸开了蛋！
地板上流了一滩苍白而充满活力的液体。

EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW3.en:
As {catname} cracks the egg open, {he} is horrified as a small creature tumbles out.

It makes a small squawk before keeling over. What has {he} done?!

{he}做了什么？！

Thinking nothing of it, {catname} whacks the egg, breaking the shell.

Aghast, {catname} leaps back as a giant angry fetus crawls out!
EVENT_WEIRDEGG_REW4.zh:
{catname} 没多想，直接敲击了蛋壳将其打碎。

{catname} 惊骇地向后跳去，
一个巨大的愤怒胎儿爬了出来！

打算稍后再研究。

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a curious looking white rabbit.

It stares at {him} with bright red eyes...
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 发现了一只长相奇特的白兔。

它用那双鲜红的眼睛盯着{him}……

options.name: charm

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} licks the rabbit on the ear and rubs its belly.

The rabbit, perhaps confused at the odd gesture, barfs up a pile of bones.

{catname} didn't think rabbits were carnivores but apparently this one is?
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 舔了舔兔子的耳朵，还揉了揉它的肚子。

兔子也许被这奇怪的举动搞糊涂了，
吐出了一堆骨头。

{catname} 以前不觉得兔子是食肉动物，
但显然这一只是？

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} tries to tame the wild rabbit but it viciously bites {him}!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 试图驯服这只野兔，
但它凶狠地咬了{him}一口！

{catname} licks the rabbit on the ear and rubs its belly.

The rabbit, perhaps confused at the odd gesture, barfs up a pile of bones.

{catname} didn't think rabbits were carnivores but apparently this one is?

EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW2.en:
The rabbit looks angrily at {catname} as {he} approaches, but warms up to {him} after a lot of kisses.

The rabbit seems a bit temperamental, but it tags along as a friend regardless!

当 {catname} 靠近时，兔子愤怒地看着{he}，
但在许多个亲亲后，它对{him}的态度缓和了。

这只兔子似乎有点脾气，
但它还是作为朋友跟了上来！

EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW3.en: {catname} tries to tame the wild rabbit but it viciously bites {him}!
EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW3.zh:
{catname} 试图驯服这只野兔，
但它凶狠地咬了{him}一口！

EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW4.en:
{catname} tries to befriend the rabbit, but it becomes enraged!

The white rabbit begins foaming at the mouth and charges the party at blinding speed!
EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW4.zh:
{catname} 试图和兔子交朋友，但它却被激怒了！

白兔开始口吐白沫，
并以惊人的速度向队伍发起冲锋！

EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW7.en: {catname} follows the rabbit down into a burrow where it suddenly tears into {him} with its teeth!

EVENT_WHITERABBIT_REW8.en:
Following the white rabbit down into its den, {catname} suddenly finds {himself} surrounded by corpses of numerous cats...

Realizing {his} mistake, {catname} turns to leave but it is too late!

但为时已晚！

main_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} finds a purse on the ground.

Its charming colors seem out of place in this gloomy place.
main_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在地上发现了一个手提包。

它那迷人的色彩在这个阴郁的地方显得格格不入。

options.name: open

good_prompt_texts.en:
{catname} digs around in the purse, and finds all sorts of cosmetics.

{He} glams it up and feels very pretty!
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 在包里翻了翻，
发现了各种各样的化妆品。

{He}把自己打扮了一番，觉得自己漂亮极了！

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} dumps the purse open and the contents spills out onto the ground. Among the random junk, {catname} spots a few pills and eats them!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 把包里的东西全倒了出来，
内容物洒了一地。在乱七八糟的垃圾中，
{catname} 发现了几个药丸并把它们吃掉了！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW1.en:
{catname} digs around in the purse, and finds all sorts of cosmetics.

{He}把自己打扮了一番，觉得自己漂亮极了！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW2.en:
{catname} looks in the purse and finds mostly expired candy, makeup, and other useless items.

Reaching further in, {he} feels an object with {his} paw and pulls it out...
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW2.zh:
{catname} 往包里看去，发现里面大多是过期的糖果、
化妆品和其他没用的东西。

把手伸进更深处，
{he}用爪子摸到了一个物体并把它掏
了出来……

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW3.en: {catname} dumps the purse open and the contents spills out onto the ground. Among the random junk, {catname} spots a few pills and eats them!
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW3.zh:
{catname} 把包里的东西全倒了出来，
内容物洒了一地。在乱七八糟的垃圾中，
{catname} 发现了几个药丸并把它们吃掉了！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW4.en:
Tearing open the purse, {catname} is disappointed to find mostly useless items were inside.

{He} does find a pill though and promptly swallows it!
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW4.zh:
撕开手提包后，
{catname} 很失望地发现里面大部分都是没用的东西。

不过{he}确实发现了一个药丸，
并迅速吞了下去！

options.name: examine

good_prompt_texts.en: {catname} digs around in the purse with {his} paw and feels some small hard objects at the bottom...
good_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 用爪子在包里四处乱挖，
感觉到包底有一些小而硬的
物体……

bad_prompt_texts.en: {catname} looks inside the purse and spies some old hard candies. {catname} swallows them whole!
bad_prompt_texts.zh:
{catname} 往包里看去，发现了一些旧的硬糖。
{catname} 把它们全咽了下去！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW5.en: {catname} digs around in the purse with {his} paw and feels some small hard objects at the bottom...

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW6.en: {catname} knocks the purse over and meows excitedly as lots of pills and coins spill out!
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW6.zh:
{catname} 撞倒了包，并兴奋地喵喵叫，
因为大量的药丸和金币洒了出来！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW7.en: {catname} looks inside the purse and spies some old hard candies. {catname} swallows them whole!
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW7.zh:
{catname} 往包里看去，发现了一些旧的硬糖。
{catname} 把它们全咽了下去！

EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW8.en:
Although it mostly contained random junk, {catname} does spy an odd looking candy and pops it in {his} mouth.

It tastes really weird! {catname} starts to feel sick.
EVENT_WOMANSPURSE_REW8.zh:
虽然里面大部分都是随机的垃圾，
但 {catname} 确实看到了一颗长相奇特的糖果，
并把它扔进了嘴里。

味道非常奇怪！{catname} 开始感到不舒服。

good_prompt_texts.en: [i]"What use would I have of a purse? I'm a cat,"[/i] {catname} thinks, as {he} ignores the purse.
good_prompt_texts.zh:
[i]“我要手提包有什么用？
我是一只猫，”[/i] {catname} 想着，
随后没有理会那个包。
